################################################################################################################
# Russia Events 																					   		   #
################################################################################################################
# First attempted rework by Rylock and Alpinia																   #
################################################################################################################
# Second rework by Matoro, Katie, Frill Shark, Kano, Daru, Deliberus, Purple Jinjo, Gideones, Targai and DDago #
################################################################################################################
add_namespace = russia
add_namespace = ruselections#Russian Election
add_namespace = demrus#Democratic Russia
add_namespace = monrus#Monarchist Russia
add_namespace = socrus#Socialist Russia
add_namespace = freerus#Boldyrev
add_namespace = rusfor#Foreign policy
add_namespace = rusfla#Flavour
add_namespace = rusnews#News Events
# russia.1-10 = intro and system events
# russia.11-150 = Black Monday and other early events
# russia.151-200 = Chernov assassination and fallout
# russia.120-279 = Savinkov events
# russia.280-299 = Voskhod events
# russia.400-319 = German Economic Influence events
# russia.442-323 = War Planning events
# russia.450-399 = Great Patriotic War events
# russia.501-513 = Caucasus Unrest events
# russia.550-599 = Central Asia Crisis
# russia.600-699 = Semyonov events
# russia.900-949 = Government changes
# russia.950-999 = Triggered anger events
# russia.1100> = integration events
# ruselections.1-51 = DemRusAssembly and Election events
# demrus.1-125 = Democratic Russia events
# monrus.1-99 = Monarchist Russia events
# socrus.1-500 = Socialist Russia events
# freerus.1-13 = Boldyrev's Free Russia events
# rusfor.1-214 = Foreign Policy events
# rusfla.1-111 = Flavour events
# russia.1000-1099 = MIO modifiers/effects events
# russia.441-1199 = Army events
# russia.5000-5005 = Debug events
country_event = {
	#This is how AI picks paths.
	id = russia.10000
	title = russia.10000.t
	desc = russia.10000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Savinkov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10000 option russia.10000.a"
		name = russia.10000.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REGENCY
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
		country_event = {
			id = russia.10001
			hours = 6
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Republic
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10000 option russia.10000.b"
		name = russia.10000.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REPUBLIC
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
		country_event = {
			id = russia.10003
			hours = 6
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Empire
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10000 option russia.10000.c"
		name = russia.10000.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_MONARCHY
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
		country_event = {
			id = russia.10004
			hours = 6
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Socialist
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10000 option russia.10000.e"
		name = russia.10000.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_SOCIALIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
		country_event = {
			id = russia.10005
			hours = 6
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#This is how AI picks subpaths for Savinkov.
	id = russia.10001
	title = russia.10001.t
	desc = russia.10001.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
	immediate = {
		country_event = {
			id = russia.10002
			hours = 6
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Old Svobodniks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10001 option russia.10001.a"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Old Svobodniks"
		name = russia.10001.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_OLD_SVOBODNIK_NATPOP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
	}
	option = {
		#Solidarists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10001 option russia.10001.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Solidarists"
		name = russia.10001.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOLIDARIST_NATPOP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
	}
	option = {
		#Ideocrats
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10001 option russia.10001.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Ideocrats"
		name = russia.10001.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_IDEOCRAT_NATPOP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
	}
}

country_event = {
	#This is how AI picks if it will do Wrangel path, and what subpath.
	id = russia.10002
	title = russia.10002.t
	desc = russia.10002.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
	option = {
		#No Wrangel
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10002 option russia.10002.a"
		name = russia.10002.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#VPS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10002 option russia.10002.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia.10002.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REGENCY
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SHULGIN_AUTDEM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
	}
	option = {
		#VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10002 option russia.10002.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia.10002.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REGENCY
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
	}
	option = {
		#Kadets
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10002 option russia.10002.e"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia.10002.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REGENCY
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NO_SOCIALISTS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
	}
}

country_event = {
	#This is how AI picks paths for Republic.
	id = russia.10003
	title = russia.10003.t
	desc = russia.10003.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
	option = {
		#RDP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10003 option russia.10003.a"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - RDP"
		name = russia.10003.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_REPUBLIC_SULIMOV_SYNDIE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
		country_event = russia.10006
	}
	option = {
		#Right SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10003 option russia.10003.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Right-SRs (Republic)"
		name = russia.10003.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOROKIN_SOCLIB
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
	}
	option = {
		#Kadets
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10003 option russia.10003.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Kadets (Republic)"
		name = russia.10003.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_DOLGORUKOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
	}
	option = {
		#VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10003 option russia.10003.e"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - VPP (Republic)"
		name = russia.10003.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
	}
}

country_event = {
	#This is how AI picks paths for Empire.
	id = russia.10004
	title = russia.10004.t
	desc = russia.10004.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Right SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10004 option russia.10004.a"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Right-SRs (Empire)"
		name = russia.10004.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {

					}
				}
			}
		}

					}
				}

					}
				}
				NOT = {

					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
	}
	option = {

		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - VPP (Empire)"

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {

					}
				}
				NOT = {

					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_VERNADSKY_SOCCON
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
	}
}

			base = 1000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_LEVITSKY_SYNDIE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
	}
	option = {
		#Sulimov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10005 option russia.10005.f"

			base = 1000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {

					}
				}
			}

		is_ai = yes
	}

		#Titov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10006 option russia.10006.a"
		name = russia.10006.a

			has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai

country_event = {
	#Towards Total War
	id = russia.10010
	title = russia.10010.t
	desc = russia.10010.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_failed_plan
		#is_ai = yes
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		has_war_with = GER
		surrender_progress > 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.10010 option russia.10010.a"
		name = russia.10010.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_total_war
			days = 400
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = FER
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = {
					561
				}
				limit = {
					valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 10
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Gvardeyskaya Udr. Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### ECONOMIC EVENTS
country_event = {
	#Black Monday Hits Russia (triggered by main Black Monday event)
	id = russia.5
	title = russia.5.t
	desc = russia.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5 option russia.5.a"
		name = russia.5.a
		add_ideas = RUS_black_monday_3
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_influence_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_Black_Monday_Happened
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.6
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Unemployment Spike
	id = russia.6
	title = russia.6.t
	desc = russia.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.7
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.6 option russia.6.a"
		name = russia.6.a
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Banking Bailouts
	id = russia.7
	title = russia.7.t
	desc = russia.7.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.8
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.12
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.7 option russia.7.a"
		name = russia.7.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.7 option russia.7.b"
		name = russia.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Plight of the Farmers
	id = russia.8
	title = russia.8.t
	desc = russia.8.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.8 option russia.8.a"
		name = russia.8.a
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.8 option russia.8.b"
		name = russia.8.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Addressing the Shortages
	id = russia.12
	title = russia.12.t
	desc = russia.12.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shortages
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.12 option russia.12.a"
		name = russia.12.a		#Divert funds from the military to alleviate the shortages
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 5
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_popular_anger > 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_war_support = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.12 option russia.12.b"
		name = russia.12.b		#Our military comes first, and it's our duty to support them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_military_anger > 1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.12 option russia.12.c"
		name = russia.12.c		#Do what we can to aid those most affected
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_popular_anger > 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.12 option russia.12.e"
		name = russia.12.e		#Dig deep - the government needs to help out
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_popular_anger > 2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
}

#15-17 empty
unit_leader_event = {
	#Army demands funds
	id = russia.30
	title = russia.30.t
	desc = russia.30.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_science_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_military_production
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.30 option russia.30.a"
		name = russia.30.a
		activate_mission = RUS_army_focus_demand
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_mil_focus_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.30 option russia.30.b"
		name = russia.30.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Army furious
	id = russia.31
	title = russia.31.t
	desc = russia.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_science_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_military_production
			focus_progress = {
				focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory
				progress > 0
			}
			focus_progress = {
				focus = RUS_science_of_victory
				progress > 0
			}
			focus_progress = {
				focus = RUS_military_production
				progress > 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.31 option russia.31.a"
		name = russia.31.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.31 option russia.31.b"
		name = russia.31.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

	#Navy demands funds
	id = russia.32

	desc = russia.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_inspect_VMFR
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
			is_navy_chief = yes
		}
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.32 option russia.32.a"
		name = russia.32.a
		activate_mission = RUS_navy_focus_demand
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_navy_focus_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.32 option russia.32.b"
		name = russia.32.b
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Kolchak furious
	id = russia.33
	title = russia.33.t
	desc = russia.33.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_inspect_VMFR
			focus_progress = {
				focus = RUS_inspect_VMFR
				progress > 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.33 option russia.33.a"
		name = russia.33.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Great Patriotic War
	id = russia.50
	title = russia.50.t
	desc = {
		text = russia.50.d.socialist
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.50.d.democratic_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.50.d.authoritarian_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.50.d.democratic_GER
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.50.d.authoritarian_GER
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = FRA
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.50 option russia.50.a"
		name = russia.50.a		#We will march through Avenue des Champs-Elysées!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_manpower = 75000
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.50 option russia.50.b"
		name = russia.50.b		#We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_manpower = 75000
		hidden_effect = {
			### This is how the AI goes to Wrangel in the game rules
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
					RSA = {
						is_ai = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
				}
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_anger_change = 10
				}
				RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			}
		}
		#UKR Hard Mode
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = MIE_east_no_help
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_patriotic_war_2
				days = 730
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = -0.05
		}

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
			ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_rikhter
			ideology = social_liberal_subtype
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party_long
				name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party
			}

			}

			}

		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Replacing Kornilov
	id = russia.124
	title = russia.124.t
	desc = russia.124.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.123
				days = 5
			}
			#State of Security
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.124 option russia.124.a"
		name = russia.124.a		#Wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_guide_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_army_reshuffle
			days = 180
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.133
					days = 1
				}
				#Wrangel Pleased
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.30
					days = 180
				}
				#Army demands funds
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_character = {
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.32
					days = 180
				}
				#Navy demands funds
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.124 option russia.124.b"
		name = russia.124.b		#Denikin
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_anton_denikin
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_anton_denikin_army_chief
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_guide_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_army_reshuffle
			days = 180
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anton_denikin = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.134
					days = 1
				}
				#Denikin Pleased
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.30
					days = 180
				}
				#Army demands funds
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_character = {
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_anton_denikin_leader_desc
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.32
					days = 180
				}
				#Navy demands funds
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Cracks in the SZRS Military
	id = russia.135
	title = russia.135.t
	desc = russia.135.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gopper
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.135 option russia.135.a"
		name = russia.135.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.135 option russia.135.b"
		name = russia.135.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_karl_gopper = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = russia.136
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#Death of the Patriarch
	id = russia.204

		}
		text = russia.204.d.savinkov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = russia.204.d.socialist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = russia.204.d.democratic
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox

			}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.204 option russia.204.b"
		name = russia.204.b		#Pray for People's health!
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		RUS_patriarch = {

				name = RUS_patriarch_yevlogy
			}
			set_portraits = {

					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_yevlogy.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger < 3
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes

			set_character_name = {
				name = RUS_patriarch_iosif
			}
			set_portraits = {

					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_iosif.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.204 option russia.204.e"
		name = russia.204.e		#It is Yevlogy who will lead us now!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger < 3
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
		}

	#The Quantification Problem of the VES
	id = russia.230
	title = russia.230.t
	desc = russia.230.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vosnenensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.230 option russia.230.a"
		name = russia.230.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.230 option russia.230.b"
		name = russia.230.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_3
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_3
				add_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2
				add_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_4
			}
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.232 option russia.232.a"
		name = russia.232.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.232 option russia.232.b"
		name = russia.232.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#The Army Commissars
	id = russia.233
	title = russia.233.t
	desc = russia.233.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.233 option russia.233.a"
		name = russia.233.a		#Keep army command happy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger < 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 4
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_army_commissars_idea
			add_idea = RUS_army_commissars_idea_2
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.233 option russia.233.b"
		name = russia.233.b		#The commissars will have a great deal of latitude
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.135
				days = 90
			}
			#Cracks in the SZRS Military
		}
	}
}

		name = russia.235.a

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_viktor_larionov
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = KR_paramilitary_leader
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.235 option russia.235.b"
		name = russia.235.b
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Rise of the Svobodniks
	id = russia.238
	title = russia.238.t
	desc = russia.238.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		OR = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_popular_anger > 1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_military_anger > 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.238 option russia.238.a"
		name = russia.238.a		#Let them focus on keeping the people 'happy'
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_popular_anger > 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > RUS_military_anger
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.238 option russia.238.b"
		name = russia.238.b		#We need them to monitor our soldiers
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_military_anger > 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > RUS_popular_anger
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}

country_event = {
	#New evidence regarding Chernov assassination
	id = russia.244
	title = russia.244.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_chernov
	desc = russia.244.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.245
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		has_government = national_populist
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger
		has_idea = RUS_popular_anger
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.244 option russia.244.a"
		name = russia.244.a		#It's just talk
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.244 option russia.244.b"
		name = russia.244.b		#Punish those who spread such slander
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_army_commissars
			}
			add_political_power = -30
			army_experience = -5
		}
		else = {
			army_experience = -20
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.244 option russia.244.c"
		name = russia.244.c		#Replace the chief of army
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_anton_denikin_army_chief
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Sheeps and the Fools
	id = russia.246
	title = russia.246.t
	desc = russia.246.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						RUS_pyotr_savitsky = {
							is_second_in_command = yes
						}
						RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
							is_second_in_command = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.247
					days = 1
				}
				#Choosing New Chairman-Minister
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.246 option russia.246.a"
		name = russia.246.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -40
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
		retire_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		retire_character = RUS_pavel_agyeyev
		retire_character = RUS_alisa_berkova
		effect_tooltip = {
			retire_character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = {
				remove_all_country_leader_roles = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.246 option russia.246.b"
		name = russia.246.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -80
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.246 option russia.246.c"
		name = russia.246.c
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_pyotr_savitsky = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		RUS_pavel_agyeyev = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		RUS_alisa_berkova = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		#RUS_ivan_maysky = { kill_character = yes }
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = {
				kill_character = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = {
				remove_all_country_leader_roles = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Choosing New Chairman-Minister
	id = russia.247
	title = russia.247.t
	desc = russia.247.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.247 option russia.247.a"
		name = russia.247.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_karol_vendzyagolsky = {
				is_second_in_command = no
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_karol_vendzyagolsky_sic
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_vendzyagolsky_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_korpus_polski_tt
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_pop_anger_cost = 25
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_POL_cost = 25
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.247 option russia.247.b"
		name = russia.247.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_aleksandr_dikgof_derental = {
				is_second_in_command = no
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_dikgof_derental_sic
		add_political_power = 40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.247 option russia.247.c"
		name = russia.247.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_boris_savinkov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_boris_savinkov_sic
				desc = RUS_boris_savinkov_leader_desc
				traits = {
					RUS_vozhd
				}
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Land Reform Begins
	id = russia.252
	title = russia.252.t
	desc = russia.252.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_italian_farmers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.252 option russia.252.a"
		name = russia.252.a		#Let's keep the impact minimal, if we can
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.253
					days = 180
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.501
					days = 90
				}
				#Caucasus Reaffirms Commitment to Land Reform
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.255
					days = 150
				}
				#Hitch in Reforms
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.252 option russia.252.b"
		name = russia.252.b		#This needs to get done, no matter the reaction
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_land_reform_improve
		add_to_variable = {
			land_reform = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.253
					days = 180
				}
				#Land Reform in Central Asia
				country_event = {
					id = russia.254
					days = 60
				}
				#Farmer Strikes
				country_event = {
					id = russia.501
					days = 90
				}
				#Caucasus Reaffirms Commitment to Land Reform
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.255
					days = 150
				}
				#A Hitch in Reforms
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Land Reform in Central Asia
	id = russia.253

	desc = russia.253.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov_tractor
	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.253 option russia.253.a"
		name = russia.253.a		#Deal harshly with the dissent
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_central_asia_land_reform_harsh
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_land_reform_improve
		add_to_variable = {
			land_reform = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1
		}
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.255
				days = 80
			}
			#Hitch in Reforms
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.253 option russia.253.b"
		name = russia.253.b		#Agree to the tribunal
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger < 6
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.255
				days = 80
			}
			#Hitch in Reforms
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Results of Land Reform
	id = russia.256
	title = russia.256.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_farm1
	desc = {
		text = russia.256.d.minimal
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform < 1
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.256.d.low
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform = 1
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.256.d.moderate
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform = 2
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.256.d.high
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform > 2
			}
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.299
				days = 365
			}
			#Grim Reports from the Countryside
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.256 option russia.256.a"
		name = russia.256.a		#It will have to do
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform = 0
			}
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.256 option russia.256.b"
		name = russia.256.b		#At least the economy will recover
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform = 1
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 2
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.075
		add_political_power = 80
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.256 option russia.256.c"
		name = russia.256.c		#Well done!
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				land_reform = 2
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 3
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 3
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}

			ideology_change_var = 4
		}

		}
		else = {
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			check_variable = {

			}

country_event = {
	#Proposal for Solidarist Government
	id = russia.257
	title = russia.257.t
	desc = russia.257.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_filonenko
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
			is_second_in_command = no
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_OLD_SVOBODNIK_NATPOP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_IDEOCRAT_NATPOP
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.257 option russia.257.a"
		name = russia.257.a
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
						is_hired_as_advisor = yes
					}
				}
				deactivate_advisor = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko_advisor
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_filonenko_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.257 option russia.257.b"
		name = russia.257.b
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.257 option russia.257.c"
		name = russia.257.c
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = -0.05
		retire_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.2
		}
	}
}

						}
					}
				}
			}

		}

	desc = russia.260.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.260 option russia.260.a"
		name = russia.260.a
		add_political_power = -20
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.260
				days = 365
				random_days = 365
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#The Svobodnik Scandal
	id = russia.261
	title = russia.261.t
	desc = russia.261.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vonsyatsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky
		RUS_savinkov = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.261 option russia.261.a"
		name = russia.261.a		#This man is what a Svobodnik should aspire to be!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.261 option russia.261.b"
		name = russia.261.b		#Get rid of him
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		effect_tooltip = {
			retire_character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			#he needs to keep country leader role for puppeting purposes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Our Own Capitalists
	id = russia.262
	title = russia.262.t
	desc = russia.262.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vosnenensky
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.262 option russia.262.a"
		name = russia.262.a		#Nationalise them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.262 option russia.262.b"
		name = russia.262.b		#Force the owners to sell them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.262 option russia.262.c"
		name = russia.262.c		#Leave these alone
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.35
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_ic_cost_low = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_ic_cost_med = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_industry_cost_tt
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.262 option russia.262.e"
		name = russia.262.e		#Just take them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.35
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Ministry of National Culture
	id = russia.264
	title = russia.264.t
	desc = russia.264.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vendzyagolsky
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.264 option russia.264.a"
		name = russia.264.a		#Vendzyagolsky is brilliant already!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_karol_vendzyagolsky
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.264 option russia.264.b"
		name = russia.264.b		#Savitsky's vision is revolutionary.
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.35
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_pyotr_savitsky = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
				slot = second_in_command
				trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_2
			}
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Question of Federalism
	id = russia.266
	title = russia.266.t
	desc = russia.266.d
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.266 option russia.266.a"
		name = russia.266.a		#Ensure SZRS runs every gubernia
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.05
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.266 option russia.266.b"
		name = russia.266.b		#Local autonomy with absolute presidential veto
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.266 option russia.266.c"
		name = russia.266.c		#Start eroding autonomy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.35
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_centralise_federal_system
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_centralisation_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_political_power = 200
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_towards_unitary_state_tt
	}
}

		text = russia.275.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_AST_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.275 option russia.275.a"
		name = russia.275.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 1
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 1
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

	}

		name = russia.280.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	#First Project Completed
	id = russia.281
	title = russia.281.t
	desc = russia.281.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_construction
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.281 option russia.281.a"
		name = russia.281.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.290
				days = 160
			}
			#Izotovite Movement
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#[RUS_GetArmyChief] Expresses Concern
	id = russia.282
	title = russia.282.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	desc = {
		text = russia.282.d.nowar
		trigger = {
			has_war = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.282.d.war
		trigger = {
			has_war = yes
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		check_variable = {
			RUS_voskhod_manpower > 199999
		}
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_military_object_conscript
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.282 option russia.282.a"
		name = russia.282.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_military_upset_conscripts
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Voskhod Strikes
	id = russia.285
	title = russia.285.t
	desc = russia.285.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shortages
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		multiply_variable = {
			RUS_voskhod_manpower = 0.8
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_voskhod_active
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.285 option russia.285.a"
		name = russia.285.a		#This is a necessary price to pay
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 7
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.285 option russia.285.b"
		name = russia.285.b		#Perhaps it's time to end the programme...
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_voskhod_immed_stop
		RUS_disable_voskhod = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.288
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Prisoner Labour
	id = russia.291
	title = russia.291.t
	desc = russia.291.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		has_country_flag = RUS_voskhod_active
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.291 option russia.291.a"
		name = russia.291.a		#Wash away the treason with work
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_manpower = 75000
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.291 option russia.291.b"
		name = russia.291.b		#Some crimes can never be forgiven
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -32000
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#MA Economic Organisation yearly plan
	id = russia.292
	title = russia.292.t
	desc = russia.292.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.292
				days = 365
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_MA_mech_plan
				RUS_MA_navy_plan
				RUS_MA_air_plan
				RUS_MA_infra_plan
			}
			if = {
				#This idea should NEVER trigger on_remove effect if it was not already present, or else you break synthetic refinery rubber production!
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.292 option russia.292.a"
		name = russia.292.a		#Army mechanisation
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_mech_plan
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = {
					MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.293
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.292 option russia.292.b"
		name = russia.292.b		#Contest the seas
		trigger = {
			GER = {
				is_faction_leader = no
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_navy_plan
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = {
					MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.293
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.292 option russia.292.c"
		name = russia.292.c		#Avitation production
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_air_plan
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = {
					MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.293
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.292 option russia.292.e"
		name = russia.292.e		#Infra projects
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_infra_plan
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = {
					MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.293
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.292 option russia.292.f"
		name = russia.292.f		#Resource autarky
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_array = {
					MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.293
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#MA Economic Organisation yearly plan for members
	id = russia.293
	title = russia.293.t
	desc = russia.293.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_MA_mech_plan
				RUS_MA_navy_plan
				RUS_MA_air_plan
				RUS_MA_infra_plan
			}
			if = {
				#This idea should NEVER trigger on_remove effect if it was not already present, or else you break synthetic refinery rubber production!
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.293 option russia.293.a"
		name = russia.293.a		#Accept
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_mech_plan
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_mech_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_navy_plan
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_navy_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_air_plan
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_air_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_infra_plan
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_infra_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.293 option russia.293.b"
		name = russia.293.b		#Opt out
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Loyalty Clause
	id = russia.294
	title = russia.294.t
	desc = russia.294.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_government = national_populist
	}

		name = russia.294.a

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {

			base = 100
			modifier = {

					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai

							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}

country_event = {
	#Grim Reports from the Countryside
	id = russia.299
	title = russia.299.t
	desc = russia.299.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vosnenensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.299 option russia.299.a"
		name = russia.299.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger < 3
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.299 option russia.299.b"
		name = russia.299.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.299 option russia.299.c"
		name = russia.299.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
}

### Post-War Savinkov Events
country_event = {
	#Veering Towards New War
	id = russia.300
	title = russia.300.t
	desc = russia.300.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
			is_second_in_command = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.300 option russia.300.a"
		name = russia.300.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.301
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Paranoia and Conspiracy
	id = russia.301
	title = russia.301.t
	desc = russia.301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_filonenko
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.301 option russia.301.a"
		name = russia.301.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.304
				days = 1
			}
			#Slaying the Shadow of Savinkov
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = {
				RUS_klepikov_conspiracy = 0
			}
			activate_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_denikin
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_berkova
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_gopper
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Conspiracy Unravels
	id = russia.303
	title = russia.303.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time
		}
		text = russia.303.d1
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time
			}
		}
		text = russia.303.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_denikin
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_berkova
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_gopper
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.303 option russia.303.a"
		name = russia.303.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		RUS_mikhail_georgiyevsky = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_karl_gopper
			}
			retire_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		}
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			left_side = RUS_solidarist
			right_side = RUS_ideocrat
			set_value = 0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_authoritarian_democrat = yes
			}
			end_coalition = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_dikgof_derental_sic
		uncomplete_national_focus = {
			focus = RUS_codification_of_regime
			uncomplete_children = yes
		}
	}
}

	#Slaying the Shadow of Savinkov

	desc = russia.304.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse

				decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_denikin
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_berkova
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev
				target = ROOT
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_recruit_gopper
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.304 option russia.304.a"
		name = russia.304.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		RUS_flegont_klepikov = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.305
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
