country_event = {
	#The Palace Coup
	id = russia.305
	title = russia.305.t
	desc = russia.305.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.305 option russia.305.a"
		name = russia.305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					is_second_in_command = no
				}
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_second_in_command = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_character = RUS_karl_gopper
				}
				activate_advisor = RUS_karl_gopper_army_chief
				RUS_karl_gopper = {
					promote_leader = yes
					set_can_be_fired_in_advisor_role = {
						slot = army_chief
						value = no
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = {
						has_advisor_role = army_chief
					}
				}
				activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_army_chief
				RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = {
					promote_leader = yes
					set_can_be_fired_in_advisor_role = {
						slot = army_chief
						value = no
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = {
					add_advisor_role = {
						advisor = {
							slot = army_chief
							idea_token = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_army_chief
							desc = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_high_command_desc
							traits = {
								KR_army_chief_reform_2
							}
							cost = 100
							can_be_fired = no
						}
						activate = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Relaxation of the Economy
	id = russia.306
	title = russia.306.t
	desc = russia.306.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.306 option russia.306.a"
		name = russia.306.a
		add_political_power = 100
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				infrastructure > 3
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_voznesensky
		every_owned_state = {
			RUS_remove_VES_modifier = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.306 option russia.306.b"
		name = russia.306.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_artels_chamber
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_artels_chamber
				add_idea = RUS_artels_chamber_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_artels
				add_idea = RUS_artels_chamber
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_voznesensky
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Fate of Political Prisoners?
	id = russia.307
	title = russia.307.t
	desc = russia.307.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_trial_big
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.307 option russia.307.a"
		name = russia.307.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.05
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.4
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_manpower = 120400
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_state_guard_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_state_guard_2
				add_idea = RUS_state_guard_1
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.307 option russia.307.b"
		name = russia.307.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.05
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.4
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.15
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Robbing of Europe
	id = russia.312
	title = russia.312.t
	desc = russia.312.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.312 option russia.312.a"
		name = russia.312.a
		every_subject_country = {
			limit = {
				is_german_tag = yes
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				is_germany = yes
				arms_factory > 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
			}
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				is_germany = yes
				industrial_complex > 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				is_germany = yes
				industrial_complex > 2
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = {
					building = arms_factory
					size > 2
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = {
					building = industrial_complex
					size > 2
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = {
					building = industrial_complex
					size > 2
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc_aat = yes
			}
			random_military_industrial_organization = {
				add_mio_funds = 750
			}
			random_military_industrial_organization = {
				add_mio_funds = 650
			}
			random_military_industrial_organization = {
				add_mio_funds = 550
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Economy of Dialectical Statism
	id = russia.316
	title = russia.316.t
	desc = russia.316.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.316 option russia.316.a"
		name = russia.316.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 180
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.316 option russia.316.b"
		name = russia.316.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky
				add_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky_2
			}
		}
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
}

# German Economic Influence Events
country_event = {
	#Influence Contested (kickoff event)
	id = russia.400
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy
	title = "[RUS.RUS_GetInfluenceEventTitle]"
	desc = "[RUS.RUS_GetInfluenceEventDesc]"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = RUS
		}
		RUS = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.400 option russia.400.a"
		name = russia.400.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_they_accept_tt
		event_option_tooltip = russia.402.a
		FROM = {
			country_event = russia.401
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.400 option russia.400.b"
		name = russia.400.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_sanction_points < 2
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_sanction_points = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_add_1_sanction_point_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_cap_tt
			add_political_power = 30
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Germans demand compensation
	id = russia.401
	title = russia.401.t
	desc = russia.401.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.401 option russia.401.a"
		name = russia.401.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				NOT = {
					has_idea = partial_economic_mobilisation
					has_idea = war_economy
					amount_taken_ideas = {
						amount > 0
						slots = {
							political_advisor
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						GER.RUS_sanction_points < 2
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_add_1_sanction_point_tt
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_tt
			}
			else = {
				effect_tooltip = {
					add_political_power = 30
				}
			}
			country_event = russia.403			#Russians refuse
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.401 option russia.401.b"
		name = russia.401.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		FROM = {
			country_event = russia.402
		}
		#Russians pay up
	}
}

			tag = GER
		}
		text = russia.404.d2

		}

		}

			decision = RUS_GER_business_withdrawal
			target = RUS

		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_lumber_embargo
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_grain_tariff
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_embargo_russian_energy
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_tariff_wall
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_buy_up_roubles
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_dump_state_bonds
			target = RUS
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_GER_international_sanctions
			target = RUS
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				add_named_threat = {
					threat = 2
					name = RUS_end_vilnius_agreement
				}
			}
		}
	}

			tag = RUS
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_GER_trade_war
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 2
			name = RUS_end_vilnius_agreement
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#German influence removed from Russia
	id = russia.405
	title = russia.405.t
	desc = russia.405.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BUL_crowd
	trigger = {
		has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.405 option russia.405.a"
		name = russia.405.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
				check_variable = {
					RUS_german_economic_influence < 4
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_economic_fallout
				days = 90
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_economic_fallout
				days = 180
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = RUS_german_economic_influence
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				577 = {
					has_resources_rights = {
						receiver = JAP
					}
				}
			}
			JAP = {
				remove_resource_rights = 577
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				232 = {
					has_resources_rights = {
						receiver = GER
					}
				}
			}
			GER = {
				remove_resource_rights = 232
			}
			GER = {
				remove_resource_rights = 961
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				target = 961
				decision = RUS_grozny_oil
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				target = 249
				decision = RUS_romanshkino_oil
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				target = 213
				decision = RUS_arctic_mines
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				target = 233
				decision = RUS_tyrnyauz_tungsten
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_railways_nationalised
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_german_economic_influence_[LEVEL]
			}
			LEVEL = "[?RUS_german_economic_influence]"
		}
	}
}

		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.412 option russia.412.b"
		name = russia.412.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.412 option russia.412.c"
		name = russia.412.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
	}
}

	#Germany Withdraws Business from Russia
	id = russia.413
	title = russia.413.t
	desc = russia.413.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		GER = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.413 option russia.413.a"
		name = russia.413.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_business_flight
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_influence_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
		219 = {
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
			}
		}
		252 = {
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_brain_drain
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_brain_drain
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_brain_drain
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Businesses Re-establish in EE
	id = russia.415
	title = russia.415.t
	desc = russia.415.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.415 option russia.415.a"
		name = russia.415.a
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = UKR
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				UKR_influence_change = 2
			}
			UKR_industrial_score = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.04
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = steel
				amount = 6
				state = 228				#Starobyelsk
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = POL
			}
			add_political_power = 30
			set_temp_variable = {
				POL_influence_change = 1
			}
			POL_add_ruling_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				POL_influence_change = 3
			}
			POL_add_german_influence = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 20
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Embargo for RUS
	id = russia.416
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_lumber_embargo
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.t.lumber
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_grain_tariff
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.t.grain
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_energy_embargo
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.t.energy
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.t.tariff_wall
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_lumber_embargo
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.d.lumber
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_grain_tariff
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.d.grain
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_energy_embargo
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.d.energy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
			}
		}
		text = russia.416.d.tariff_wall
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.416 option russia.416.a"
		name = russia.416.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.416 option russia.416.b"
		name = russia.416.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_popular_anger > 2
					}
					check_variable = {
						RUS_left_anger > 2
					}
					check_variable = {
						RUS_right_anger > 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_black_monday = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.416 option russia.416.c"
		name = russia.416.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Trade war wreaks havoc
	id = russia.420
	title = russia.420.t
	desc = russia.420.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.420 option russia.420.a"
		name = russia.420.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						tag = RUS
					}
					tag = GER
					is_in_faction_with = SER
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_GER_trade_war_2
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_GER_trade_war_1
				days = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}

				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = -0.05

			ideology_change_var = -5
		}

			modifier = {

			}
		}

				limit = {
					OR = {

					}
				}

country_event = {
	#ENT joins sanctions for RUS/GER/ENT
	id = russia.425
	title = russia.425.t
	desc = russia.425.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.425 option russia.425.a"
		name = russia.425.a
		trigger = {
			tag = IMP
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
					}
					modify_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.416
					days = 91
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = IMP
					num_of_owned_factories > 20
					surrender_progress < 0.05
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.420
					days = 60
				}
				#Trade war wreaks havoc
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.425 option russia.425.b"
		name = russia.425.b
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.425 option russia.425.c"
		name = russia.425.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = IMP
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
					}
					modify_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}

		}

			remove_resource_rights = 577
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 1
			name = RUS_sakhalin_threat

		537 = {
			#South Sakhalin
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				province = 1820
				level = 1

			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_hates_govt

		name = russia.426.c

			tag = RUS
		}
		add_political_power = 15
		JAP = {
			remove_resource_rights = 577
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			JAP = {
				country_event = russia.426
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Germany funds opposition/resistance
	id = russia.430
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
		}
		text = russia.430.t.dem
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		text = russia.430.t.resistance
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
		}
		text = russia.430.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = russia.430.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		text = russia.430.d.szrs
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		country_exists = GER
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.430 option russia.430.a"
		name = russia.430.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
				}
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_anger_change = 1
				}
				RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_anger_change = 1
				}
				RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			}
			add_war_support = -0.05
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = RUS_VRBO
					}
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
						add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							RUS_popular_anger = 9
						}
					}
					add_stability = -0.05
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = {
						RUS_anger_change = 1
					}
					RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
			}
			add_war_support = -0.05
		}
	}
}

### Military Related Events ###
country_event = {
	id = russia.440
	title = russia.440.t
	desc = russia.440.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_dlc_aat = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.440 option russia.440.a"		#osoavia
		name = russia.440.a
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_osoavia_organisation = {
				is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes
			}
		}
		mio:RUS_osoavia_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.440 option russia.440.b"		#duks
		name = russia.440.b
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_duks_organisation = {
				is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes
			}
		}
		mio:RUS_duks_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.440 option russia.440.c"		#tsagi
		name = russia.440.c
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_tsagi_organisation = {
				is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes
			}
		}
		mio:RUS_tsagi_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.440 option russia.440.e"		#gamayun
		name = russia.440.e
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {

			}
		}
		mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.440 option russia.440.f"		#skorost
		name = russia.440.f
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_skorost_organisation = {

			}
		}

country_event = {
	#Reorg of Cossack Hosts
	id = russia.441
	title = russia.441.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		text = russia.441.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
		}
		text = russia.441.d.wrangel
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = no
		}
		text = russia.441.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
			has_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2
		}
	}
	option = {
		#More funds to the Hosts!
		name = russia.441.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < -0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value < 0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.441 option russia.441.a"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_krasnov_tt
		add_units_to_division_template = {
			template_name = "Kazachya diviziya"
			regiments = {
				cavalry = 1
				cavalry = 2
			}
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = cavalry_leader
					has_trait = cavalry_officer
				}
			}
			add_logistics = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_rikhter = yes
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts_warning
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_strengthened_cossacks
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_savinkov = yes
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.46
					days = 50
					random_days = 100
				}
				#Ataman Challenges Vozhd
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Fine as they are
		name = russia.441.b
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.441 option russia.441.b"
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_rikhter = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts_warning
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_savinkov = yes
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.46
					days = 50
					random_days = 100
				}
				#Ataman Challenges Vozhd
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Abolished
		name = russia.441.c
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.441 option russia.441.c"
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_path = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_cossack_resistance
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_cossack_resistance
			retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = 5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		RUS_abolish_hosts = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_democracy = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_maklakov = yes
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease2_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 45
			}
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.154
				days = 900
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Ukraine, Belarus, or Baltics?
	id = russia.442
	title = russia.442.t
	desc = {
		text = russia.442.desc1
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					BAT = {
						exists = yes
					}
					EST = {
						exists = no
					}
					LAT = {
						exists = no
					}
				}
				AND = {
					EST = {
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
					LAT = {
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.442.desc2
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						BAT = {
							exists = yes
						}
						EST = {
							exists = no
						}
						LAT = {
							exists = no
						}
					}
					AND = {
						EST = {
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
						LAT = {
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troop_flag
	option = {
		#Ukraine, Vasilevsky suggestion (under patronage of Denikin), Uran operation

		name = russia.442.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia.442.a.tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				UKR = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
				UKR = {
					is_in_faction_with = AUS
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_UKR_bonus
		country_event = {
			id = russia.443
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Belarus, Rodzyanko suggestion (under patronage of Markov), Mars operation

		name = russia.442.b

		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		trigger = {
			BLR = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_BLR_bonus
		country_event = {
			id = russia.443
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Baltics, Shatilov suggestion (under patronage of Wrangel), Venera operation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.442 option russia.442.c"
		name = russia.442.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia.442.c.tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {

						exists = yes
					}

					}

						exists = no
					}

country_event = {
	#Capital Captured, momentum gained
	id = russia.445
	title = russia.445.t
	desc = russia.445.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		#Momentum gained
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.445 option russia.445.a"
		name = russia.445.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
				202 = {
					is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no
				}
				#Kyiv
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_kiev_before
				}
			}

					is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no
				}

				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_minsk_before
				}

country_event = {
	#War Game at Voronezh
	id = russia.446
	title = russia.446.t
	desc = russia.446.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troop_flag
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.446 option russia.446.a"
		name = russia.446.a
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = artillery_officer
					has_trait = artillery_specialist
					has_trait = trait_engineer
				}
			}
			add_attack = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = artillery
			category = rocketry
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 3
			name = russia.446.t
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.446 option russia.446.b"
		name = russia.446.b
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = armor_officer
					has_trait = trait_reckless
					has_trait = panzer_leader
				}
			}
			add_planning = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = armor
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 3
			name = russia.446.t
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.446 option russia.446.c"
		name = russia.446.c
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = cavalry_officer
					has_trait = infantry_officer
				}
			}
			add_logistics = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = motorized_equipment
			category = cat_mechanized_equipment
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 3
			name = russia.446.t
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Sikorsky's Helicopter
	id = russia.447
	title = russia.447.t
	desc = russia.447.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.447 option russia.447.a"
		name = russia.447.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.447 option russia.447.b"
		name = russia.447.b
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc_gtd = yes
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_helicopter
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_air_helicopter
		}
		else = {
			air_experience = 35
		}
	}
}

###################################################
############ GREAT PATRIOTIC WAR ##################
###################################################
### Defense of Moscow ###
country_event = {
	id = russia.450
	title = russia.450.t
	desc = russia.450.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_german_troops
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_war_with = GER
		controls_province = 4380		#Moscow
		219 = {
			any_neighbor_state = {
				NOT = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.450 option russia.450.a"
		name = russia.450.a
		add_command_power = 50
		219 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_battle_for_moscow_modifier
				days = 180
				scope = RUS
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 2
				province = 6380
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_hold_moscow
		set_country_flag = RUS_battle_for_moscow_flag
	}
}

#############################
### North Caucasus Events ###
#############################
country_event = {
	#Riots in Southern Russia
	id = russia.500
	title = russia.500.t
	desc = russia.500.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.505
				days = 250
				random_days = 250
			}
			#Expansion of the 'Wild Battalions'
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.500 option russia.500.a"
		name = russia.500.a		#The Cossacks can handle their own affairs
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			force_enable_resistance = RUS
			start_resistance = yes
			add_resistance = 15
			hidden_effect = {
				add_compliance = 65
			}
		}
		#233, 787, 961
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.500 option russia.500.b"
		name = russia.500.b		#Order the Cossacks to stop - no need to provoke more opposition
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			force_enable_resistance = RUS
			start_resistance = yes
			add_resistance = 15
			hidden_effect = {
				add_compliance = 65
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Flames Spread to Dagestan
	id = russia.504
	title = russia.504.t
	desc = russia.504.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.504 option russia.504.a"
		name = russia.504.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_VRBO
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_3
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Expansion of the 'Wild Battalions'
	id = russia.505
	title = russia.505.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		text = russia.505.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		text = russia.505.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_defend_caucasus
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.505 option russia.505.a"
		name = russia.505.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				region = 135				#North Caucasus
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = -15
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_wild_battalions_expanded
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_pacify_caucasus
			target = 233
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.505 option russia.505.b"
		name = russia.505.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_pacify_caucasus
			target = 233
		}
	}
}

			exists = yes
			is_subject = no

				has_war_with = ROOT
			}
		}

country_event = {
	#The Land Tenure Issue
	id = russia.552
	title = russia.552.t
	desc = russia.552.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.552 option russia.552.a"
		name = russia.552.a		#Side with the cossacks - land tenure must be respected
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_cossack_division_check = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				589
			}
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 2.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 1
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.553
				days = 5
				random_days = 10
			}
			#Alash Party Protests
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.552 option russia.552.b"
		name = russia.552.b		#Economic development requires sacrifice
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger < 4
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 589					#Semirechye
					state = 810					#Alash-kala
					state = 404					#Karaganda
					state = 402					#Turgay
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.555
				days = 5
				random_days = 10
			}
			#Alash Moves to Support Government
		}
	}
}

	#Kazakhs in Crisis
	id = russia.560

	is_triggered_only = yes

	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.560 option russia.560.a"

		ai_chance = {

				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {

				check_variable = {

				}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai

				}
			}
		}

			limit = {

				}
			}

				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}

			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
		}

					id = russia.561
					days = 5
					random_days = 5
				}

			}

						tag = KHI

					days = 15
					random_days = 5

						tag = GEO
					}

				}

					id = russia.570
					days = 20
					random_days = 5
				}
				#The Kazakh Mission
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.560 option russia.560.b"
		name = russia.560.b		#Focus on helping the displaced Kazakhs
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_elected_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_political_power < 0
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 75
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_political_power = -75
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS

					state = 589					#Semirechye
					state = 810					#Alash-kala
					state = 404					#Karaganda
				}
			}
			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes

				}

			}
			#Alash Moves to Support Government
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Kazakhs Fleeing Into Xinjiang
	id = russia.561
	title = russia.561.t
	desc = russia.561.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gathering
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = SIK
			tag = ETS
			tag = KUM
		}
		is_subject = no
		589 = {
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = RUS
		}
		#Semirechye
		617 = {
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
		}
		#Dihua
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.561 option russia.561.a"
		name = russia.561.a		#The Kazakhs are our brother Turks - we will not turn them away
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = SIK
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				tag = ETS
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_manpower = 22000
		add_political_power = -50
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				OR = {
					tag = TRK
					tag = KHI
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_pleased
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.561 option russia.561.b"
		name = russia.561.b		#Keep order, but neither help nor hinder them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Kazakhs Fleeing Into Turkestan
	id = russia.567
	title = russia.567.t
	desc = russia.567.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		589 = {
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = RUS
		}
		is_subject = no
		is_neighbor_of = RUS
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.567 option russia.567.a"
		name = russia.567.a		#Help them, but do not provoke the Russians
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = TRK
			}
		}
		add_manpower = 12500
		add_stability = -0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.567 option russia.567.b"
		name = russia.567.b		#We will aid them regardless of how the Russians feel
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_manpower = 18500
		add_stability = -0.03
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.567 option russia.567.c"
		name = russia.567.c		#If the Kazakhs want arms, give them arms!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_ai = yes
				has_equipment = {
					infantry_equipment > 300
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_manpower = 18500
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_equipment = {
					infantry_equipment > 300
				}
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = -300
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
			country_event = russia.568			#X is Arming Kazakhs?
		}
	}
}

	#The Kazakh Mission
	id = russia.570

	desc = russia.570.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs

		589 = {

		}
		is_subject = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.570 option russia.570.a"

			base = 50

				factor = 1.6
				OR = {
					tag = AFG
					tag = PRF
					tag = AZR
					tag = GEO
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				tag = OTT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.570 option russia.570.b"
		name = russia.570.b		#We are willing to provide covert assistance, for now

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				OR = {
					tag = AFG
					tag = PRF
					tag = AZR
					tag = GEO
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				tag = OTT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				has_country_flag = TRK_has_new_diplomats_flag
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 0.01
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -30
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Rise of Ayukevich
	id = russia.571
	title = russia.571.t
	desc = russia.571.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 589
		has_idea = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.571 option russia.571.a"
		name = russia.571.a		#We must hunt these rebels down! No mercy!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1
		}
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		add_stability = -0.045
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos
				}
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.571 option russia.571.b"
		name = russia.571.b		#Focus on maintaining goodwill with the Alash
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 406					#Guryev
					state = 587					#Mangyshlak
					state = 402					#Turgay
				}
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos
				}
			}
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589					#Semirechye
					state = 810					#Alash-kala
					state = 404					#Karaganda
				}
				NOT = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.571 option russia.571.e"
		name = russia.571.e		#Our attention is required elsewhere
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1
		}
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589					#Semirechye
					state = 810					#Alash-kala
					state = 404					#Karaganda
					state = 406					#Guryev
					state = 587					#Mangyshlak
					state = 402					#Turgay
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos
					}
					has_resistance = yes
				}
				add_resistance = 30
			}
			else = {
				RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### See events in 01 Central Asian Crisis events for actual CA war
country_event = {
	#Fate of Alash Autonomy
	id = russia.575
	title = russia.575.t
	desc = russia.575.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 402						#Turgay
						state = 404						#Karaganda
						state = 587						#Mangyshlak
						state = 590						#Akmolinsk
						state = 810						#Alash-kala
						state = 589						#Semireche
					}
				}
				set_state_flag = alash_state
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.575 option russia.575.a"
		name = russia.575.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_flag = alash_state
			}
			add_compliance = 10
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_CA_modifier
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
				}
			}
			589 = {
				set_state_flag = semirechye_state
				add_compliance = 10
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.575 option russia.575.b"
		name = russia.575.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_alash_hates_this_tt
			add_political_power = -100
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_alash_hates_this2_tt
			add_political_power = -50
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -40
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_flag = alash_state
			}
			clr_state_flag = alash_state
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
				}
			}
			589 = {
				set_state_flag = semirechye_state
				add_compliance = 10
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Federalism in Turkestan
	id = russia.576

	desc = russia.576.d

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.576 option russia.576.a"

			base = 10
		}

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_khiva = yes
					is_bukhara = yes
					is_turkestan = yes
				}
				NOT = {
					state = 418
				}
				#Asgabat
			}
			set_state_flag = turkestan_state

				modifier = RUS_TRK_modifier
			}

		}

			base = 0
		}

			limit = {

					has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state

					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		every_owned_state = {

				OR = {
					is_khiva = yes
					is_bukhara = yes
					is_turkestan = yes
				}
			}
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Central Asia
	id = russia.577
	title = russia.577.t
	desc = russia.577.d
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_muslims
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.577 option russia.577.a"
		name = russia.577.a
		add_political_power = -25
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = RUS
				}
			}
			add_compliance = 8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				RUS_pyotr_savitsky = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_the_steppe
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.577 option russia.577.b"
		name = russia.577.b
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_fondaminsky = no
			RUS_kartashyov = no
			RUS_solonevich = no
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = RUS
				}
			}
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.035
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.577 option russia.577.c"
		name = russia.577.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = RUS
				}
			}
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Reorganisation of Central Asia (SocRus)
	id = russia.578
	title = russia.578.t
	desc = russia.578.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bukhara
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = yes
		TRK = {
			OR = {
				exists = no
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_southern_central_asia = yes
				}
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
			TRK = {
				remove_ideas = {
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_0
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_1
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_2
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_3
				}
			}
			KHI = {
				remove_ideas = {
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_0
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_1
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_2
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_3
					KHI_russia_pivot
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.578 option russia.578.a"
		name = russia.578.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				BUK = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_southern_central_asia = yes
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		release_puppet = KHI
		set_autonomy = {
			target = KHI
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		release_puppet = TRK
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRK
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BUK = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = radical_socialist
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.578 option russia.578.b"
		name = russia.578.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = {
					state = 581					#Uralsk
					state = 583					#Petropavlovsk
					state = 588					#Pavlodar
				}
			}
			remove_claim_by = ROOT
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			transfer_state_to = BUK
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		BUK = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					TRK = {
						exists = yes
					}
				}
				annex_country = {
					target = TRK
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					KHI = {
						exists = yes
					}
				}
				annex_country = {
					target = KHI
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					KAZ = {
						exists = yes
					}
				}
				annex_country = {
					target = KAZ
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_central_asia = yes
					is_claim_or_core_of_PREV = no
				}
				add_claim_by = PREV
			}
			set_capital = {
				state = 407
				remember_old_capital = no
			}
			#Tashkent
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			get_current_government_type = yes
			RUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = PREV
					autonomy_state = union_republic
					end_wars = no
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS
		}
	}
}

# Semyonov Events
country_event = {
	#The Manchurian Curse
	id = russia.600	### Fire in february 1937
	title = russia.600.t
	desc = russia.600.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_aigun
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.601
				days = 150
				random_days = 50
			}
			#Unrest of the Amur-Ussuri Cossacks
			country_event = {
				id = russia.602
				days = 300
				random_days = 50
			}
			#The Circle of St. George
			JAP = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.603
					days = 350
					random_days = 50
				}
			}
			#Kolendo Incident
			country_event = {
				id = russia.606
				days = 450
				random_days = 50
			}
			#The Honghuzi Ataman
			country_event = {
				id = russia.608
				days = 500
				random_days = 50
			}
			#Question of the Far Eastern Military District
			country_event = {
				id = russia.609
				days = 500
				random_days = 50
			}
			#Far Eastern All-Military Union
			country_event = {
				id = russia.610
				days = 450
				random_days = 50
			}
			#Smugglers of the Amur and Ussuri
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.600 option russia.600.a"
		name = russia.600.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_underfunded_vladivostok
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.600 option russia.600.b"
		name = russia.600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				add = -50
				has_political_power < 20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					JAP = {
						is_ai = no
					}
					FNG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		army_experience = 5
		408 = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = coastal_bunker
				province = 957
				level = 3
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				province = 957
				level = 3
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_amur_defence_increase_tt
	}
}

	#The Circle of St. George
	id = russia.602

		name = russia.602.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.602 option russia.602.b"
		name = russia.602.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}
		FER = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_oi_shigemoto
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_political_advisor_role = yes
					remove_high_command_role = yes
					remove_army_chief_role = yes
					remove_navy_chief_role = yes
					demote_to_general = yes
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_circle_of_st_george_in_russia
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_national_populist3_party
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_grigory_semyonov
		RUS_mikhail_diterikhs = {
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_monarchist_officer
			promote_character = {
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist3_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist3_party
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai

						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}

	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.610 option russia.610.b"

			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		657 = {
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		560 = {
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		561 = {
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.610 option russia.610.c"
		name = russia.610.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.611 option russia.611.b"
		name = russia.611.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.04
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Semyonov's Return
	id = russia.615
	title = russia.615.t
	desc = russia.615.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_semyonov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		has_country_flag = RUS_semyonov_uprising
		FER = {
			has_character = RUS_grigory_semyonov
		}
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = JAP
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			FER = {
				FER_setup_far_eastern_army = yes
			}
			FNG = {
				country_event = russia.617
			}
			JAP = {
				country_event = russia.617
			}
			MON = {
				country_event = russia.617
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.615 option russia.615.a"
		name = russia.615.a		#Semyonov is a traitor to Russia!
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.615 option russia.615.b"
		name = russia.615.b		#Semyonov is a goddamn hero
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		FER = {
			change_tag_from = ROOT
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Semyonov's Trial
	id = russia.616
	title = russia.616.t
	desc = russia.616.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.616 option russia.616.a"
		name = russia.616.a		#No Mercy for traitors! Execute them all!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		FER = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				kill_character = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.616 option russia.616.b"
		name = russia.616.b		#Spare those who will repent - imprison Semyonov and the rest
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -55
		FER = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_character = RUS_fyodor_bredov
						is_character = RUS_viktorin_molchanov
						is_character = RUS_nikolay_protopopov
						is_character = RUS_leonid_skipetrov
					}
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

### NatPop Anger Events ###
country_event = {
	#Military Anger 6
	id = russia.910
	title = russia.910.t
	desc = russia.910.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_military_anger > 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.910 option russia.910.a"
		name = russia.910.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_military_anger > 6
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.911
					days = 4
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#Military Anger 7

country_event = {
	#Military Anger 8 - Attempted Coup
	id = russia.912
	title = russia.912.t
	desc = russia.912.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = {
			is_country_leader = yes
		}
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_military_anger > 7
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.912 option russia.912.a"
		name = russia.912.a		#The coup succeeds
		trigger = {
			country_exists = GER
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = GER
				}
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_looming_coup
			days = 10
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.914
			days = 4
			random_days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.912 option russia.912.b"
		name = russia.912.b		#The coup fails
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_military_purges
			days = 180
		}
		set_country_flag = military_anger_8
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_military_anger > 8
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.913
					days = 4
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Military Anger 9
	id = russia.913
	title = russia.913.t
	desc = russia.913.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_military_anger > 8
		}
		has_country_flag = military_anger_8
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.913 option russia.913.a"
		name = russia.913.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_military_purges
			}
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_military_purges
				days = 180
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_military_anger > 9
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.914
					days = 4
					random_days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Military Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia.914
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
		}
		text = russia.914.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		text = russia.914.t2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
		}
		text = russia.914.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		text = russia.914.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_war_with = GER
					NOT = {
						RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
							is_army_chief = yes
						}
					}
				}
				activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.914 option russia.914.a"
		name = russia.914.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_vladimir_nabokov = {
					is_advisor = yes
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				retire_character = RUS_vladimir_nabokov
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_military_restore_republic = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Popular Anger 6
	id = russia.920
	title = russia.920.t
	desc = russia.920.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_popular_anger > 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.920 option russia.920.a"
		name = russia.920.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_VRBO
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				region = 135				#North Caucasus
				has_active_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_popular_anger > 6
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.921
					days = 14
					random_days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

country_event = {
	#Popular Anger 8 - Attempted Uprising
	id = russia.922
	title = russia.922.t
	desc = russia.922.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = {
			is_country_leader = yes
		}
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_popular_anger > 7
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = russia.922.a		#uprising succeeds
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		country_event = russia.924
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.922 option russia.922.b"
		name = russia.922.b		#uprising fails

			base = 0
		}

		if = {

			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_3
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {

					}

					id = russia.923

					random_days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Popular Anger 9
	id = russia.923
	title = russia.923.t
	desc = russia.923.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = {
			RUS_popular_anger > 8
		}
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.923 option russia.923.a"
		name = russia.923.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_popular_anger > 9
					}

					days = 14
					random_days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Popular Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia.924
	title = russia.924.t
	desc = russia.924.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = {
			is_country_leader = yes
		}
		is_subject = no
		date < 1939.1.1
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = GER
						}
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.924 option russia.924.a"
		name = russia.924.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.15
		kill_country_leader = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_post-savinkov_economy			#Replaces Savinkov economic ideas
			RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russia.925
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Socialist Provisional Government
	id = russia.925

	desc = russia.925.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.925 option russia.925.a"
		name = russia.925.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					date < 1937.12.31
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = {
								RUS_military_anger > 4
							}
							AND = {
								is_ai = yes
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = RUS_aftermath
									option = RUS_AFTERMATH_SOCIALIST
								}
							}
						}
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_1
					RUS_vladimir_manstein = {
						unit_leader_event = {
							id = russia.926
							days = 2
						}
						#Manstein's coup attempt
					}
				}
				else = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_2
					var:army_chief = {
						unit_leader_event = {
							id = russia.927
							days = 2
						}
						#Denikin/Wrangel take power
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_3
				var:army_chief = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = russia.927
						days = 2
					}
					#Denikin/Wrangel take power
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
