### Triggered Anger Events ###
country_event = {
	#Anger from casualties
	id = russia.961
	title = russia.961.t
	desc = russia.961.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_war = yes
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
		casualties_k > 1000
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.961 option russia.961.a"
		name = russia.961.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Anger from surrender progress
	id = russia.962
	title = russia.962.t
	desc = russia.962.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border
	trigger = {
		surrender_progress > 0.1
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.962 option russia.961.a"
		name = russia.961.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Reduced anger from winning a war
	id = russia.963
	title = russia.963.t
	desc = russia.963.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.963 option russia.963.a"
		name = russia.963.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Ukraine in Flames
	id = russia.1100
	title = russia.1100.t
	desc = russia.1100.d
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			RUS_USNS_cp_cost = 30
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_USNS_speed = 50
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 3
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		202 = {
			#Kyiv
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
		}
		is_russian_tag = yes
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		is_subject = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1127
				days = 25
			}
			#Belarusian Resistance
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1103
				days = 21
			}

				id = russia.1116
				days = 80
			}
			#The Kharkov Trials
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_rally
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1100 option russia.1100.a"
		name = russia.1100.a
		add_ideas = RUS_UKR_resistance
		792 = {
			#Volhynia, AGAIN
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				UKR = {
					is_monarchy = no
				}
			}
			201 = {
				#Zhitomir
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				UKR = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			199 = {
				#Proskurov
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				UKR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
			192 = {
				#Odessa
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				UKR = {
					has_completed_focus = UKR_partisan_training
				}
			}
			997 = {
				#Polesia
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				202 = {
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = ukraine_state
					}
				}
			}
			#Kyiv
			95 = {
				#Pinsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					OR = {
						tag = POL
						tag = LIT
						tag = GAL
						tag = HUN
					}
				}
			}
			93 = {
				#Brest-Litovsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = ROOT
			decision = RUS_finish_resistance
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				activate_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_counter_insurgency
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_resistance = 50
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

	#Administrative Division of Ukraine

		}
		text = russia.1101.d.unitary
	}

			}
		}

	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_central_rada

			}

			137 = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy
				}
			}

						is_core_of = UKR

						state = 80						#Cernauti
						state = 1088						#Chelm

			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.135
				days = 500
				random_days = 365
			}
			#The Future of Ukraine
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.a"
		name = russia.1101.a		#Ukrainian Autonomy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = UKR
					state = 91					#Lviv
					state = 89					#Stanislviv
					state = 80					#Cernauti
					state = 78					#Bessarabia
					state = 73					#Transcarpathia
					state = 1088					#Chelm
				}
				NOT = {
					state = 137
				}
				#Crimea
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		#weaken USNS
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_USNS_speed = 15
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_reduce
		set_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule
			target = 137
		}
		#Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1102
				days = 20
			}
			#Government of Ukraine
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.b"
		name = russia.1101.b		#Ukrainian and Novorossian Autonomies

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {

					}

				add = 5

			}

				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}

			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}

			RUS.RUS_novorossia = 226.id
		}
		#Ekaterinoslav
		add_to_array = {
			RUS.RUS_novorossia = 197.id
		}
		#Kherson
		add_to_array = {
			RUS.RUS_novorossia = 192.id
		}
		#Odessa
		remove_from_array = {
			RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 226.id
		}
		#Ekaterinoslav
		remove_from_array = {
			RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 197.id
		}

				random_days = 200
			}
		}

					state = 1088					#Chelm
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 40
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule
			target = 137
		}
		#Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1102
				days = 20
			}
			#Government of Ukraine
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1117
				days = 50
			}
			#Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.e"
		name = russia.1101.e		#Annex it all
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_compliance = -40
			add_resistance = 40
			add_resistance_target = {
				amount = 40
				occupier = ROOT
				days = 3650
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			RUS_USNS_speed = 15
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_boost
		set_country_flag = RUS_annexed_UKR
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				#This is in case you already annexed Galicia and got autonomy modifiers there
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = ukraine_state
				}
				clr_state_flag = ukraine_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy
				}
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = -15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1117
				days = 50
			}
			#Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
}

	}

		}
		text = russia.1102.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {

			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
		text = russia.1102.d.solonevich
	}
	desc = {

			NOT = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist

					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
		}

			}
			add_compliance = 3
		}

			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.c"
		name = russia.1102.c		#Classocrats
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_duma_of_best_minds
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}

				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
		}

			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.e"
		name = russia.1102.e		#elections
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no

				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1113
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor

				set_variable = {
					RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.b"
		name = russia.1103.b

			has_character = RUS_boris_shteyfon
		}

				is_core_of = UKR
			}

			add_resistance = -5
		}

		}

		}

				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.c"
		name = russia.1103.c
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_andrey_shkuro
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
			}
		}

			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -3
		}

				has_template = "Kazachya diviziya"
			}

					202
				}

					valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
				}

					division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_democratic_government = no
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}

				ideology_change_var = 4

				}
				multiply_variable = {
					RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = russia.1103.e
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_rodion_malinovsky
			is_monarchy = no

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1113 option russia.1113.e"
		name = russia.1113.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
			}
			add_compliance = 2
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 1825
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#uprising in ukraine
	id = russia.1120
	title = russia.1120.t
	desc = russia.1120.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = INT
		controls_state = 202		#Kyiv
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_UKR_resistance
			has_government = national_populist
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}
		OR = {
			any_owned_state = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				any_neighbor_state = {
					owner = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
					}
				}
			}
			773 = {
				owner = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
			#Constantinople
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1120 option russia.1120.a"
		name = russia.1120.a
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_owned_by = RUS
				OR = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
					}
					resistance > 75
					state = 792					#Volyn
					state = 192					#Odessa
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = RUS
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
					}
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		INT = {
			add_to_faction = UKR
		}
		UKR = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_character = UKR_symon_petliura
						}
					}
					UKR_symon_petliura = {
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
					UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = {
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
					UKR_oleksandr_udovychenko = {
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
					UKR_omelian_volokh = {
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = radical_socialist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk_commander_desc
						ideology = social_democrat_subtype
						traits = {
							KR_respected_war_hero_sic
						}
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = UKR
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_republic
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
				UKR_remove_hetmanate = yes
				set_temp_variable = {
					coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
				}
				add_to_coalition = yes
				set_temp_variable = {
					coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
				}
				add_to_coalition = yes
				activate_advisor = UKR_mykhailo_poloz_sic
				activate_advisor = UKR_oleksandr_hrekiv_army_chief
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = totalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = syndicalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					name = UKR_USNS-L_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-L_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-C_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-C_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				add_ideas = war_economy
				add_ideas = extensive_conscription
				add_war_support = 0.5
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					popularity = 0.4
				}
				add_manpower = 50000
				#add ideas?
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment_1
					amount = 3000
					producer = RUS
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_irregulars = 1
					popup = no
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_militias = 1
					popup = no
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Dyviziia Opolchennia"
					division_names_group = UKR_MIL_01
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 2
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 2
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = {
					792
				}
				limit = {
					valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.7 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = {
					192
				}
				limit = {
					valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_controlled_by = PREV
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Recovered Northwestern Gubernias
	id = russia.1125
	title = russia.1125.t
	desc = russia.1125.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_national_theatre
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1124
				days = 200
			}
			#Delatinisation of Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.a"
		name = russia.1125.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS_cossack_division_check = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				206
			}
			#Minsk
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Diviziya Bulak-Balakhovich\" division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1128
				days = 75
			}
			#Ataman of Belarus
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.b"
		name = russia.1125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1126
				days = 125
			}
			#Elections in Belarusian Automony
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.c"
		name = russia.1125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.075
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			add_compliance = -20
			add_resistance = 40
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Belarusian Resistance
	id = russia.1127
	title = russia.1127.t
	desc = russia.1127.d
	trigger = {
		controls_state = 206
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_partisans
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1127 option russia.1127.a"
		name = russia.1127.a
		194 = {
			#Mozyr
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BLR = {
					has_completed_focus = BLR_Partisan_Warfare
				}
			}
			95 = {
				#Pinsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					var:96.owner = {
						#Vilnius
						has_socialist_government = yes
					}
					BLR = {
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
			}
			204 = {
				#Novogrudok
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				206 = {
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = belarus_state
					}
				}
			}
			#Minsk
			207 = {
				#Braslav
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				activate_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_counter_insurgency
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			add_resistance = 30
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Future of the Baltic Gubernias
	id = russia.1130
	title = russia.1130.t
	desc = russia.1130.d
	trigger = {
		13 = {
			is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
		}
		11 = {
			is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
		}
		842 = {
			is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers
	option = {
		#Pursue autonomy
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1130 option russia.1130.a"
		name = russia.1130.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = EST
			}
			set_state_flag = estonia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_estonia_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						RUS_karl_gopper = {
							is_hired_as_advisor = yes
						}
					}
				}
				add_compliance = 10
			}
			else = {
				add_compliance = 5
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LIT
			}
			set_state_flag = lithuania_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				188 = {
					#Memel
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			188 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				97 = {
					#Bialystok
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			97 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1135
				days = 25
			}
			#Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Pursue full integration
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1130 option russia.1130.b"
		name = russia.1130.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = market_liberal
						NOT = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
							}
						}
					}
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				206 = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				is_core_of = EST
				is_core_of = LIT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1135
				days = 25
			}
			#Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Puppet the Baltic allies?
	id = russia.1131
	title = russia.1131.t
	desc = russia.1131.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#hell yeah hoe
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1131 option russia.1131.a"
		name = russia.1131.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				EST = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			EST = {
				country_event = russia.1132
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LAT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LAT = {
				country_event = russia.1132
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LIT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LIT = {
				country_event = russia.1132
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#nah I'm good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1131 option russia.1131.b"
		name = russia.1131.b
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Puppet the Baltic allies? (Baltic reaction to this)
	id = russia.1132
	title = russia.1132.t
	desc = russia.1132.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Cringe! But I gotta do it!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1132 option russia.1132.a"
		name = russia.1132.a
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
				end_wars = no
			}
			country_event = russia.1133
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_authoritarian_government = yes
						RUS = {
							has_elected_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		#I have a death wish
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1132 option russia.1132.b"
		name = russia.1132.b
		add_war_support = 0.05
		leave_faction = yes
		RUS = {
			country_event = russia.1134
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

country_event = {
	#Forest Brothers in Latvia/Estonia
	id = russia.1135
	title = russia.1135.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			#Latvia only
			owns_state = 842
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 13
			}
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.latvia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			#Estonia only
			owns_state = 13
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 842
			}
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.estonia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			#Estonia and Latvia
			owns_state = 842
			owns_state = 13
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.both
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1135 option russia.1135.a"
		name = russia.1135.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 842
			}
			#Riga
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = LAT
					NOT = {
						state = 842
					}
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					842 = {
						#Riga
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = latvia_state
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				842 = {
					#Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					LAT = {
						OR = {
							has_authoritarian_government = yes
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = LAT
					}
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = EST
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					13 = {
						#Estonia
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = estonia_state
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				13 = {
					#Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					EST = {
						has_authoritarian_government = yes
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = EST
					}
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_generic_rebels
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				activate_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_counter_insurgency
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1136
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Fate of North Caucasus
	id = russia.1150
	title = russia.1150.t
	desc = russia.1150.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier
					}
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier
				}
				force_enable_resistance = {
					occupier = RUS
					clear = yes
				}
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1150.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.a"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = north_caucasus_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy
			}
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy
			}
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
				}
				NOT = {
					787 = {
						has_state_flag = terek_state
					}
				}
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier
				}
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		RUS_autonomy_effect = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1150.b
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.b"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = kabard_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = chechen_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy
			}
			set_state_flag = kabard_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy
			}
			set_state_flag = chechen_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
				}
				NOT = {
					787 = {
						has_state_flag = terek_state
					}
				}
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier
				}
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		#Kalmyk Autonomy is created through decision RUS_caspian_autonomies
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1150.c
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.c"
		add_stability = 0.01
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
				}
				NOT = {
					787 = {
						has_state_flag = terek_state
					}
				}
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier
				}
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Fate of South Caucasus
	id = russia.1152
	title = russia.1152.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		text = russia.1152.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		text = russia.1152.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		is_russian_tag = yes
		OR = {
			owns_state = 231			#Georgia
			owns_state = 230			#Armenia
			owns_state = 229			#Azerbaijan
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1152.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1152 option russia.1152.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = georgian_state
			limit = {
				231 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = georgian_state
					}
				}
			}
			231 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy
				}
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					585 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
					}
				}
				#Batumi
				585 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy
					}
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
			if = {

					1080 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
					}
				}
				#Abkhazia
				1080 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy
					}
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				230 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = armenian_state
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = armenian_state
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ARM
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_armenia_modifier_autonomy
				}
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = armenian_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				229 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = azeri_state
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = azeri_state
			229 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_azerbaijan_modifier_autonomy
				}
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = azeri_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 1001
			}
			#Lazistan
			1001 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy
				}
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1153
				days = 90
			}
			#Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
			if = {
				limit = {
					231 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
						has_state_flag = georgian_state
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = russia.1154
					days = 20
				}
				#Georgian government
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1152.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1152 option russia.1152.b"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -25
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1153
				days = 90
			}
			#Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
	id = russia.1153

	desc = russia.1153.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1153 option russia.1153.a"
		name = russia.1153.a
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_manpower = -55000
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 50
		}
	}

			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_OSKAB_reformed

		}

			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO

		}
		text = russia.1154.d

		controls_state = 231
	}

			NOT = {

			popularity = 0.03

		}
	}
	option = {

		name = russia.1154.e		#elections

			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}

		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {

			}
			add_compliance = 5
		}

		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.02
		}

				id = russia.1155
				days = 180
			}

		}
	}

				}

			}

			}

				popularity = 0.02
			}

					id = russia.1155
					days = 180
				}
				#Elections in Georgia
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.g"
		name = russia.1154.g		#georgian king

			}

					days = 180

					popularity = 0.03
				}
				add_political_power = -35
			}

### DemRus Constituent Assembly and election events
unit_leader_event = {
	# 3rd Constitutional Asssembly
	id = ruselections.1
	title = ruselections.1.t
	desc = ruselections.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.1 option ruselections.1.a"
		name = ruselections.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
			var:country_leader = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.2
					days = 1
				}
				#Opening speech
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_soc_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_socdem_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_soclib_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_marlib_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_soccon_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_mil_var = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_3rd_constitutional_assembly
		activate_mission = RUS_military_pressure_mission
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			activate_mission = RUS_monarchism_mission
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_boldyrev = yes
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2			#temporarily here
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = ruselections.1.tt
	}
}

country_event = {
	# The constitution is accepted
	id = ruselections.4
	title = ruselections.4.t
	desc = ruselections.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.4 option ruselections.4.a"
		name = ruselections.4.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_active_mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					has_country_flag = RUS_restricted_nationalisation_law
				}
				add_days_mission_timeout = {
					mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					days = 90
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_state_secularism_law
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_state_religion_law
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_right_anger = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_soccon_var < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_socdem_var < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_socdem_var < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
		}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_right_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_left_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_mil_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = monrus.1
					days = 2
				}
				#Wrangel announces intention to return to monarchy
			}
		}
		var:army_chief = {
			unit_leader_event = {
				id = ruselections.10
				days = 4
			}
			#Announce elections
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	# The Gunpoint Constitution
	id = ruselections.5
	title = ruselections.5.t
	desc = ruselections.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.5 option ruselections.5.a"
		name = ruselections.5.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_anton_denikin = {
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 3
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.10
					days = 2
				}
				#Elections in 90 days
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.5 option ruselections.5.a"
		name = ruselections.5.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 4
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 4
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.10
					days = 2
				}
				#Elections in 90 days
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = monrus.1
					days = 1
				}
				#Wrangel becomes the imperial regent
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	# Speech of Dmitry Aleksandrovich Romanov
	id = ruselections.6

	desc = ruselections.6.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.6 option ruselections.6.a"
		name = ruselections.6.a
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_maria_marriage
				}
				50 = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	# Elections in 90 days announced by Denikin/Wrangel
	id = ruselections.10
	title = ruselections.10.t
	desc = ruselections.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.10 option ruselections.10.a"
		name = ruselections.10.a
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		set_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_PSR_var = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_kadet_var = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_VPP_var = 1
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_election_timer
		hidden_effect = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 3
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.11
					days = 2
				}
				#Kadet intro
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Kadet intro
	id = ruselections.11
	title = ruselections.11.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = ruselections.11.d.republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = ruselections.11.d.monarchy
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.11 option ruselections.11.a"
		name = ruselections.11.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_kadet_var = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_general_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_kadet_var = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_kadet_var = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
				RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = ruselections.12
						days = 2
					}
					#SR intro
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_vladimir_rikhter = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = ruselections.12
						days = 2
					}
					#SR intro
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#SR intro
	id = ruselections.12
	title = ruselections.12.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = ruselections.12.d.republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = ruselections.12.d.monarchy
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.12 option ruselections.12.a"
		name = ruselections.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_PSR_var = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.13
					days = 2
				}
				#RDP intro
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.12 option ruselections.12.c"
		name = ruselections.12.c
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_psr_leader_fondaminsky
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.13
					days = 2
				}
				#RDP intro
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#RDP intro
	id = ruselections.13
	title = ruselections.13.t
	desc = ruselections.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.13 option ruselections.13.a"
		name = ruselections.13.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_RDP_var = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_RDP_var = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_RDP_var = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_RDP_var = -1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = ruselections.14
					days = 2
				}
				#VPP intro
			}
		}
	}
}

			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_general_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_VPP_var = 1
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP

			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_VPP

				RUS_VPP_var = -1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.15
				days = 2
			}
			#Choose your side
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Choosing your POV
	id = ruselections.15
	title = ruselections.15.t
	desc = ruselections.15.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		#Kadets
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.15 option ruselections.15.a"
		name = ruselections.15.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadet_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.16
				days = 5
			}
			#Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
	option = {
		#SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.15 option ruselections.15.b"
		name = ruselections.15.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.16
				days = 5
			}
			#Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
	option = {
		#VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.15 option ruselections.15.c"
		name = ruselections.15.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.16
				days = 5
			}
			#Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
	option = {
		#RDP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.15 option ruselections.15.e"
		name = ruselections.15.e
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.16
				days = 5
			}
			#Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Cooperation with communists?
	id = ruselections.16
	title = ruselections.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
		}
		text = ruselections.16.d.communist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
			}
		}
		text = ruselections.16.d.ban
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.16 option ruselections.16.a"
		name = ruselections.16.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability < 0.49
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.19
				days = 5
			}
			#Protests against military
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
				RUS_boldyrev = no
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_radical_RDP_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_vladimir_levitsky = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = ruselections.17
						days = 5
					}
					#Titov ousted
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = ruselections.18
						days = 5
					}
					#Titov stays
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.16 option ruselections.16.b"
		name = ruselections.16.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability > 0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				}
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = {
						id = ruselections.18
						days = 5
					}
					#Titov stays
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = ruselections.19
					days = 5
				}
				#Protests against military
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Titov ousted
	id = ruselections.17
	title = ruselections.17.t
	desc = ruselections.17.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.17 option ruselections.17.a"
		name = ruselections.17.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_titov
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_leader_desc
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = -1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.19
				days = 5
			}
			#Protests against military
		}
	}
}

	#Titov stays

	desc = ruselections.18.d

		}

			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}

		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.19
				days = 5
			}
			#Protests against military
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Protests against military
	id = ruselections.19
	title = ruselections.19.t
	desc = ruselections.19.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		#Disperse protests
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.19 option ruselections.19.a"
		name = ruselections.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.20
				days = 5
			}
		}
		#Socialists harassed
	}
	option = {
		#Let them protest
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.19 option ruselections.19.b"
		name = ruselections.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.20
				days = 5
			}
		}
		#Socialists harassed
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Socialists harassed
	id = ruselections.20
	title = ruselections.20.t
	desc = ruselections.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		#Hinder their campaign every mean available
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.a"
		name = ruselections.20.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.21
				days = 4
			}
		}
		#Corruption
	}
	option = {
		#Just try to keep the peace
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.b"
		name = ruselections.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			add_political_power = -20
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.21
				days = 4
			}
		}
		#Corruption
	}
	option = {
		#Fight fire with fire!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.c"
		name = ruselections.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.21
				days = 4
			}
		}
		#Corruption
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Restrictions on Major Donors
	id = ruselections.21
	title = ruselections.21.t
	desc = ruselections.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.21 option ruselections.21.a"
		name = ruselections.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_kadet_var = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_PSR_var = 1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_pov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_VPP_var = 1
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_pay_back_backers
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.22
				days = 4
			}
			#Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.21 option ruselections.21.b"
		name = ruselections.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.22
				days = 4
			}
			#Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
}

	#Kadets and the Right

					days = 4
				}

	desc = ruselections.26.d

	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	immediate = {
		clr_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
	}
	option = {

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}

	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}

				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_kadet
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_kadet_var = -1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}

		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_RDP_var = 1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.28 option ruselections.28.c"
		name = ruselections.28.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_right_anger = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Duma election results
	id = ruselections.30
	title = ruselections.30.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.soccon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.soclib
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.socdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.marlib
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_election_timer
			complete_national_focus = RUS_elections
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.120
				days = 150
				random_days = 50
			}
			#General reveals the war plan
			news_event = {
				id = rusnews.5
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.a"
		name = ruselections.30.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			country_event = ruselections.31			#Sulimov forms his government
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			country_event = ruselections.32			#Titov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_socdems
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.b"
		name = ruselections.30.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
				unit_leader_event = ruselections.38
			}
			#Tsar appoints SR PM
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			country_event = ruselections.34			#Rikhter forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soclibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.c"
		name = ruselections.30.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			country_event = ruselections.39			#Tsar appoints Kadet PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = ruselections.35			#Maklakov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.e"
		name = ruselections.30.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			country_event = ruselections.40			#Tsar appoints VPP PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = ruselections.36			#Solonevich forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Titov Sworn in
	id = ruselections.32
	title = ruselections.32.t
	desc = ruselections.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_titov
	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.50
				days = 60
			}
			#Emboldened Labour Movement
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.32 option ruselections.32.a"
		name = ruselections.32.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				var = RUS_PSR_var
				value = RUS_kadet_var
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_rikhter_advisor
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_increase_farmer_subsidies
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_increase_wages
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.32 option ruselections.32.b"
		name = ruselections.32.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				var = RUS_kadet_var
				value = RUS_PSR_var
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_kadet_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_subsidy_private_enterprise
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_increase_wages
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Maklakov Sworn in
	id = ruselections.35
	title = ruselections.35.t
	desc = ruselections.35.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov
	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_variable = {
			RUS_apathy_var = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia.10006
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.177
				days = 90
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
		# Leader-choosing event for AI
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.a"
		name = ruselections.35.a
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		country_event = {
			id = demrus.60
			days = 3
		}
		#Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_maklakov_resign
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.b"
		name = ruselections.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		country_event = {
			id = demrus.60
			days = 3
		}
		#Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_maklakov_resign
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.c"
		name = ruselections.35.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		country_event = {
			id = demrus.60
			days = 3
		}
		#Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation
				target = ROOT
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_maklakov_resign
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

				factor = 0

						rule = RUS_path

					}

				NOT = {

			}
		}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.40 option ruselections.40.c"
		name = ruselections.40.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_ivan_solonevich_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		### Starts Solonevich monarchy path
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.71
				days = 30
			}
			#Ascension of the People's Monarchists
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.90
				days = 100
				random_days = 160
			}
			#Solonevich Attacked
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#President's agenda
	id = ruselections.50
	title = ruselections.50.t
	desc = ruselections.50.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		NOT = {
			var:country_leader = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_sulimov = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off
		var:country_leader = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = yes
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_3_off

		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"

		trigger = {
			RUS_rikhter = yes
		}

		var:country_leader = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_maklakov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_1_off
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_3_off
		var:country_leader = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_kartashyov = yes
		}
		#Array for checking tags for quest 1
		add_to_array = {
			array = RUS_kartashyov_targets
			value = BLR
		}
		add_to_array = {
			array = RUS_kartashyov_targets
			value = UKR
		}

		}

		}

			array = RUS_kartashyov_targets
			value = GRE
		}

		name = ruselections.50.a

			RUS_golitsyn = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
