country_event = {
	#Future elections for republic
	id = ruselections.51
	title = ruselections.51.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = {
				is_country_leader = no
			}
		}
		text = ruselections.51.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = {
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		text = ruselections.51.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
		}
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 30
			}
			#President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat
						is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
						is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = demrus.173
					days = 30
				}
				# Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.a"
		name = ruselections.51.a		#Titov wins
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_titov = yes
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_titov = no
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.b"
		name = ruselections.51.b		#Rikhter re-elected
		trigger = {
			RUS_rikhter = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_martyanov_sic
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.e"
		name = ruselections.51.e		#Sorokin elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
			}
			OR = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				RUS_maklakov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_pitirim_sorokin = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_konstantin_takhtarev_sic
		}
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.f"
		name = ruselections.51.f		#Fondaminsky elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				RUS_fondaminsky = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_zenzinov_sic
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.g"
		name = ruselections.51.g		#Kartashyov elected
		trigger = {
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
			RUS_maklakov = no
			RUS_solonevich = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_anton_kartashyov = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.h"
		name = ruselections.51.h		#Nekrasov elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					RUS_rikhter = no
				}
				RUS_maklakov = yes
				RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_ideology = market_liberal_subtype
				}
				promote_character = market_liberal_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic_desc
						ideology = market_liberal_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.i"
		name = ruselections.51.i		#Solonevich re-elected
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					social_conservative > 0.4
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_re-elected
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_suvorin_sic
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.j"
		name = ruselections.51.j		#Golitsyn elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				RUS_kartashyov = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 4
					has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
					has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
					has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
					has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_restore_VPP = yes
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.k"
		name = ruselections.51.k		#Dmitry Romanov elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_conservative
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_dmitry_romanov
				}
				NOT = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
		}
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_ideology = social_conservative_subtype
				}
				promote_character = social_conservative_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_dmitry_romanov_leader_desc
						ideology = social_conservative_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_restore_VPP = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Future elections for empire
	id = ruselections.52
	title = ruselections.52.t
	desc = ruselections.52.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
		}
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
				}
				country_event = {
					id = demrus.173
					days = 30
				}
				# Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.52 option ruselections.52.a"
		name = ruselections.52.a		#Fondaminsky re-elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_liberal
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {

					}

					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}

			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.1
		}

			coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change
			days = 1
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky_sic
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.52 option ruselections.52.b"
		name = ruselections.52.b		#Left-Kadet

			NOT = {

			}

country_event = {
	#The Red Regiments Strike
	id = ruselections.53
	title = ruselections.53.t
	desc = ruselections.53.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.53 option ruselections.53.a"
		name = ruselections.53.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_liberal
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = market_liberal
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_conservative
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
	}
}

### Democratic Russia Events ###
country_event = {
	#Small White Terror
	id = demrus.1
	title = demrus.1.t
	desc = demrus.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		RUS_boldyrev = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.1 option demrus.1.a"
		name = demrus.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_temp_left_anger = 1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.1 option demrus.1.b"
		name = demrus.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.03
		}
	}
}

	}

		name = demrus.18.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Crimes of the Past (fired by focus)
	id = demrus.19
	title = demrus.19.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		}
		text = demrus.19.d.socialist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
		}
		text = demrus.19.d.szrs
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.19 option demrus.19.a"
		name = demrus.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger < 3
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger < 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger < 3
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger < 3
				}
			}
		}
		army_experience = -40
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.19 option demrus.19.b"
		name = demrus.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		army_experience = -20
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Trial Revelations
	id = demrus.20
	title = demrus.20.t
	desc = demrus.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.a"
		name = demrus.20.a		#It belongs to the state, now
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 80
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.b"
		name = demrus.20.b		#Return it to those who have proven loyal
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.c"
		name = demrus.20.c		#Return all of it, no questions asked
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 7
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

			}

		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.21 option demrus.21.a"

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50

			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.21 option demrus.21.b"
		name = demrus.21.b		#Mechanisation
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 6
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 260
					state = 265
					state = 239
					state = 401
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
}

	#Boldyrev wishes to return #

	title = demrus.22.t
	desc = demrus.22.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_sulimov = no
		NOT = {
			has_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.22 option demrus.22.a"
		name = demrus.22.a		#Boldyrev returns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		RSA = {
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_republican_officer
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
			advisor = {
				slot = air_chief
				idea_token = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_air_chief
				desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_army_chief_desc
				traits = {
					KR_air_chief_ground_support_1
				}
				cost = 75
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.105
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.22 option demrus.22.b"
		name = demrus.22.b		#Meh
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Old Guard Generals fired by decision RUS_sideline_monarchists
	id = demrus.24
	title = demrus.24.t
	desc = demrus.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.a"
		name = demrus.24.a		#They've been professional thus far!
		trigger = {
			RUS_rikhter = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 6
				}
			}
		}
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = {
						MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = {
							is_character = PREV.PREV
						}
					}
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.b"
		name = demrus.24.b		#Here's a nice office job in Siberia
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 6
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.04
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = {
						MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = {
							is_character = PREV.PREV
						}
					}
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					is_character = RUS_pavel_shatilov
				}
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_sidelined
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.c"
		name = demrus.24.c		#Pressure them to retire
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 6
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 6
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					is_character = RUS_pavel_shatilov
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = {
						MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = {
							is_character = PREV.PREV
						}
					}
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 90
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republican_purge_tt
	}
}

		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_aleksandr_kamenka_advisor
		set_country_flag = RUS_business_deal
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.28 option demrus.28.b"
		name = demrus.28.b		#People like you are the scum of Russia
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 6
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

		}

			base = 0

				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}

				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}

		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.04
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = demrus.30.c		#Keep critical companies nationalised, privatise the rest.
		trigger = {
			OR = {

			}
		}

			base = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -40

			RUS_ic_cost_low = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_ic_cost_med = 10
		}

		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Remove Denikin
	id = demrus.31
	title = demrus.31.t
	desc = demrus.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_anton_denikin = {
			is_army_chief = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.31 option demrus.31.a"
		name = demrus.31.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_unit_leader = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = {
						has_advisor_role = army_chief
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_anton_denikin
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_sergey_markov
					}
				}
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = {
						has_advisor_role = army_chief
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_anton_denikin
					}
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_sergey_markov
					}
				}
				add_advisor_role = {
					activate = yes
					advisor = {
						slot = army_chief
						traits = {
							KR_army_chief_offensive_3
						}
						cost = 200
						can_be_fired = no
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
						}
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_sergey_markov
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
						}
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								desc = RUS_sergey_markov_leader_desc
								ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.37
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Denikin retires
	id = demrus.32
	title = demrus.32.t
	desc = demrus.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_anton_denikin
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.32 option demrus.32.a"
		name = demrus.32.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_sergey_markov = {
						NOT = {
							has_advisor_role = army_chief
						}
					}
				}
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					add_advisor_role = {
						activate = yes
						advisor = {
							slot = army_chief
							idea_token = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
							traits = {
								KR_army_chief_manoeuvre_3
							}
							cost = 200
							can_be_fired = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
	}
}

#SR Events
country_event = {
	#Boris Viktorovich Sends His Regards
	id = demrus.40
	title = demrus.40.t
	desc = demrus.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rikhter
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_rikhter = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.40 option demrus.40.a"
		name = demrus.40.a
		kill_country_leader = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -4
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sorokin_csc
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_pitirim_sorokin
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = demrus.48
					days = 180
				}
				#Program of Integralism
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = demrus.49
					days = 180
				}
				#Towards True Narodism
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = demrus.44
			days = 7
		}
		#[ROOT.GetLeader]'s Government
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

	#Control of the State Council

	desc = demrus.41.d

			base = 100

				factor = 0

	option = {

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = demrus.41.b.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_sorokin_csc

country_event = {
	#The Republican Guard
	id = demrus.42
	title = demrus.42.t
	desc = demrus.42.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = social_liberal
		RUS_boldyrev = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.42 option demrus.42.a"
		name = demrus.42.a		#Well spoken
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_republican_guard_2
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_republican_guard
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republican_guard_upgrade
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.42 option demrus.42.b"
		name = demrus.42.b		#Better not annoy the military
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Fate of ex-Svobodniks
	id = demrus.43
	title = demrus.43.t
	desc = demrus.43.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Savinkov_rally
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = social_liberal
			is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.43 option demrus.43.a"
		name = demrus.43.a		#No mercy
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_rikhter = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.43 option demrus.43.b"
		name = demrus.43.b		#Not everyone was as brave as Vladimir Nikolayevich
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_rikhter = yes
			}
			add_political_power = 60
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 30
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

	#[ROOT.GetLeader]'s Government
	id = demrus.44
	title = demrus.44.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_fondaminsky = yes
		}
		text = demrus.44.d.fondaminsky
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_sorokin = yes
		}
		text = demrus.44.d.sorokin
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_government = social_liberal
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 30
			}
			#President's agenda
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.a"
		name = demrus.44.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_sorokin = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_konstantin_takhtarev_sic

		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.b"
		name = demrus.44.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_fondaminsky = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_zenzinov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.c"
		name = demrus.44.c
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
		}

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#The Moderate Revolution
	id = demrus.46
	title = demrus.46.t
	desc = demrus.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = social_liberal
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.46 option demrus.46.a"
		name = demrus.46.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_republican_guard
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republican_guard
				add_idea = RUS_republican_guard_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea
				add_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		}
	}
}

			popularity = 0.05

country_event = {
	#Revolt of the Left
	id = demrus.51
	title = demrus.51.t
	desc = demrus.51.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	trigger = {
		has_government = social_democrat
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = {
				rule = RUS_path
				option = DEFAULT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.51 option demrus.51.a"
		name = demrus.51.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_gergard_zeller = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Maklakov Resigns
	id = demrus.61
	title = demrus.61.t
	desc = demrus.61.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_maklakov = yes
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_free_fair_russia
				uncomplete_children = no
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_progressive_literature_clubs
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_democratic_education
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 14
			}
			#President's agenda
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.61 option demrus.61.a"
		name = demrus.61.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_anton_kartashyov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = {
					coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat
				}
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.59
				days = 300
			}
			#The President of Holy Rus'
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.61 option demrus.61.a"
		name = demrus.61.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc
		}
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = {
					coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat
				}
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.58
				days = 300
			}
			#Old Man of the Kadets
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Critique from the Party
	id = demrus.62
	title = demrus.62.t
	desc = demrus.62.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kartashev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.62 option demrus.62.a"
		name = demrus.62.a
		add_political_power = 40
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.62 option demrus.62.b"
		name = demrus.62.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Solving Strikes
	id = demrus.63
	title = demrus.63.t
	desc = demrus.63.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = market_liberal
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.a"
		name = demrus.63.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power < -50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.b"
		name = demrus.63.b
		add_stability = 0.02
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = -0.06
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.c"
		name = demrus.63.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_VSTPF
				has_completed_focus = RUS_new_russian_capitalism
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				RUS_kartashyov = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = no
			}
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_labour_negotiations
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt2
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_state_economic_committee_5
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Law on Russian Freedoms
	id = demrus.64
	title = demrus.64.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_maklakov = yes
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.rep
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_dolgorukov = yes
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.rep2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.nekrasov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				RUS_anton_kartashyov = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.gronsky
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_maklakov = yes
			RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			AND = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.a"
		name = demrus.64.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = {
						RUS_apathy_var < 1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					check_variable = {
						RUS_apathy_var < 3
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					check_variable = {
						RUS_apathy_var < 5
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					social_liberal > 0.15
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					social_democrat > 0.15
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					market_liberal > 0.15
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 1
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_kirill_romanov
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 3
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_vladimir_romanov
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					RUS_vladimir_rikhter = {
						is_hired_as_advisor = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 2
					RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
						is_hired_as_advisor = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = demrus.67				#'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					add = RUS_apathy_var
					has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = {
						RUS_apathy_var > 9
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = RUS_right_anger
					has_idea = RUS_right_anger
				}
				modifier = {
					add = RUS_military_anger
					has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes
				}
				country_event = demrus.68				#'Law on Russian Freedoms' Is Killed in the Duma!
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.b"
		name = demrus.64.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		country_event = demrus.69		#Watered Down 'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!

			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.c"
		name = demrus.64.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}

			RUS_maklakov = yes
		}

		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {

		name = demrus.64.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		trigger = {

			}

				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = demrus.64.f

			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {

					is_second_in_command = yes

country_event = {
	#Collapse of the Coalition
	id = demrus.65
	title = demrus.65.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes
		}
		text = demrus.65.d.psr
	}
	desc = {

			is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
		}
		text = demrus.65.d.rdp
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes
		}
		text = demrus.65.d.kadet
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes
		}
		text = demrus.65.d.vpp
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes

		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = {
				rule = RUS_path
				option = DEFAULT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.a"
		name = demrus.65.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 2
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.b"
		name = demrus.65.b		#Offer deal to VPP
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = no
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.c"
		name = demrus.65.c		#Offer deal to SRs
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			add_political_power = -150
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.e"
		name = demrus.65.e		#Offer deal to RDP
		trigger = {
			NOT = {

			}
			is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = no

			base = 20
		}

			}

		}

		}

		}

			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {

		}

			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}

country_event = {
	#Relationship with SOR
	id = demrus.72
	title = demrus.72.t
	desc = demrus.72.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = social_conservative
	}
	option = {
		name = demrus.72.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.72 option demrus.72.a"
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = -1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = RUS_pop_increase
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long_tt
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.72 option demrus.72.b"
		name = demrus.72.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Stabs-Captains Against Communism!
	id = demrus.73
	title = demrus.73.t
	desc = demrus.73.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.74
				days = 50
				random_days = 50
			}
			#President's Paramilitary?
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.a"
		name = demrus.73.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = no
			RUS_maklakov = no
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_SVR_activity
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.b"
		name = demrus.73.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.c"
		name = demrus.73.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.e"
		name = demrus.73.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			has_conservative_government = no
			NOT = {
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = 0.06
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
	}
}

### Anger Events
country_event = {
	#Rightwing Exploiting Anger
	id = demrus.100
	title = demrus.100.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4
	desc = demrus.100.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.a"
		name = demrus.100.a		#We will work with the opposition to make this better
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 7
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 7
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > RUS_military_anger
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.b"
		name = demrus.100.b		#Try to appease these groups as best we can
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.075
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.c"
		name = demrus.100.c		#And make the opposition look better? Nonsense!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger < RUS_military_anger
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Role of the Military
	id = demrus.101
	title = demrus.101.t
	desc = demrus.101.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army4
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.a"
		name = demrus.101.a		#We'll make them an integral part of the process
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.b"
		name = demrus.101.b		#They can have an advisory role only
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.c"
		name = demrus.101.c		#The military is supposed to be apolitical
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Generals' Letter
	id = demrus.102
	title = demrus.102.t
	desc = demrus.102.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troops
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		RUS_anton_denikin = {
			is_army_chief = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.102 option demrus.102.a"
		name = demrus.102.a		#Shut up, will you?
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.102 option demrus.102.b"
		name = demrus.102.b		#Divert them extra funds...
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = -30
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_extra_army_funding
				}
			}
			activate_decision = RUS_army_extra_funding
		}
		else = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military
			activate_decision = RUS_army_extra_funding
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Coup in the Kremlin
	id = demrus.103
	title = demrus.103.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup
		}
		text = demrus.103.d.prewar
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup
			}
		}
		text = demrus.103.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_moscow
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		has_democratic_government = yes
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_golitsyn = no
		is_ai = no
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_anton_denikin = {
						is_army_chief = yes
					}
				}
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					promote_character = {
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
						promote_character = {
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
					}
					else = {
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								desc = RUS_sergey_markov_leader_desc
								ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
							promote_leader = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -9
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -5
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -3
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_ideological_officer_curriculum
					target = ROOT
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_promote_young_blood
					target = ROOT
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_sideline_monarchists
					target = ROOT
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = {
					decision = RUS_remove_denikin
					target = ROOT
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.103 option demrus.103.a"
		name = demrus.103.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		if = {
			limit = {
				syndicalist > 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = -0.2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.104
				days = 7
			}
			#Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
			RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off
					}
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off
						ideology = social_democrat_subtype
					}
					clr_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
	id = demrus.104
	title = demrus.104.t
	desc = demrus.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 14
			}
			#President's agenda
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_narodovolets_idea
				RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
				RUS_republican_guard
				RUS_republican_guard_2
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea_2
				RUS_republican_constitutional_clubs_idea
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_2
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_3
				RUS_deadlocked_duma
				RUS_win_back_peasants_idea
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
				RUS_fighting_democracy_campaign
				RUS_russian_civil_society_1
				RUS_russian_civil_society_2
				RUS_russian_civil_society_3
				RUS_russian_civil_society_4
				RUS_democratic_artels
				RUS_vsodes
				RUS_vsodes_2
				RUS_civil_militia
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2
				RUS_labour_peace
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
				RUS_establishment_opposition
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.104 option demrus.104.a"
		name = demrus.104.a
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch
				add_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch_2
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		if = {
			limit = {
				threat > 0.75
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = GER
				}
			}
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
	}
}

		}

			popularity = 0.05
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {

			effect_tooltip = {

					ideology = national_populist

					name = RUS_national_populist2_party

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {

					}
				}
			}
		}

			}
		}
	}

			base = 50

				check_variable = {

			}

				factor = 0

					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}

				has_government = social_conservative
			}

				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.106 option demrus.106.c"

			base = 50

				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}

			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}

		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes

			limit = {

country_event = {
	#The Patriots March
	id = demrus.108
	title = demrus.108.t
	desc = demrus.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_right_anger
		has_elected_government = yes
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.a"
		name = demrus.108.a		#Keep the order
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_expand_okhrana
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 25
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_okhrana_expanded_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_titov = no
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 50
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 70
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.b"
		name = demrus.108.b		#Dismiss left-wing ministers
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_sergey_melgunov = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_nikolay_oganovsky = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_vladimir_karelin = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_aleksandr_finn_yenotayevsky = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
			RUS_gergard_zeller = {
				remove_political_advisor_role = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_social_democrats
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
			}
			country_event = demrus.65			#Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.c"
		name = demrus.108.c		#Pass stricter anti-socialist laws
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
			}
			country_event = demrus.65			#Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
}

	#Socialists Demand Unbanning
	id = demrus.110
	title = demrus.110.t
	desc = demrus.110.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {

		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
		}
	}

		name = demrus.110.a		#All right, we'll let them back for now

			has_authoritarian_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 7
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.110 option demrus.110.b"
		name = demrus.110.b		#We will not budge on this
		trigger = {
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 7
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
	}
}

	#Revolutionary Pamphlets Spread
	id = demrus.111

		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.111 option demrus.111.a"
		name = demrus.111.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
			}
			add_stability = -0.025
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.03
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Major Strikes Called
	id = demrus.112
	title = demrus.112.t
	desc = demrus.112.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.112 option demrus.112.a"
		name = demrus.112.a		#Let them rot
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 6
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 60
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.112 option demrus.112.b"
		name = demrus.112.b		#Try to negotiate with the strikers
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
					is_country_leader = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.112 option demrus.112.c"
		name = demrus.112.c		#Force is the only thing the communists understand
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 6
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_manpower = -750
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.025
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
			}
			country_event = demrus.65			#Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
}
