		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#At the Precipe of a Revolution
	id = demrus.115
	title = demrus.115.t
	desc = demrus.115.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		RUS_sulimov = no
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.115 option demrus.115.a"
		name = demrus.115.a		#Give in and appoint a more left-wing government
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_aftermath
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
			election_frequency = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_levitsky_sic
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.06
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_titov_sic
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.06
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
				country_event = {
					id = monrus.70
					days = 1
				}
				#Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = demrus.103
					days = 1
				}
				#Coup in the Kremlin
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.115 option demrus.115.b"
		name = demrus.115.b		#Not on my watch
		add_stability = -0.12
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -9
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -5
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -2
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Shatilov Report
	id = demrus.122
	title = demrus.122.t
	desc = demrus.122.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shatilov
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		date > 1939.5.1
		threat > 0.7
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_global_flag = second_weltkrieg_has_started
			has_completed_focus = RUS_preemptive_war
			has_completed_focus = RUS_triumphant_russian_nation
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.122 option demrus.122.a"
		name = demrus.122.a
		add_war_support = 0.04
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 2
			name = demrus.122.t
		}
		GER = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = ROOT
				civilian_intel = 1
				army_intel = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.123
				days = 30
			}
			#Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.122 option demrus.122.b"
		name = demrus.122.b
		add_stability = 0.01
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.123
				days = 30
			}
			#Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
		}
	}
}

### Demrus post-war events
country_event = {
	#Russian puppet regimes in Europe get elections
	id = demrus.151
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ally_with = FROM
	}
	immediate = {
		country_event = {
			id = demrus.151
			days = 1460
		}
	}
	option = {
		#PatAut
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 1"
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition
			}
			NOT = {
				tag = POL
			}
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		#AuthDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 2"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = POL
			}
			OR = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_first_party_of_russia
				}
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_european_policeman
				}
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				FROM = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		#SocCon
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 3"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#MarLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 4"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				tag = POL
			}
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#SocLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 5"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#SocDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 6"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}

country_event = {
	#civil war, healed
	id = demrus.160
	title = demrus.160.t
	desc = demrus.160.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_happy_crowd
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.160 option demrus.160.a"
		name = demrus.160.a
		add_war_support = -0.15
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_strong_democracy
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_strong_democracy
				add_idea = RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#retvrn
	id = demrus.164
	title = demrus.164.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_intro
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
		}
		text = demrus.164.d.solonevich_republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
		text = demrus.164.d.peoples_monarchy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_authdems
		}
		text = demrus.164.d.SOR
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.164 option demrus.164.a"
		name = demrus.164.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD
					}
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@social_conservative
			}
			divide_temp_variable = {
				RUS_pop_increase = 2
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = RUS_pop_increase
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				multiply_temp_variable = {
					RUS_pop_increase = -1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = RUS_pop_increase
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Dvinsk Referendum
	id = demrus.166
	title = demrus.166.t
	desc = demrus.166.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		LAT = {
			exists = yes
			is_subject_of = RUS
		}
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_government = market_liberal
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			owns_state = 880			#Latgale
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.166 option demrus.166.a"
		name = demrus.166.a
		add_political_power = 75
		add_stability = 0.02
		880 = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = dvinsk_state
				}
				clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = LAT
			remove_core_of = ROOT
		}
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_returned_land
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.166 option demrus.166.b"
		name = demrus.166.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = 0.04
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_displeased
			}
		}
	}
}

				random_days = 100
			}

country_event = {
	#Strikes Against the War!
	id = demrus.172
	title = demrus.172.t
	desc = demrus.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = INT
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.a"
		name = demrus.172.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -6
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -4
			}
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.b"
		name = demrus.172.b
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.c"
		name = demrus.172.c
		add_political_power = -100
		add_war_support = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

	}

	#Reconnecting with the Russian Soul
	id = demrus.174

	desc = demrus.174.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}

		name = demrus.174.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 2
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

	id = demrus.175
	title = demrus.175.t
	desc = demrus.175.d

		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.175 option demrus.175.a"
		name = demrus.175.a

			character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic_desc
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 3
			}
			#President's agenda
		}
	}
}

### Monarchist Russia Events ###
unit_leader_event = {
	#Wrangel becomes imperial regent
	id = monrus.1
	title = monrus.1.t
	desc = monrus.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.1 option monrus.1.a"		#Normal Monarchy
		name = monrus.1.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			set_character_as_regent = yes
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.2
				days = 20
			}
			#Crown Kirill/Vladimir
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.120
				days = 150
				random_days = 50
			}
			#Wrangel reveals the war plan
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.6
				days = 100
			}
			#Union for the Revival of the Republic
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.29
				days = 600
				random_days = 600
			}
			#Orthodoxy, Constitution, People
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Crowning the Tsar
	id = monrus.2
	title = monrus.2.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			date < 1938.8.2
		}
		text = monrus.2.d.kirill
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			date > 1938.8.1
		}
		text = monrus.2.d.vladimir
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.2 option monrus.2.a"
		name = monrus.2.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				news_event = rusnews.6
			}
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.28
				days = 365
			}
			#The Day of Restoration
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Death of Kirill
	id = monrus.5
	title = monrus.5.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = monrus.5.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = monrus.5.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = monrus.5.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
				RUS_create_vladimir = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.a"
		name = monrus.5.a
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			promote_character = RUS_vladimir_romanov
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_add_vladimir_traits = yes
		}
		RUS_kirill_romanov = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.b"
		name = monrus.5.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		RUS_kirill_romanov = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.c"
		name = monrus.5.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		RUS_kirill_romanov = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.e"
		name = monrus.5.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			has_conservative_government = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_kirill_romanov = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Union for the Revival of the Republic
	id = monrus.6
	title = monrus.6.t
	desc = monrus.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.6 option monrus.6.a"
		name = monrus.6.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_pavel_gronsky = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			add_war_support = -0.1
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_SVR_var = 0
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_SVR_activity
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.10
				days = 70
			}
			#Winning the Hearts and Souls
		}
	}
}

	#VTSPS Mobilizes
	id = monrus.7
	title = monrus.7.t
	desc = monrus.7.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.7 option monrus.7.a"
		name = monrus.7.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.7 option monrus.7.b"
		name = monrus.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_liberal
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_press_controls
				has_completed_focus = RUS_entrench_kadets
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		country_event = {
			id = monrus.9
			days = 5
		}
		#Negotiations with the Labour Unions
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.7 option monrus.7.c"
		name = monrus.7.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
}

		}

country_event = {
	#Winning the Hearts and Souls
	id = monrus.10
	title = monrus.10.t
	desc = monrus.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.a"
		name = monrus.10.a
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.b"
		name = monrus.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 3
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.c"
		name = monrus.10.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_stability < 0.15
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

	id = monrus.13

		}

			popularity = -0.04
		}

country_event = {
	#Imperial Decree on Protection of the People and the State
	id = monrus.14
	title = monrus.14.t
	desc = monrus.14.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.14 option monrus.14.a"
		name = monrus.14.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_soclib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_marlib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree
				days = 730
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_state_protection_decree
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Imperial Cabinet Falls
	id = monrus.15
	title = monrus.15.t
	desc = monrus.15.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		is_monarchy = yes
		country_exists = GER
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			end_coalition = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.a"
		name = monrus.15.a
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_soccons
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_empower_MVD
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.b"
		name = monrus.15.b
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_liberal
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
			RUS_remove_sr_monarchist_govt = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.c"
		name = monrus.15.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -3
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_marlibs
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_future_direction_of_liberalism
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Socialist-Revolutionary Brothers' War
	id = monrus.16
	title = monrus.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory
		}
		text = monrus.16.d.fondaminsky
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory
			}
		}
		text = monrus.16.d.rikhter
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_fondaminsky
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_government = social_liberal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.16 option monrus.16.a"
		name = monrus.16.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory
			}
			retire_character = RUS_vladimir_rikhter
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = -0.05
			}
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.15
				days = 3
			}
			#Imperial Cabinet Falls
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Garde Equipage
	id = monrus.20
	title = monrus.20.t
	desc = monrus.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel = no
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.a"
		name = monrus.20.a		#Yes, Garde Equipage will be restored
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_left_anger > 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power < -20
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Imperskiy Gvardeyskaya"
				division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					cavalry = {
						x = 0
						y = 0
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 0
						y = 1
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 0
						y = 2
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 1
						y = 0
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 1
						y = 1
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 1
						y = 2
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 2
						y = 0
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 2
						y = 1
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 2
						y = 2
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 3
						y = 0
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 3
						y = 1
					}
					cavalry = {
						x = 3
						y = 2
					}
				}
				support = {
					mot_recon = {
						x = 0
						y = 0
					}
					artillery = {
						x = 0
						y = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.01
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				219
			}
			#Moscow
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Imperskiy Gvardeyskaya\" start_experience_factor = 1"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -9500
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.b"
		name = monrus.20.b		#Grant him a smaller token guard
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		add_manpower = -800
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.c"
		name = monrus.20.c		#What is this, the 19th century?
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger > 5
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_right_anger < 3
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Doctrine of the Tsar-Redeemer
	id = monrus.24
	title = monrus.24.t
	desc = monrus.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			tag = FER
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.24 option monrus.24.a"
		name = monrus.24.a		#Support the canonisation
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = 5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_imperial_family_martyrs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.24 option monrus.24.b"
		name = monrus.24.b		#Why would one man matter?
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -35
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Chairman of the High Imperial Council
	id = monrus.25
	title = monrus.25.t
	desc = monrus.25.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.a"
		name = monrus.25.a
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.b"
		name = monrus.25.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_advisor_role = second_in_command
				}
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {

				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member

		}

			}
		}

				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.f"
		name = monrus.25.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = no
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_advisor_role = second_in_command
				}
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = monrus.25.g
		trigger = {
			is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes

			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Enshrining Family Values in the Law
	id = monrus.27
	title = monrus.27.t
	desc = monrus.27.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.27 option monrus.27.a"
		name = monrus.27.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -3
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = 3
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.27 option monrus.27.b"
		name = monrus.27.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
	id = monrus.70
	title = monrus.70.t
	desc = monrus.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -9
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -5
			}
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -3
			}
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
					name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.70 option monrus.70.a"
		name = monrus.70.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_sic
				desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
				traits = {
					KR_old_general_sic
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				threat > 0.75
			}
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Restoration of Civilian Government
	id = monrus.71
	title = monrus.71.t
	desc = monrus.71.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.71 option monrus.71.a"
		name = monrus.71.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 10
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.71 option monrus.71.b"
		name = monrus.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Wrangel's regency
	id = monrus.80
	title = monrus.80.t
	desc = monrus.80.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.80 option monrus.80.a"
		name = monrus.80.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
				}
				scoped_play_song = "god_save_the_tsar"
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
			}
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.79
				days = 10
			}
			#Imperial Govt
			clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
			RUS_create_monarchy = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Coronation of Wrangel
	id = monrus.92
	title = monrus.92.t
	desc = monrus.92.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.92 option monrus.92.a"
		name = monrus.92.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky = {
						has_advisor_role = army_chief
					}
				}
			}
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
				advisor = {
					slot = army_chief
					idea_token = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
					desc = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_commander_desc
					traits = {
						KR_army_chief_morale_3
					}
					cost = 100
					can_be_fired = no
				}
				activate = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
		}
		RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					large = GFX_portrait_RUS_pyotr_wrangel_civilian_large
				}
			}
			set_character_name = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_regnal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_trait = RUS_imperial_regent
					}
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_imperial_regent
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_trait = RUS_ruler_of_state
					}
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_ruler_of_state
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				add_trait = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					trait = RUS_emperor_of_all_russias_wrangel
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			news_event = rusnews.7
		}
	}
}

	#Tsar-Maker Wrangel crowns Vladimir
	id = monrus.93

	desc = monrus.93.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = monrus.93.a
		RUS_create_vladimir = yes
		RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes

		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			slot = army_chief
			trait = RUS_tsar_maker
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#End of state of emergency and calls for elections
	id = monrus.94
	title = monrus.94.t
	desc = monrus.94.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.94 option monrus.94.a"
		name = monrus.94.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		add_ideas = RUS_weak_democracy
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist2_party
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
			}
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.89
				days = 7
			}
			#Constitution of the Restored Monarchy
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.90
				days = 21
			}
			#Fate of Wrangel Regency
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.95
				days = 60
			}
			#The Opposition Bloc
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.96
				days = 75
			}
			#Socialist-Revolutionaries Split
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.97
				days = 90
			}
			#Shulgin's Scheme
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.99
				days = 120
			}
			#Elections
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 4
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Shulgin's Scheme
	id = monrus.97
	title = monrus.97.t
	desc = monrus.97.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.97 option monrus.97.a"
		name = monrus.97.a		#That would make us the new Savinkov
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.97 option monrus.97.b"
		name = monrus.97.b		#Yes, our achievements won't be squandered
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			}
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_oaths_of_allegiance
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = monrus.98
				days = 7
			}
			#Alliance of the Right
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Alliance of the Right
	id = monrus.98
	title = monrus.98.t
	desc = monrus.98.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.98 option monrus.98.a"
		name = monrus.98.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@paternal_autocrat
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = -1
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = RUS_pop_increase
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Post-War elections for Wrangel
	id = monrus.99
	title = monrus.99.t
	desc = monrus.99.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.a"
		name = monrus.99.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.b"
		name = monrus.99.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_pledge_of_democracy
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_anton_kartashyov_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.c"
		name = monrus.99.c
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_authdems
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}

		}

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes
	}
}

			popularity = 0.02
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_exiles_have_returned
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.31
			days = 30
			random_days = 30
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Bolsheviks in the Officer Corps
	id = socrus.32
	title = socrus.32.t
	desc = socrus.32.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_frunze
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.a"
		name = socrus.32.a		#Keep them away from important posts
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.b"
		name = socrus.32.b		#Promote some
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_political_power = -40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.c"
		name = socrus.32.c		#They have proved capable
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Krasnaya Gorka Case
	id = socrus.33
	title = socrus.33.t
	desc = socrus.33.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_stalin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.a"
		name = socrus.33.a		#It would be a shame if something happened to him
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_stalin_ai
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			add_command_power = -15
			add_political_power = -30
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.34
				days = 40
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.b"
		name = socrus.33.b		#Off to Siberia with him
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_stalin_ai
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.c"
		name = socrus.33.c		#He is right, though
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				add = 1000
				has_country_flag = RUS_stalin_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -3
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = Krasnaya_Gorka_Case_is_over
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Suicide of Comrade Vissarionovich
	id = socrus.34
	title = socrus.34.t
	desc = socrus.34.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_stalin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.34 option socrus.34.a"
		name = socrus.34.a
		RUS_iosif_stalin = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 2
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -2
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Great Bolshevik Trial #fired by focus
	id = socrus.35
	title = socrus.35.t
	desc = socrus.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.35 option socrus.35.a"
		name = socrus.35.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov
			}
			retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = no
				}
			}
			retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				OR = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
				}
			}
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_bolsheviks
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Green Partisans
	id = socrus.37
	title = socrus.37.t
	desc = socrus.37.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.37 option socrus.37.a"
		name = socrus.37.a
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1
		}
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.38
			days = 25
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.37 option socrus.37.b"
		name = socrus.37.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_command_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1
		}
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.44
			days = 25
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Murder of Comrade Jurenko
	id = socrus.39
	title = socrus.39.t
	desc = socrus.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.39 option socrus.39.a"
		name = socrus.39.a		#Accept Gronsky's proposal
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -20
			add_command_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 30
		}
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.44
			days = 14
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.39 option socrus.39.b"
		name = socrus.39.b		#This was an unavoidable tragedy
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_left = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.40
				days = 7
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Revolt in the Duma
	id = socrus.40
	title = socrus.40.t
	desc = socrus.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.40 option socrus.40.a"
		name = socrus.40.a		#We have no choice but agree
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.44
			days = 14
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.40 option socrus.40.b"
		name = socrus.40.b		#Let him shout
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -10
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.41
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The General Strike
	id = socrus.41
	title = socrus.41.t
	desc = socrus.41.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.a"
		name = socrus.41.a		#Implement their anti-peasant policy
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 14
		}
		add_command_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.44
			days = 14
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.b"
		name = socrus.41.b		#Just wait it out
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 70
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -10
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.c"
		name = socrus.41.c		#They must listen to reason
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_centre = yes
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.42
			days = 7
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.e"
		name = socrus.41.e		#Call an emergency meeting of the cabinet
		trigger = {
			has_government = radical_socialist
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		country_event = socrus.43
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Emergency Meeting
	id = socrus.43
	title = socrus.43.t
	desc = socrus.43.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = radical_socialist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.43 option socrus.43.a"
		name = socrus.43.a		#Call Levitsky to the next meeting
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.43 option socrus.43.b"
		name = socrus.43.b		#Prepare to remove Zinovyev
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

	#Fighting in the Countryside
	id = socrus.44
	title = socrus.44.t
	desc = socrus.44.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_riot1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.44 option socrus.44.a"
		name = socrus.44.a
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -10
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.45
				days = 45
				random_days = 15
			}
			#Vozhd i Svoboda!
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Villagers Flock to Matroshka
	id = socrus.46
	title = socrus.46.t
	desc = socrus.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.46 option socrus.46.a"
		name = socrus.46.a		#SRs must stand by the peasants
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
			add_political_power = -45
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
				}
				RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				}
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3
				}
				RUS_add_faith = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.47
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.46 option socrus.46.b"
		name = socrus.46.b		#Building socialism is a greater goal
		trigger = {
			has_government = radical_socialist
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.48
				days = 45
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.47 option socrus.47.b"
		name = socrus.47.b		#No compromises
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Re-Education Labour Administration
	id = socrus.51
	title = socrus.51.t
	desc = socrus.51.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.a"
		name = socrus.51.a		#Bare minimum
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_reject_state_terror
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.b"
		name = socrus.51.b		#The ends justify the means
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_right = no
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -6
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps_2
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			add_political_power = 40
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.c"
		name = socrus.51.c		#No! Just arrest fewer people!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Abolition of Cavalry?
	id = socrus.55
	title = socrus.55.t
	desc = socrus.55.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky
		any_country_division = {
			division_has_majority_template = cavalry
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.55 option socrus.55.a"
		name = socrus.55.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.55 option socrus.55.b"
		name = socrus.55.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		every_country_division = {
			limit = {
				division_has_majority_template = cavalry
			}
			destroy_unit = yes
		}
		division_template = {
			name = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya"			# Motorised Division
			division_names_group = RUS_MOT_01
			regiments = {
				motorized = {
					x = 0
					y = 0
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 0
					y = 1
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 0
					y = 2
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 0
					y = 3
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 1
					y = 0
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 1
					y = 1
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 1
					y = 2
				}
				motorized = {
					x = 1
					y = 3
				}
			}
		}
		capital_scope = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Motopekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The People's Navy
	id = socrus.56
	title = socrus.56.t
	desc = socrus.56.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_navy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.56 option socrus.56.a"
		name = socrus.56.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_character = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov
				}
			}
			show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = {
				add_max_trait = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 1
					slots = {
						navy_chief
					}
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov_navy_chief
		}
		else = {
			navy_experience = 15
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Drafting the Operation Kutuzov
	id = socrus.57
	title = socrus.57.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
		}
		text = socrus.57.d.tukha
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
		}
		text = socrus.57.d.frunze
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.57 option socrus.57.a"
		name = socrus.57.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_BLR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_BLR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.57 option socrus.57.b"
		name = socrus.57.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_UKR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_UKR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.57 option socrus.57.c"
		name = socrus.57.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_long_war
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_long_war
				days = 1095
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

	}
	option = {

			ideology_change_var = 4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.58 option socrus.58.b"

	}

country_event = {
	#Radicalisation of the Militsya
	id = socrus.59
	title = socrus.59.t
	desc = socrus.59.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	trigger = {
		RUS_has_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.59 option socrus.59.a"
		name = socrus.59.a
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.59 option socrus.59.b"
		name = socrus.59.b
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_VST_right = no
				}
				set_temp_variable = {
					RUS_relation_change = 1
				}
				RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

		}

			coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
		}
		remove_from_coalition = yes

			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes
			}

			}

		}

	#Fate of the Workers' Coalition?
	id = socrus.69
	title = socrus.69.t
	desc = socrus.69.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_leftsrs
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.69 option socrus.69.a"
		name = socrus.69.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 4
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.69 option socrus.69.b"
		name = socrus.69.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				has_government = totalist
				NOT = {
					country_exists = GER
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
		}
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_left = no
			}
			add_stability = -0.3
			add_war_support = -0.3
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_war_support = -0.1
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#High Anti-Soc resistance event
	id = socrus.75
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = socrus.75.t.evil
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = socrus.75.t.idealist
	}
	desc = socrus.75.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.75 option socrus.75.a"
		name = socrus.75.a
		add_manpower = -37800
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
			add_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = -0.08
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
				RUS_VST_left = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -2
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -2
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -2
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.75 option socrus.75.b"
		name = socrus.75.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}
