country_event = {
	#The Consequences of Democracy
	id = socrus.77
	title = socrus.77.t
	desc = socrus.77.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.77 option socrus.77.a"
		name = socrus.77.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.08
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.77 option socrus.77.b"
		name = socrus.77.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Marx Against Muhammed
	id = socrus.78
	title = socrus.78.t
	desc = socrus.78.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_muslims
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.78 option socrus.78.a"
		name = socrus.78.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.78 option socrus.78.b"
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = socrus.78.b
		add_political_power = -60
		add_stability = 0.04
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Abolition of the Emergency Powers
	id = socrus.80
	title = socrus.80.t
	desc = socrus.80.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.80 option socrus.80.a"
		name = socrus.80.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution
				}
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2
				}
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
			last_election = "1935.12.17"
			election_frequency = 36
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov = {
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.81
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#New Premier is chosen
	id = socrus.81
	title = socrus.81.t
	desc = socrus.81.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.a"
		name = socrus.81.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
			}
		}
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_sic
				desc = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_advisor_desc
				traits = {
					KR_economic_reformer_sic
					KR_vst_centre_shlyapnikov
				}
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.b"
		name = socrus.81.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_advisor_desc
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = {
					KR_union_advocate
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_kirov_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.c"
		name = socrus.81.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_mikhail_tomsky = {
			promote_character = {
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
			}
		}
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_sergey_syrtsov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_sergey_syrtsov_sic
				desc = RUS_sergey_syrtsov_advisor_desc
				traits = {
					KR_silent_workhorse_sic
					KR_vst_left_syrtsov
				}
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Comrade Dan's Departure
	id = socrus.82
	title = socrus.82.t
	desc = socrus.82.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_dan
	trigger = {
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.82 option socrus.82.a"
		name = socrus.82.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = yes
				RUS_fyodor_dan = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_rafail_abramovich_sic
					desc = RUS_rafail_abramovich_leader_desc
					traits = {
						KR_dream_of_democracy
						KR_vst_right_abramovich
					}
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_dan_retire_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = yes
			}
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_shatov
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_vladimir_shatov_sic
					desc = RUS_vladimir_shatov_advisor_desc
					traits = {
						KR_socialist_industrializer_sic
						KR_vst_centre_shatov
					}
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		retire_character = RUS_fyodor_dan
	}
}

# Left-SR Path
country_event = {
	#Shoot the Svobodniks
	id = socrus.100
	title = socrus.100.t
	desc = socrus.100.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.100 option socrus.100.a"
		name = socrus.100.a		#No mercy for the Svobodniks
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_manpower = -43000
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.100 option socrus.100.b"
		name = socrus.100.b		#We will wash away their sins
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_manpower = -11000
		add_political_power = 20
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
	}
}

	#Besieged Kronstadt

		name = socrus.101.a
		add_political_power = 15
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Direction of the Revolutionary Struggle
	id = socrus.103
	title = socrus.103.t
	desc = socrus.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Spiridonovist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.103 option socrus.103.a"
		name = socrus.103.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 667
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_maria_spiridonova = {
				unit_leader_event = socrus.161
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.103.a.tt
		set_variable = {
			RUS_faith = 0
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_parliamentarian_faith_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.164
				days = 80
			}
			#Rise of the Maximalists
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.162
				days = 100
			}
			#Siberian Direction
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.165
				days = 450
			}
			#Tambov Project
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.166
				days = 600
			}
			#The Romantic Esers
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.173
				days = 900
			}
			#PSR Conference
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Maximalist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.103 option socrus.103.b"
		name = socrus.103.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 333
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = {
				unit_leader_event = socrus.141
			}
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist_3
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.103.b.tt
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_pro_coalition_rhetoric
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_maximalist_influence = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = 0
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_maximalist_influence_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.106
				days = 30
			}
			#Declaration of Organic Socialism
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.133
				days = 150
				random_days = 100
			}
			#Doctrine of Integral Socialism
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.127
				days = 250
				random_days = 10
			}
			#Zdobnov assassination event chain
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#On Security Matters
	id = socrus.105
	title = socrus.105.t
	desc = socrus.105.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Zdobnov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.105 option socrus.105.a"
		name = socrus.105.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.105.a.tt
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Hidden event for incrementing Maximalist Influence every 60 days
	id = socrus.107
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag
			has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.107 option 1"
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.107
			days = 59
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Democratic Bloc event chain: VST
	id = socrus.108
	title = socrus.108.t
	desc = socrus.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.108 option socrus.108.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = {
					is_hired_as_advisor = yes
				}
			}
		}
		name = socrus.108.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.a.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_vst_right_agree
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.109
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.108 option socrus.108.b"
		name = socrus.108.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = {
						is_hired_as_advisor = yes
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				60 = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.b.tt
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = socrus.113
					}
				}
				40 = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_disagree
					hidden_effect = {
						country_event = socrus.113
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.b.tt
			set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = socrus.113
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.109
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Democratic Bloc event chain: SDS
	id = socrus.109
	title = socrus.109.t
	desc = socrus.109.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.109 option socrus.109.a"
		name = socrus.109.a
		add_political_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_sds_agree
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.109.a.tt
		set_temp_variable = {
			coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
		}
		add_to_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_gergard_zeller_advisor
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_reforming_the_weapons_of_state
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.109.a2.tt
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.111
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.109 option socrus.109.b"
		name = socrus.109.b
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.111
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Mending the Rift with the Faithful
	id = socrus.110
	title = socrus.110.t
	desc = socrus.110.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.110 option socrus.110.a"
		name = socrus.110.a
		add_ideas = RUS_concordance_with_the_church
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.110 option socrus.110.b"
		name = socrus.110.b
		add_ideas = RUS_concordance_with_the_church_alt
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -7
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_farming
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.124 option socrus.124.a"
		name = socrus.124.a
		add_political_power = 30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.124 option socrus.124.b"
		name = socrus.124.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.07
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 6
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Appointment of the Interior Minister
	id = socrus.130
	title = socrus.130.t
	desc = socrus.130.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				target = THIS
				decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				target = THIS
				decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				target = THIS
				decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				target = THIS
				decision = RUS_convince_the_vst
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolegayev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.130 option socrus.130.a"
		name = socrus.130.a
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.134
			days = 14
			random_days = 7
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_free_political_advisor_slot = yes
				NOT = {
					RUS_andrey_kolegayev = {
						is_hired_as_advisor = yes
					}
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_andrey_kolegayev_advisor
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 150
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 10
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_stability = -0.02
				add_war_support = -0.02
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 9
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 20
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 19
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 30
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 29
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 40
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 39
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 50
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 49
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_universal_labour_service
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour
					add_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour_2
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_universal_labour_service_buff
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Blyukher Report Part 2
	id = socrus.132
	title = socrus.132.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		text = socrus.132.d.maximalist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
		}
		text = socrus.132.d.spiridonist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST = yes
		}
		text = socrus.132.d.VST
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2
	option = {
		#Levandovsky, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.a"
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		name = socrus.132.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 7
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Frunze, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.b"
		name = socrus.132.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5
			}
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Tukhachevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.c"
		name = socrus.132.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.04
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Levandonsky, Spiridonovists + VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.a2"
		name = socrus.132.a2
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.08
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.025
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Sablin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.b2"
		name = socrus.132.b2
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5
		}
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Yegorov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.e"
		name = socrus.132.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_yegorov_army_chief
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		#Frunze
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.f"
		name = socrus.132.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST = yes
			has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -2
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Vasilevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.g"
		name = socrus.132.g
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
			has_character = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_political_power = -40
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 1
	id = socrus.136
	title = socrus.136.t
	desc = socrus.136.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.136 option socrus.136.a"
		name = socrus.136.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 10
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 19
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 30
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.02
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 29
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 40
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 39
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 50
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 5
	id = socrus.140
	title = socrus.140.t
	desc = socrus.140.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.140 option socrus.140.a"
		name = socrus.140.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_failstate
		clr_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_0
				RUS_maximalist_influence_1
				RUS_maximalist_influence_2
				RUS_maximalist_influence_3
				RUS_maximalist_influence_4
				RUS_maximalist_influence_5
				RUS_maximalist_influence_6
				RUS_maximalist_influence_7
				RUS_maximalist_influence_8
				RUS_maximalist_influence_9
				RUS_maximalist_influence_10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_aleksey_ustinov = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_targeted_decision = {
						target = THIS
						decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress
					}
					remove_targeted_decision = {
						target = THIS
						decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov
					}
					remove_targeted_decision = {
						target = THIS
						decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin
					}
					remove_targeted_decision = {
						target = THIS
						decision = RUS_convince_the_vst
					}
					remove_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Question of the Cossacks
	id = socrus.150
	title = socrus.150.t
	desc = socrus.150.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = yes
		is_subject = no
		date > 1938.10.1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.152
				days = 90
				random_days = 20
			}
			#Pavlov's Rebellion
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	option = {
		#We cannot trust the cossack
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.150 option socrus.150.a"
		name = socrus.150.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.154
				days = 720
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#They can change, like all of russia
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.150 option socrus.150.b"
		name = socrus.150.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_left = no
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.151
				days = 180
			}
			#1st People's Cossack Cavalry Corps
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Don Cossacks Declare Independence
	id = socrus.152
	title = socrus.152.t
	desc = socrus.152.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		controls_state = 218		#Rostov
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.152 option socrus.152.a"
		name = socrus.152.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1
		}
		add_command_power = -100
		army_experience = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.153
				days = 14
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.195
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.152 option socrus.152.b"
		name = socrus.152.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2
		}
		add_command_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.153
				days = 14
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.195
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		### Possible add other path-specific variables
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		set_variable = {
			RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Pavlov's Rebellion Dies Down
	id = socrus.155
	title = socrus.155.t
	desc = socrus.155.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.155 option socrus.155.a"
		name = socrus.155.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 3
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels
				}
			}
			add_resistance = -40
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.158
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.155 option socrus.155.b"
		name = socrus.155.b
		add_stability = 0.03
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels
				}
			}
			add_resistance = -20
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Caspian Hosts
	id = socrus.157
	title = socrus.157.t
	desc = socrus.157.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		controls_state = 236		#Astrakhan
		has_idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.157 option socrus.157.a"
		name = socrus.157.a
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = socrus.155
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = socrus.158
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.157 option socrus.157.b"
		name = socrus.157.b
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1
		}
		army_experience = -20
		add_war_support = 0.05
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = socrus.154
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = socrus.158
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Pavlovites join Free Russian Army
	id = socrus.159
	title = socrus.159.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		text = socrus.159.d.rus
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		text = socrus.159.d.rsa
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RSA = {
			exists = yes
		}
		has_war = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.159 option socrus.159.a"
		name = socrus.159.a
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_pavlovite_effect = RUS_pavlov_unrest
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome
		divide_temp_variable = {
			RUS_pavlovite_effect = -50
		}
		add_stability = RUS_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = {
			RUS_pavlovite_effect = 101165
		}
		add_manpower = RUS_pavlovite_effect
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.159 option socrus.159.b"
		name = socrus.159.b
		trigger = {
			tag = RSA
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome_RSA
		set_temp_variable = {
			RSA_pavlovite_effect = RUS.RUS_pavlov_unrest
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_template = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
					division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
					regiments = {
						cavalry = {
							x = 0
							y = 0
						}
						cavalry = {
							x = 0
							y = 1
						}
						cavalry = {
							x = 0
							y = 2
						}
						cavalry = {
							x = 1
							y = 0
						}
						cavalry = {
							x = 1
							y = 1
						}
						cavalry = {
							x = 1
							y = 2
						}
					}
					support = {
						recon = {
							x = 0
							y = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				64
			}
			#Berlin
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Svobodny Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = RSA_pavlovite_effect
			}
		}
		multiply_temp_variable = {
			RSA_pavlovite_effect = 10
		}
		add_political_power = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = {
			RSA_pavlovite_effect = 1137
		}
		add_manpower = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = socrus.159
			}
		}
	}
}

	#The Tambov Experiment
	id = socrus.165
	title = socrus.165.t
	desc = socrus.165.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_mechanized_farms
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.165 option socrus.165.a"
		name = socrus.165.a
		activate_mission = RUS_complete_the_tambov_experiment
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_devolution_of_authority
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_mordva_autonomies
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			target = THIS
			decision = RUS_peoples_militia_reform
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.165.a.tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 60
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 40
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_tambov_experiment
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.184
				days = 80
				random_days = 60
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.197
				days = 155
			}
		}
	}

	#Towards the Future
	id = socrus.168

	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory
		}
		text = socrus.168.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_victory
		}
		text = socrus.168.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.168 option socrus.168.a"
		name = socrus.168.a
		retire_character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_nikolay_zdobnov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_boris_kamkov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Hidden event for incrementing Faith every 75 days
	id = socrus.172
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		check_variable = {
			RUS_faith < 100
		}
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_3
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_4
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_5
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_6
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_9
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_10
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.172 option 1"
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.172
			days = 75
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1
		}
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#PSR Conference hidden event to fire unit leader event
	id = socrus.173
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.173 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform
						RUS_isaak_steinberg = {
							has_trait = KR_head_of_the_romanticists
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = socrus.167
					days = 1
				}
				#PSR Conference
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_boris_kamkov = {
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = socrus.167
					days = 1
				}
				#PSR Conference
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = UKR_had_dem_govt
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
		}
		text = socrus.179.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		text = socrus.179.d3
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi
	trigger = {
		UKR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = UKR_vlas_chubar
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		name = socrus.179.a
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_auth_govt
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_dem_govt
	}
}

			popularity = 0.02
		}

				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}

			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Renaming of Cities
	id = socrus.190
	title = socrus.190.t
	desc = socrus.190.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Latinization
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.190 option socrus.190.a"
		name = socrus.190.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed_vst
				set_state_name = STATE_217_MININGRAD
				set_province_name = {
					id = 3529
					name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_MININGRAD
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed
				set_state_name = STATE_217_VOLGOGRAD
				set_province_name = {
					id = 3529
					name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_VOLGOGRAD
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed_maximalist
				set_state_name = STATE_653_ZDOBNOVSK
				set_province_name = {
					id = 1821
					name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_ZDOBNOVSK
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed
				set_state_name = STATE_653_CHERNOVSK
				set_province_name = {
					id = 1821
					name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_CHERNOVSK
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			250 = {
				set_global_flag = simbirsk_renamed_vst
				set_state_name = STATE_250_ULYANOVSK
				set_province_name = {
					id = 392
					name = VICTORY_POINTS_392_ULYANOVSK
				}
			}
		}
		570 = {
			set_global_flag = novonikolayevsk_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_570_NOVOSIBIRSK
			set_province_name = {
				id = 7274
				name = VICTORY_POINTS_7274_NOVOSIBIRSK
			}
		}
		233 = {
			set_global_flag = vladikavkaz_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_233_DZAUDZHIKAU
			set_province_name = {
				id = 9628
				name = VICTORY_POINTS_9628_DZAUDZHIKAU
			}
		}
		961 = {
			set_global_flag = grozny_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_province_name = {
				id = 3672
				name = VICTORY_POINTS_3672_SOLZHAGALA
			}
		}
		232 = {
			set_global_flag = petrovsk_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_province_name = {
				id = 3668
				name = VICTORY_POINTS_3668_ANZHIKALA
			}
		}
		397 = {
			set_global_flag = ustsysolsk_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_397_SYKYTYVDIN
			set_province_name = {
				id = 6121
				name = VICTORY_POINTS_6121_SYKYTYVDIN
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Tambov Experiment Complete
	id = socrus.193
	title = socrus.193.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var < 2
			}
		}
		text = socrus.193.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var > 1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var < 4
			}
		}
		text = socrus.193.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var = 4
			}
		}
		text = socrus.193.d3
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_land_reform
	option = {
		#bad
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.a"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var < 2
			}
		}
		name = socrus.193.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		#mid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var > 1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var < 4
			}
		}
		name = socrus.193.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		#good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.c"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_tambov_var = 4
			}
		}
		name = socrus.193.c
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Elections to Constituent Assembly
	id = socrus.300
	title = socrus.300.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_government = radical_socialist
		}
		text = socrus.300.d.radsoc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		text = socrus.300.d.syndie
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.301
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.300 option socrus.300.a"
		name = socrus.300.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.08
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.06
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.15
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.08
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.06
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Matter of the Parliament
	id = socrus.301
	title = socrus.301.t
	desc = socrus.301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.302
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.a"
		name = socrus.301.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_left_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.b"
		name = socrus.301.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_centre_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.c"
		name = socrus.301.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_right_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Matter of the HoS
	id = socrus.302
	title = socrus.302.t
	desc = socrus.302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Strong HoS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.302 option socrus.302.a"
		name = socrus.302.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_executive_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
	}
	option = {
		#Weak HoS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.302 option socrus.302.b"
		name = socrus.302.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_parliamentarian_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian
	}
}

country_event = {
	#HoS Election
	id = socrus.303
	title = socrus.303.t
	desc = socrus.303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.303 option socrus.303.a"
		name = socrus.303.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
					has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_radsocs
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 48
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist3_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist3_party
			}
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = {
				promote_character = {
					ideology = totalist_subtype
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				add_political_power = 150
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.303 option socrus.303.b"
		name = socrus.303.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = syndicalist
				}
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 48
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_socrus_coalition_mechanic_decisions
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_centre_unity
			value = 6
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = sr_var
			value = 3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sr_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sr_var
				value = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sr_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = sds_var
			value = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sds_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = rkp_var
			value = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = rkp_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = rkp_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_left_var
			value = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_left_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_left_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_centre_var
			value = 5
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_right_var
			value = 3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_right_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_right_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sulimov_buff_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_improve_all_relation_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_right_var
				value = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_left_var
				value = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = vst_centre_unity
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:totalist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.304
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.11
				days = 180
				random_days = 180
			}
			#One Class, Two Parties
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				add_political_power = 150
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Choice of Syndie Sub-Path
	id = socrus.304
	title = socrus.304.t
	desc = socrus.304.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.320
				days = 100
				random_days = 100
			}
			#Uglanov's Resignation
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.305
				days = 300
			}
			#VST Congress
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Mensheviks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.a"
		name = socrus.304.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Centre
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.b"
		name = socrus.304.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
					is_second_in_command = no
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.c"
		name = socrus.304.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Annual Congress of VST
	id = socrus.305
	title = socrus.305.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.war
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea				#normal
				AND = {
					#what if somehow you don't fulfil any of the descs listed here? if so, use 305.d.stable - attempt at fixing issue #9347
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = GER
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
						AND = {
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							check_variable = {
								vst_centre_unity > 3
							}
						}
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
							}
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							OR = {
								RUS_lev_kamenev = {
									is_second_in_command = yes
								}
								RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
									is_second_in_command = yes
								}
							}
							check_variable = {
								vst_centre_unity < 4
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
							}
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							RUS_fyodor_dan = {
								is_second_in_command = yes
							}
							check_variable = {
								vst_centre_unity < 4
							}
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.stable
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			check_variable = {
				vst_centre_unity > 3
			}
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.factionalism
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.streamlined
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
			}
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
			}
			check_variable = {
				vst_centre_unity < 4
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
			}
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.kamenev
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
			}
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			RUS_fyodor_dan = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
			check_variable = {
				vst_centre_unity < 4
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
			}
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.abramovich
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	immediate = {
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.305
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#United front
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.a"
		name = socrus.305.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
				is_ai = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_lev_kamenev
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 80
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = yes
			}
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		#It descends into factionalist debate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.b"
		name = socrus.305.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_VST_centre = yes
				}
				check_variable = {
					vst_centre_unity > 3
				}
			}
			else = {
				check_variable = {
					vst_centre_var < 4
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Try to maintain peace!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.c"
		name = socrus.305.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
			}
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS_VST_centre = yes
				}
				check_variable = {
					vst_centre_unity > 3
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
	}
	option = {
		#Levitsky gets the boot, Abramovich takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.e"
		name = socrus.305.e
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				RUS_fyodor_dan = {
					is_second_in_command = yes
				}
				check_variable = {
					vst_centre_unity < 4
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
		country_event = socrus.338
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Levitsky gets the boot, Kamenev takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.f"
		name = socrus.305.f
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					RUS_lev_kamenev = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
					RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
				check_variable = {
					vst_centre_unity < 4
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
		country_event = socrus.338
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Make plans for Sulimov takeover
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.g"
		name = socrus.305.g
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
					check_variable = {
						vst_centre_unity < 4
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = socrus.355			#Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -3
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}

		}

country_event = {
	# Speculation with the Prices
	id = socrus.314
	title = socrus.314.t
	desc = socrus.314.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.a"
		name = socrus.314.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 4
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.b"
		name = socrus.314.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = -0.06
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.c"
		name = socrus.314.c
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

	# Breakthrough
	id = socrus.323
	title = socrus.323.t
	desc = socrus.323.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_VST = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	option = {
		# Side with Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.323 option socrus.323.a"
		name = socrus.323.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_right = no
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.324
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# Side with Right
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.323 option socrus.323.b"
		name = socrus.323.b
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.325
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

	# Zinovyev wins
	id = socrus.324
	title = socrus.324.t
	desc = socrus.324.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_VST = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.324 option socrus.324.a"
		name = socrus.324.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_centre_collapsing_to_left
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_relations_with_vst_die_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.324 option socrus.324.b"
		name = socrus.324.b
		add_political_power = -60
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Shlyapnikov gets the job
	id = socrus.325
	title = socrus.325.t
	desc = socrus.325.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.325 option socrus.325.a"
		name = socrus.325.a
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = yes
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 2
			}
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

	# Dvoika formed
	id = socrus.328
	title = socrus.328.t
	desc = socrus.328.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

		#yay
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.328 option socrus.328.a"
		name = socrus.328.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_dvoika_minigame_begins
		set_country_flag = RUS_dvoika_minigame
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_left_radicalism
			value = 3
		}
		clamp_variable = {
			var = vst_left_radicalism
			min = 0
			max = 10
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	# Zinovyev boots Kamenev due to Radicalism
	id = socrus.329
	title = socrus.329.t
	desc = socrus.329.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Kamenev -> Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.329 option socrus.329.a"
		name = socrus.329.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		RUS_convert_radicalism_to_totalist_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Ministry - Finance
	id = socrus.330
	title = socrus.330.t
	desc = socrus.330.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VST_Centre_fell_flag
		}
		check_variable = {
			vst_right_var > 0
		}
		check_variable = {
			vst_left_var > 0
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.335
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	option = {
		#Strumlin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.a"
		name = socrus.330.a
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.330.a.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_strumilin_ministry
	}
	option = {
		#Kamkov (SR)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.b"
		name = socrus.330.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Finn-Yenotayevsky (Right)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.c"
		name = socrus.330.c
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.330.c.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_yenotayevsky_ministry
	}
	option = {
		#Kamenev (Left)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.e"
		name = socrus.330.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_lev_kamenev = {
				is_second_in_command = no
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	# VST Centre Falling
	id = socrus.336
	title = socrus.336.t
	desc = socrus.336.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
		}
		OR = {
			check_variable = {
				vst_centre_unity < 1
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		RUS_clear_zinovyev_minigame = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.336 option socrus.336.a"
		name = socrus.336.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_power_struggle_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = socrus.338
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.336 option socrus.336.b"
		name = socrus.336.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.355
				days = 1
			}
			#Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Change in Leadership
	id = socrus.338
	title = socrus.338.t
	desc = socrus.338.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	option = {
		#Right
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.338 option socrus.338.a"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
					RUS_fyodor_dan = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
					check_variable = {
						vst_right_var > vst_left_var
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		name = socrus.338.a
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -5
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.405
				days = 200
				random_days = 200
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.338 option socrus.338.b"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_centre_collapsing_to_left
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
					RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
					check_variable = {
						vst_right_var < vst_left_var
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		name = socrus.338.b
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_lev_kamenev
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		country_event = socrus.328		# Dvoika formed
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -5
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		clr_country_flag = socrus340_fired
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.307
				days = 60
			}
			#Centralisation of Power
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Radicalism warning at 8
	id = socrus.339
	title = socrus.339.t
	desc = socrus.339.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	option = {
		#Switch to Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.339 option socrus.339.a"
		name = socrus.339.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_path
					option = RUS_PATH_KAMENEV_SYNDIE
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
				unit_leader_event = socrus.329
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Buy Time
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.339 option socrus.339.b"
		name = socrus.339.b
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_radicalism_postponed_flag
	}
}
