country_event = {
	#The Zinovyev Manifesto
	id = socrus.350
	title = socrus.350.t
	desc = socrus.350.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
		}
		has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_completed_focus = RUS_eternal_flame
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.350 option socrus.350.a"
		name = socrus.350.a
		activate_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -4
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_expel_zinovietes
			target = ROOT
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_expel_sds
			target = ROOT
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_ideological_restriction
			target = ROOT
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_appoint_bolsheviks
			target = ROOT
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_bolshevik_operation
			target = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_backing_from_esers
				target = ROOT
			}
		}
		### Add rest of decisions
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.358
				days = 7
			}
			#War over the Central Committee
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Sulimov's Strike
	id = socrus.351
	title = socrus.351.t
	desc = socrus.351.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.351 option socrus.351.a"
		name = socrus.351.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:totalist
			}
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov		# Remember to unretire him for potential puppet?
		retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
			}
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Rebellion of the Left
	id = socrus.352
	title = socrus.352.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		}
		text = socrus.352.d.rebellion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_expelled_left
		}
		text = socrus.352.d.expulsion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				vst_left_var < 1
			}
		}
		text = socrus.352.d.coalition
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		else = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.352 option socrus.352.a"
		name = socrus.352.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		clr_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		RUS_ivan_gronsky = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -6
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_communists
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_communists
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_encourage_collectivisation
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
					uncomplete_children = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
			}
			country_event = socrus.336			#VST Centre Falling
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = {
	#Levitsky meets Kamenev
	id = socrus.359
	title = socrus.359.t
	desc = socrus.359.d
	trigger = {
		has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.359 option socrus.359.a"
		name = socrus.359.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_SULIMOV_SYNDIE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.359 option socrus.359.b"
		name = socrus.359.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_path
						option = RUS_PATH_LEVITSKY_SYNDIE
					}
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = socrus.360
			days = 5
		}
		#To Protect the Revolution
	}
}

country_event = {
	#To Protect the Revolution
	id = socrus.360
	title = socrus.360.t
	desc = socrus.360.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
		}
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.360 option socrus.360.a"
		name = socrus.360.a
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_resigned
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_kirov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_leader_description = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_socrus_leader_desc
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
				}
				remove_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_active_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum
				}
				remove_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum
			}
		}
	}
}

	#Socialism through Innovation
	id = socrus.361
	title = socrus.361.t
	desc = socrus.361.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Tone it down
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.361 option socrus.361.a"
		name = socrus.361.a
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_machism_idea_1
			add_idea = RUS_machism_idea_2
		}
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
	option = {
		#Full ideologisation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.361 option socrus.361.b"
		name = socrus.361.b
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_machism_idea_1
			add_idea = RUS_machism_idea_3
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
}

	#Defection of the Former Centre
	id = socrus.362

		}

			RUS_VST_right = yes
		}
		text = socrus.362.d.right
	}

				is_ai = no
			}

		}

			remove_political_advisor_role = yes

		}

			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_internationalists
			}

				focus = RUS_internationalists
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes

			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		else = {

			}

		}
	}

		}

			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic

country_event = {
	#Reversed October
	id = socrus.381
	title = socrus.381.t
	desc = socrus.381.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sverdlov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.381 option socrus.381.a"
		name = socrus.381.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_lev_kamenev
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_kamenev_tt
			set_temp_variable = {
				current_vst_left_radicalism = vst_left_radicalism
			}
			multiply_temp_variable = {
				current_vst_left_radicalism = 0.01
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = current_vst_left_radicalism
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_country_flag = RUS_rkp_absorbed_by_vst
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_bolshevik_purge_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long
			}
			RUS_yakov_sverdlov = {
				retire = yes
			}
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
				remove_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_bolshevik_frunze
				}
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_vst_left_frunze
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_leader_desc
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = {
					RUS_grishka_third_sic
				}
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Bringing Modernity to Russia
	id = socrus.384
	title = socrus.384.t
	desc = socrus.384.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = syndicalist
			has_government = totalist
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.384 option socrus.384.a"
		name = socrus.384.a
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_mission = RUS_soc_industrialisation_plan
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			INT = {
				country_event = socrus.385
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.384 option socrus.384.b"
		name = socrus.384.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Against the Anti-Social Intelligentsia
	id = socrus.386
	title = socrus.386.t
	desc = socrus.386.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.a"
		name = socrus.386.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_purged_universities
			days = 365
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = 4
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.b"
		name = socrus.386.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.c"
		name = socrus.386.c
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

	#Maximalist Takeover of the Socialist-Revolutionaries

			}

		set_temp_variable = {

		}

				ideology = radical_socialist

		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Integral Socialism and the Accession of the Maximalists
	id = socrus.389
	title = socrus.389.t
	desc = socrus.389.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_ustinov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.389 option socrus.389.a"
		name = socrus.389.a
		add_political_power = 50
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist6_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist6_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 5
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist6_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist6_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = {

		}

				id = socrus.392
				days = 365
			}

		}
	}

		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		set_temp_variable = {

			RUS_relation_change = 2
		}
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes

	}

country_event = {
	#Devolution of State
	id = socrus.399
	title = socrus.399.t
	desc = socrus.399.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		RUS_grigory_maksimov = {
			is_second_in_command = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.399 option socrus.399.a"
		name = socrus.399.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_maksimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_maksimov_sic_desc
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = {
					KR_syndicalist_visionary_sic
				}
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_confederation
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confederation_tt
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_expansion_of_union
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = SRI
						tag = SWF
						tag = WLS
						tag = SCO
					}
				}
				add_to_array = {
					array = ROOT.RUS_SSTR_tags
					value = THIS
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Association for Research of Western Totalism
	id = socrus.403
	title = socrus.403.t
	desc = socrus.403.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.404
				days = 265
				random_days = 100
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Allow them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.403 option socrus.403.a"
		name = socrus.403.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_fyodor_dan = {
				is_second_in_command = no
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Ban them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.403 option socrus.403.b"
		name = socrus.403.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = {
					is_second_in_command = no
				}
				RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
					is_second_in_command = no
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = -1
		}
		RUS_VST_Left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_relation_change = 1
		}
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Collapse of Government
	id = socrus.430
	title = socrus.430.t
	desc = socrus.430.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.430 option socrus.430.a"
		name = socrus.430.a
		RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
				promote_character = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = politically_connected
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_planning = 1
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.3
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.3
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = INT
					any_allied_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_capitulated = no
						num_of_owned_factories > 50
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			if = {
				#Triggered by RSA tree
				limit = {
					var:219.controller = {
						OR = {
							tag = RSA
							is_in_faction_with = RSA
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = freerus.20
					days = 1
				}
				#Negotiations with Boldyrev
			}
		}
	}
}

#SocRus Foreign
country_event = {
	#The Eastern Front of the Internationale
	id = socrus.114
	title = socrus.114.t
	desc = socrus.114.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.a"
		name = socrus.114.a		#Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		var:FROM.faction_leader = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.claims"
		name = socrus.114.claims		#Yes, but for all of our claims
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = socrus.1150
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.b"
		name = socrus.114.b		#We'd rather stay with France
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	# An Invitation to the Internationale
	id = socrus.115
	title = socrus.115.t
	desc = {
		text = socrus.115.d.guaranteed
		trigger = {
			is_guaranteed_by = FROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = socrus.115.d.invited
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_in_faction = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.a"
		name = socrus.115.a		#Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = {
				country_event = socrus.116
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.claims"
		name = socrus.115.claims		#Yes, but for all of our claims
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = socrus.1150
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.b"
		name = socrus.115.b		#We shouldn't provoke Germany...
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = socrus.117
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

			faction_leader = {
				add_to_faction = FROM
			}

					is_core_of = FROM
				}
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				every_core_state = {
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = socrus.1151
		}

country_event = {
	# FROM Seeks Membership in the Internationale
	id = socrus.1153
	title = socrus.116.t
	desc = {
		text = socrus.116.d.guaranteed
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_guaranteed_by = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = socrus.116.d.invited
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_guaranteed_by = RUS
				}
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1153 option socrus.116.a"
		name = socrus.116.a		#Welcome, comrades
		add_to_faction = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_claimed_by = RUS
						}
						remove_claim_by = RUS
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = RUS
						}
						remove_core_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = socrus.1180
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1153 option socrus.116.b"
		name = socrus.116.b		#No, we don't need them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = socrus.118
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Union of Socialist Labour Republics
	id = socrus.411
	title = socrus.411.t
	desc = socrus.411.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier
					}
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier
				}
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = RUS_CA_modifier
					}
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_CA_modifier
				}
				clr_state_flag = alash_state
			}
			every_core_state = {
				limit = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					has_active_resistance = yes
				}
				force_enable_resistance = {
					occupier = RUS
					clear = yes
				}
			}
			589 = {
				#Semireche
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = CA_turkestan_victorious
					}
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.411 option socrus.411.a"
		name = socrus.411.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					BUK = {
						has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS
					}
				}
			}
			#Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581						#Uralsk
						state = 583						#Petropavlovsk
						state = 588						#Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair					#Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			787 = {
				remove_core_of = MNR
			}
			#Terek
		}
		release_puppet = MNR
		set_autonomy = {
			target = MNR
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_nationalise_oil_completed
					}
				}
				MNR = {
					give_resource_rights = {
						state = 232
						receiver = GER
					}
					#Dagestan
					give_resource_rights = {
						state = 961
						receiver = GER
					}
					#Chechenya
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			BUK = {
				get_current_government_type = yes
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			BUK = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = KHI
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = TRK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.411 option socrus.411.b"
		name = socrus.411.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		#### Fire World News Event
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					BUK = {
						has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS
					}
				}
			}
			#Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581						#Uralsk
						state = 583						#Petropavlovsk
						state = 588						#Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair					#Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_subject_country = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			BUK = {
				get_current_government_type = yes
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			BUK = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = KHI
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			release_puppet = TRK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
				}
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
	}
}

			UKR = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
					days = 500
				}
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = UKR
				civilian_intel = 50
				army_intel = 50
				navy_intel = 50
				airforce_intel = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.413 option socrus.413.b"
		name = socrus.413.b
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium
		add_political_power = -50

		}
	}

country_event = {
	#UKR receives Borotbyst sabotage
	id = socrus.414
	title = socrus.414.t
	desc = socrus.414.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.414 option socrus.414.a"
		name = socrus.414.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_large
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_small
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#POL socialist uprising guaranteed
	id = socrus.415
	title = socrus.415.t
	desc = socrus.415.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
			is_in_faction_with = AUS
		}
		UKR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BLR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BAT = {
			has_capitulated = yes
		}
		has_war_with = RUS
	}
	option = {
		#Based
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.415 option socrus.415.a"
		name = socrus.415.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_active_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat
				}
			}
			activate_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat
		}
		set_country_flag = POL_socialist_uprising_guaranteed
		set_temp_variable = {
			POL_influence_change = 100
		}
		POL_add_syndicalist_influence = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.415.a.tt
	}
}

	#Postwar congress of SSTR
	id = socrus.420

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			has_government = radical_socialist
			RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
		}
		text = socrus.420.d.psrdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		text = socrus.420.d.psrmax
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			has_country_leader = {
				character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
			}
		}
		text = socrus.420.d.vstcom
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		text = socrus.420.d.vstdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		text = socrus.420.d.other
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.420 option socrus.420.a"
		name = socrus.420.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.420 option socrus.420.b"
		name = socrus.420.b
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
	}
}

### Boldyrev's Free Russia Events ###
country_event = {
	#An Opportunity for Germany
	id = freerus.2
	title = freerus.2.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	desc = freerus.2.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.2 option freerus.2.a"
		name = freerus.2.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_enables_boldyrev_tt
		set_global_flag = RSA_enabled
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = freerus.3
			}
			#Boldyrev in Berlin
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.2 option freerus.2.b"
		name = freerus.2.b
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disables_boldyrev_tt
		add_manpower = 12500
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Boldyrev defeated
	id = freerus.4
	title = freerus.4.t
	desc = freerus.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev

		add_political_power = 30

				id = freerus.5

				random_days = 30

country_event = {
	#Boldyrev's Trial
	id = freerus.5
	title = freerus.5.t
	desc = freerus.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			MNR = {
				MNR_sultan_klych_girey = {
					set_nationality = MNR
				}
			}
			#In case he was moved to RSA by rsa.10
			RSA = {
				every_character = {
					limit = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
					}
					set_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
					set_nationality = RUS
					demote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.a"
		name = freerus.5.a		#No Mercy for traitors! Execute them all!
		RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = {
					is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
				}
			}
			kill_character = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_left = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = 4
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.b"
		name = freerus.5.b
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_general
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -40
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
						is_character = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
						is_character = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
					}
					has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.c"
		name = freerus.5.c
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = {
					is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = no
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Boldyrev activated by Germany
	id = freerus.10
	title = freerus.10.t
	desc = freerus.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		has_global_flag = RSA_enabled
	}
	immediate = {
		RSA = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = {
					transfer_technology = yes
				}
				RSA_setup_boldyrev = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
					has_war_with = RUS
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZR
						tag = FIN
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat_autonomous
						AND = {
							tag = UKR
							is_in_faction_with = AUS
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = freerus.11
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.10 option freerus.10.a"
		name = freerus.10.a		#Boldyrev is a traitor to Russia!
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.10 option freerus.10.b"
		name = freerus.10.b		#Boldyrev is a goddamn hero
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		RSA = {
			change_tag_from = ROOT
		}
	}
}

	#Negotiate with Boldyrev?
	id = freerus.20

	desc = freerus.20.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		is_subject = no
		NOT = {
			controls_state = 219
		}

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.20 option freerus.20.a"
		name = freerus.20.a		#Put end to this war...
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		RSA = {
			country_event = freerus.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.20 option freerus.20.b"
		name = freerus.20.b		#Never!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		#continue the war
		RSA = {
			country_event = freerus.22
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#For Boldyrev: Unification proposed
	id = freerus.21
	title = freerus.21.t
	desc = freerus.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.21 option freerus.21.a"
		name = freerus.21.a
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = {
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					country_event = russia.918
				}
				#Death of Savinkov
			}
			else = {
				country_event = rusfor.1300
			}
		}
	}
}

### Post-War Boldyrev Path
unit_leader_event = {
	#Restoration of 1922 Constitution
	id = freerus.40
	title = freerus.40.t
	desc = freerus.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.40 option freerus.40.a"
		name = freerus.40.a
		set_stability = 0
		hidden_effect = {
			add_research_slot_until_five = yes
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		country_event = {
			id = freerus.41
			days = 5
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Boldyrevites found their party
	id = freerus.42
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		}
		text = freerus.42.t.nat
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
		}
		text = freerus.42.t.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		}
		text = freerus.42.d.nat
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
		}
		text = freerus.42.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				}
				country_event = {
					id = freerus.43
					days = 7
				}
				RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = market_liberal_subtype
							traits = {
								RUS_marshal_of_old_republic
							}
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_conservative_subtype
							traits = {
								RUS_marshal_of_old_republic
							}
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = freerus.44
					days = 7
				}
				RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_liberal_subtype
							traits = {
								RUS_marshal_of_old_republic
							}
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_democrat_subtype
							traits = {
								RUS_marshal_of_old_republic
							}
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			GER = {
				country_event = {
					id = freerus.46
					days = 10
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = freerus.45
				days = 40
			}
			#First Elections of Free Russia
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.a"
		name = freerus.42.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = RSA_PATH_SOCLIB
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = RSA_PATH_MARLIB
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_marlib_boldyrev
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_marlib_boldyrev_tt
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.15
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_soclib_boldyrev
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_soclib_boldyrev_tt
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.15
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.b"
		name = freerus.42.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				GER = {
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = RSA_PATH_SOCDEM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdem_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_socdem_boldyrev_tt
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.c"
		name = freerus.42.c
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				GER = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = RSA_PATH_SOCCON
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_soccon_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_soccon_boldyrev_tt
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
			}

				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
			}

country_event = {
	#Elections
	id = freerus.45
	title = freerus.45.t
	desc = freerus.45.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_boldyrev = yes
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_elections
			country_event = {
				id = freerus.47
				days = 14
			}
			### Add news event
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.45 option freerus.45.a"
		name = freerus.45.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RSA_path
					option = DEFAULT
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = GER_supports_opposition
					has_country_flag = GER_supports_monarchy
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RSA_path
					option = RSA_PATH_OPPOSITION
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_socdem_boldyrev
			}
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				promote_character = {
					ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				}
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_gergard_zeller
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_gergard_zeller_sic
					desc = RUS_gergard_zeller_advisor_desc
					traits = {
						KR_determined_democrat
					}
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_socdems
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_soclib_boldyrev
			}
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				promote_character = {
					ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				}
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_liberal
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_martyanov_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soclibs
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_marlib_boldyrev
			}
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				promote_character = {
					ideology = market_liberal_subtype
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = market_liberal
				elections_allowed = yes
				election_frequency = 60
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_soccon_boldyrev
			}
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				promote_character = {
					ideology = social_conservative_subtype
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_conservative
				elections_allowed = yes
				election_frequency = 60
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat
			}
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				set_portraits = {
					civilian = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_vasily_boldyrev_civilian_large
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.45 option freerus.45.b"
		name = freerus.45.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RSA_path
					option = DEFAULT
				}
				has_country_flag = GER_supports_boldyrev
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RSA_path
						option = RSA_PATH_OPPOSITION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disables_boldyrev_ai_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		### Warning: DISABLES BOLDYREV CONTENT, AI option
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_postwar_parties = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = GER_supports_monarchy
			}
			RUS_create_vladimir = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_1
					}
				}
				add_ideas = RUS_imperial_popularity_1
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_monarchy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				}
				#Liberal opposition victory
				GER = {
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_soclib = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				}
				#Liberal opposition victory
				GER = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_marlib = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened				#Conservative opposition victory
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_soccon = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#GER meddling in elections
	id = freerus.46
	title = freerus.46.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		}
		text = freerus.46.d.nat
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
			}
		}
		text = freerus.46.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.46 option freerus.46.a"
		name = freerus.46.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.46 option freerus.46.b"
		name = freerus.46.b
		RSA = {
			set_country_flag = GER_supports_boldyrev
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.46 option freerus.46.c"
		name = freerus.46.c
		RSA = {
			set_country_flag = GER_supports_opposition
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.46 option freerus.46.e"
		name = freerus.46.e
		trigger = {
			GER_is_swr_path = yes
			#NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		}
		RSA = {
			set_country_flag = GER_supports_monarchy
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Recreate Autonomies
	id = freerus.47
	title = freerus.47.t
	desc = freerus.47.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			MNR = {
				exists = no
				any_core_state = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			KAZ = {
				exists = no
				any_core_state = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.47 option freerus.47.a"
		name = freerus.47.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		### Create Caucasus Autonomy
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = MNR
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
					has_state_flag = kalmyk_state
					has_state_flag = kabard_state
					has_state_flag = chechen_state
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = oskab_state
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier
				}
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy
			}
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		### Restore Alash Autonomy
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					country_exists = KAZ
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						has_state_flag = alash_state
					}
				}
				set_state_flag = alash_state
				add_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = RUS_CA_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

country_event = {
	#Our new bloc
	id = freerus.51
	title = freerus.51.t
	desc = freerus.51.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.51 option freerus.51.a"
		name = freerus.51.a
		add_threat = 10
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENT
						tag = JAP
					}
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					owns_state = 361
				}
			}
			#Washington DC
			var:361.owner = {
				create_faction = north_pacific_agreement
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = german_research
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Korpus Polski w Rosji
	id = rusfor.1
	title = rusfor.1.t
	desc = rusfor.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_intro
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		has_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1 option rusfor.1.a"
		name = rusfor.1.a
		division_template = {
			name = "Korpus Polski w Rosji"
			division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
			regiments = {
				infantry = {
					x = 0
					y = 0
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 0
					y = 1
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 0
					y = 2
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 0
					y = 3
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 1
					y = 0
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 1
					y = 1
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 1
					y = 2
				}
				infantry = {
					x = 1
					y = 3
				}
				artillery_brigade = {
					x = 2
					y = 0
				}
				medium_armor = {
					x = 3
					y = 0
				}
				medium_armor = {
					x = 3
					y = 1
				}
			}
			support = {
				mot_recon = {
					x = 0
					y = 0
				}
				engineer = {
					x = 0
					y = 1
				}
				signal_company = {
					x = 0
					y = 2
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				219
			}
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_korpus_polski_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"I Korpus Polski w Rosji\" division_template = \"Korpus Polski w Rosji\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1 option rusfor.1.b"
		name = rusfor.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_manpower = 7500
	}
}

		}
		text = rusfor.8.d.szrs
	}

		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		text = rusfor.8.d.rep
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		country_exists = SWF
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

		name = rusfor.8.a

				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -3
		}

		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FRA
			modifier = KR_pleased
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SPR
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		recall_volunteers_from = SPR
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SPK
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		recall_volunteers_from = SPK
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.8 option rusfor.8.b"
		name = rusfor.8.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}

		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}

			target = SPR
			modifier = volunteer_limit_plus_one
		}

			country_event = rusfor.9
		}
		event_option_tooltip = rusfor.9.a
	}
}

				}
			}
		}

country_event = {
	#Russia requests Military Access
	id = rusfor.12
	title = rusfor.12.t
	desc = rusfor.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.12 option rusfor.12.a"
		name = rusfor.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				THIS = {
					tag = FIN
				}
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					has_right_democratic_government = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PREV
				relation = military_access
				active = yes
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PREV
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			give_guarantee = PREV
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = PREV
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.13
					days = 3
					random_days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = RUS
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = INT
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = INT
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = ROOT
					modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Nope
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.12 option rusfor.12.b"
		name = rusfor.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				RUS = {
					has_left_democratic_government = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				tag = SCA
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = PREV
				modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.14
					days = 3
					random_days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

### Finnish Border Clash ###
country_event = {
	#Testing the Eagle
	id = rusfor.21
	title = rusfor.21.t
	desc = rusfor.21.d
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		FIN = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = FIN
				FIN = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.21 option rusfor.21.a"
		name = rusfor.21.a		#Make the necessary preparations
		add_political_power = -15
		activate_mission = RUS_FIN_clash
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.21 option rusfor.21.b"
		name = rusfor.21.b		#Sounds pointless
	}
}

	#Skirmish over Torosozero
	id = rusfor.22
	title = rusfor.22.t
	desc = rusfor.22.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.24
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.22 option rusfor.22.a"
		name = rusfor.22.a		#We can handle a bit of snow
		army_experience = 1
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.22 option rusfor.22.b"
		name = rusfor.22.b		#Send in reinforcements
		add_manpower = -600
		set_border_war_data = {
			attacker = 216
			defender = 146
			attacker_modifier = 0.1
		}
	}
}

### Pressure Finland ###
country_event = {
	#Demands to Finland
	id = rusfor.30
	title = rusfor.30.t
	desc = rusfor.30.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			owns_state = 146
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.30 option rusfor.30.a"
		name = rusfor.30.a		#Pro-Russian neutrality
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FIN_forpol
						option = DEFAULT
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FIN_forpol
						option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT
					}
				}
				has_left_democratic_government = no
				NOT = {
					FIN = {
						is_ally_with = INT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.31
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.30 option rusfor.30.b"
		name = rusfor.30.b		#Territorial concessions
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = {
					is_ally_with = INT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = {
					is_ally_with = SWE
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				var:146.owner = {
					tag = SCA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = FIN_forpol
					option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = -5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.31
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russia's Demands #for FIN
	id = rusfor.31
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.31.t.yya
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.31.t.karelia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.31.d.yya
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.31.d.karelia
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.a"
		name = rusfor.31.a		#If they want a fight, they'll get it!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = FIN_forpol
					option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = FIN_forpol
					option = FIN_FORPOL_GER
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.39
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.b"
		name = rusfor.31.b		#Appeal to Germany for diplomatic help
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			GER = {
				exists = yes
				has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = FIN
					has_war_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = FIN_forpol
					option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = rusfor.34
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.c"
		name = rusfor.31.c		#Accept the demands
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = FIN_forpol
						option = FIN_FORPOL_GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.32
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -10
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			effect_tooltip = {
				146 = {
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.33
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Friendship treaty with Russia
	id = rusfor.32
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	title = rusfor.32.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.32.d.finland
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.32.d.russia
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.32 option rusfor.32.a"
		name = rusfor.32.a		#Could have been worse
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
		set_country_flag = FIN_YYA		#for future use
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				give_guarantee = FIN
			}
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.32 option rusfor.32.b"
		name = rusfor.32.b		#Welcome back
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 2
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		give_guarantee = FIN
		FIN = {
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = {
				country_event = rusfor.32
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Finland appeals for German help
	id = rusfor.34
	title = rusfor.34.t
	desc = rusfor.34.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.34 option rusfor.34.a"
		name = rusfor.34.a		#Make the offer
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FIN = {
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_german_economic_influence > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_german_economic_influence > 5
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_sacrifice_influence_FIN
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.36
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.34 option rusfor.34.b"
		name = rusfor.34.b		#No, they are on their own
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_german_economic_influence < 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = {
					RUS_german_economic_influence < 2
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
		FIN = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.35
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

				}

		}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}

			}

				}
			}

			}

				146 = {
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.33
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Germans intervene in dispute
	id = rusfor.36
	title = rusfor.36.t
	desc = rusfor.36.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			owns_state = 146
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
			}
		}
		GER = {
			exists = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FIN
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.36 option rusfor.36.a"
		name = rusfor.36.a		#We'll accept this compromise
		trigger = {
			has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 4
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 5
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_influence_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		GER = {
			country_event = rusfor.37
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = rusfor.37
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.36 option rusfor.36.b"
		name = rusfor.36.b		#Refuse and push the demand
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger < 3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger < 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.05
		GER = {
			country_event = rusfor.38
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = rusfor.38
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Germany arranges compromise
	id = rusfor.37
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	title = {
		text = rusfor.37.t.finland
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.37.t.germany
		trigger = {
			tag = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.37.d.finland
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.37.d.germany
		trigger = {
			tag = GER
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.37 option rusfor.37.a"
		name = rusfor.37.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = FIN
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = GER
				modifier = KR_pleased
			}
			add_political_power = 25
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russians refuse German compromise
	id = rusfor.38
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	title = {
		text = rusfor.38.t.finland
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.38.t.germany
		trigger = {
			tag = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.38.d.finland
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.38.d.germany
		trigger = {
			tag = GER
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.a"
		name = rusfor.38.a		#Refuse the Russians anyway
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.39
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.b"
		name = rusfor.38.b		#Give in to Russia's demands
		trigger = {
			tag = FIN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.32
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -15
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			effect_tooltip = {
				146 = {
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.33
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.c"
		name = rusfor.38.c		#We expect no less from these warmongers
		trigger = {
			tag = GER
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Finland refuses demands
	id = rusfor.39
	title = rusfor.39.t
	desc = rusfor.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.39 option rusfor.39.a"
		name = rusfor.39.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = {
					is_in_faction = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FIN
			type = take_claimed_state
			generator = {
				146
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_defeat_finland
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = FIN
				value = -1000
			}
			FIN = {
				activate_mission = FIN_survive_russia
				add_ideas = FIN_war_for_survival
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.39 option rusfor.39.b"
		name = rusfor.39.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				FIN = {
					is_in_faction = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russians are winning
	id = rusfor.40
	title = rusfor.40.t
	desc = rusfor.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		RUS = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.3
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 146
			}
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 146
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					surrender_progress > 0.2
				}
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.4
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.40 option rusfor.40.a"
		name = rusfor.40.a		#We have no choice
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusfor.41
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.40 option rusfor.40.b"
		name = rusfor.40.b		#Never! We will fight to the last man!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = {
					exists = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.2
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Finland sues for peace
	id = rusfor.41
	title = rusfor.41.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			GER = {
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.41.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			GER = {
				exists = no
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.41.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FIN
		FIN = {
			exists = yes
			has_capitulated = no
			is_in_faction = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.41 option rusfor.41.a"
		name = rusfor.41.a		#Accept their surrender
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				GER = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 1
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 1
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_attack
				target = FIN
			}
			set_truce = {
				target = FIN
				days = 365
			}
		}
		FIN = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
					}
					ROOT = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = rusfor.42
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.41 option rusfor.41.b"
		name = rusfor.41.b		#Refuse - onwards to Helsinki!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
				GER = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = FIN
						has_war_with = ROOT
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
					}
				}
				GER = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_is_expansionist = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = rusfor.43
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russians agree to peace
	id = rusfor.42
	title = rusfor.42.t
	desc = rusfor.42.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.42 option rusfor.42.a"
		name = rusfor.42.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
					state = 146					#Karelia
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		146 = {
			enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = RUS
						is_ally_with = INT
					}
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = FIN_war_for_survival
				}
				remove_ideas = FIN_war_for_survival
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.155
				days = 10
			}
			#Flight of the Karelians
		}
	}
}
