country_event = {
	#Finland is winning the war
	id = rusfor.48
	title = rusfor.48.t
	desc = rusfor.48.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		FIN = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = {
				surrender_progress > 0.4
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 146
				}
				controls_state = 146
			}
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 195
			}
			FIN = {
				controls_state = 195
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 213
			}
			FIN = {
				controls_state = 213
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 215
			}
			FIN = {
				controls_state = 215
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 216
			}
			FIN = {
				controls_state = 216
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 722
			}
			FIN = {
				controls_state = 722
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.48 option rusfor.48.a"
		name = rusfor.48.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -150
		if = {
			limit = {
				146 = {
					is_owned_by = FIN
					is_claimed_by = RUS
				}
			}
			146 = {
				remove_claim_by = RUS
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 2
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 2
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = rusfor.49
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						state = 146						#Viipuri
						state = 213						#Murmansk
						state = 215						#Kem
						state = 216						#Petrozavodsk
						state = 722						#Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russians sue for peace
	id = rusfor.49
	title = rusfor.49.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.49.d.winning
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.49.d.timeout
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.49 option rusfor.49.a"
		name = rusfor.49.a		#Unbelievable!
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		RUS = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 146						#Viipuri
						state = 213						#Murmansk
						state = 215						#Kem
						state = 216						#Petrozavodsk
						state = 722						#Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.49 option rusfor.49.b"
		name = rusfor.49.b		#A great day for Finland
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#War with Finland times out
	id = rusfor.50
	title = rusfor.50.t
	desc = rusfor.50.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.50 option rusfor.50.a"
		name = rusfor.50.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				146 = {
					is_owned_by = FIN
					is_claimed_by = RUS
				}
			}
			146 = {
				remove_claim_by = RUS
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		FIN = {
			country_event = rusfor.49
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russia offers alliance to FIN
	id = rusfor.51
	title = rusfor.51.t
	desc = rusfor.51.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FIN_parliament_house
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.51 option rusfor.51.a"
		name = rusfor.51.a		#Agree
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						FIN = {
							has_left_democratic_government = yes
						}
						RUS = {
							has_elected_government = yes
							is_monarchy = no
							NOT = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						FIN = {
							has_completed_focus = FIN_mannerheims_ascendancy
						}
						RUS = {
							is_monarchy = yes
							RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
								is_second_in_command = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
				SCA_nordic_council_available = no
				var:141.owner = {
					has_socialist_government = no
				}
				# Stockholm
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				add_to_faction = FIN
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.71
				hours = 8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.51 option rusfor.51.b"
		name = rusfor.51.b		#No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						FIN = {
							has_left_democratic_government = yes
						}
						RUS = {
							has_elected_government = yes
							is_monarchy = no
							NOT = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						FIN = {
							has_completed_focus = FIN_mannerheims_ascendancy
						}
						RUS = {
							is_monarchy = yes
							RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
								is_second_in_command = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
				SCA_nordic_council_available = no
				var:141.owner = {
					has_socialist_government = no
				}
				# Stockholm
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.52
				hours = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russian-Entente Alliance
	id = rusfor.65
	title = rusfor.65.t
	desc = rusfor.65.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_CAN_commons2
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RUS_ENT_merge
		ENT = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.65 option rusfor.65.a"
		name = rusfor.65.a
		GEX = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ENT
				}
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ENT
					is_subject = no
				}
				ROOT = {
					add_to_faction = PREV
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_faction_name = RUS_entente
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = CAN_joins_iedc
			CAN_transfer_iedc_leadership = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_dismantle_economic_treaty = yes
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
					is_subject = no
				}
				display_individual_scopes = yes
				set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
				ENT = {
					add_to_faction = PREV
				}
			}
			ENT = {
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
			set_country_flag = CAN_joined_iedc
			clr_country_flag = CAN_invited_to_iedc
			clr_country_flag = CAN_refused_iedc
			set_temp_variable = {
				sphere_target = ROOT
			}
			event_target:iedc_leader = {
				add_to_economic_sphere = yes
			}
			CAN_transfer_entente_leader = yes
			set_faction_name = RUS_entente
		}
	}
}

### Generic diplomacy events ###
country_event = {
	#Russia offers us an alliance
	id = rusfor.70
	title = rusfor.70.t
	desc = rusfor.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			OR = {
				both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = yes
				RUS_VST_right = yes
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.a"
		name = rusfor.70.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_forpol
								option = EST_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ETH
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = ETH_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = GRE
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GRE_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GRE_forpol
								option = GRE_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = IRE_forpol
							option = IRE_FORPOL_NEUT
						}
						has_war = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRQ
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = IRQ_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LAT_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LAT_forpol
								option = LAT_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = PRF
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = PRF_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = PRF_forpol
								option = PRF_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = SYR
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = SYR_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = TUR
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = TUR_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = TUR_forpol
								option = TUR_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							AND = {
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = TUR_forpol
									option = TUR_FORPOL_BPL
								}
								has_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						is_in_faction_with = BPL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = BPL_dissolution
										option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = BPL_dissolution
										option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN
									}
								}
								OR = {
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = yes
									}
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = no
										has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									AUS = {
										exists = no
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									AUS = {
										is_subject = yes
									}
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_guaranteed = ROOT
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gives_military_access_to = ROOT
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				gives_military_access_to = GER
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = LAT
			}
			LAT_join_RUS = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SER
				SER = {
					has_elected_government = yes
				}
				RUS = {
					has_elected_government = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.83
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = BPL
			}
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = future_serbian_ally
			}
			belgrade_pact_is_disbanded = yes
			set_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.71
				hours = 8
			}
		}
		#Country accepts
		if = {
			#Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
				ROOT = {
					has_socialist_government = no
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.b"
		name = rusfor.70.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_in_faction_with = BPL
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = BPL_dissolution
						option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = BPL_dissolution
						option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN
							}
						}
						OR = {
							AUS = {
								is_faction_leader = yes
							}
							AUS = {
								is_faction_leader = no
								has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							AUS = {
								exists = no
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							AUS = {
								is_subject = yes
							}
						}
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = BPL_dissolution
						option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = BPL_dissolution
						option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = TUR_is_ottomans
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_divisions < 25
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.72
				hours = 8
			}
		}
		if = {
			#Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
				ROOT = {
					has_socialist_government = no
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.c"
		name = rusfor.70.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = EST_forpol
								option = EST_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ETH
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = ETH_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = GRE
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GRE_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GRE_forpol
								option = GRE_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = IRE_forpol
							option = IRE_FORPOL_SITUATIONAL
						}
						has_war = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRQ
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = IRQ_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LAT_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = LAT_forpol
								option = LAT_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = PRF
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = PRF_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = PRF_forpol
								option = PRF_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = SYR
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = SYR_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = TUR
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = TUR_forpol
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = TUR_forpol
								option = TUR_FORPOL_RUS
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							AND = {
								has_game_rule = {
									rule = TUR_forpol
									option = TUR_FORPOL_BPL
								}
								has_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						is_in_faction_with = BPL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = BPL_dissolution
										option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN
									}
									has_game_rule = {
										rule = BPL_dissolution
										option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN
									}
								}
								OR = {
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = yes
									}
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = no
										has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									AUS = {
										exists = no
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									AUS = {
										is_subject = yes
									}
								}
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = BPL_dissolution
								option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.75
				hours = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Country accepts
	id = rusfor.71
	title = rusfor.71.t
	desc = rusfor.71.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			has_capitulated = no
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.71 option rusfor.71.a"
		name = rusfor.71.a
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Country wants their claims back
	id = rusfor.72
	title = rusfor.72.t
	desc = rusfor.72.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.72 option rusfor.72.a"
		name = rusfor.72.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = FROM
				}
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				every_core_state = {
					remove_core_of = ROOT
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						tag = LAT
					}
					has_idea = LAT_leave_russia
				}
				remove_ideas = LAT_leave_russia
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.73
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.72 option rusfor.72.b"
		name = rusfor.72.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tag = TUR
				}
				has_completed_focus = RUS_new_brother
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_new_brother
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.74
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russia accepts
	id = rusfor.73
	title = rusfor.73.t
	desc = rusfor.73.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.73 option rusfor.71.a"
		name = rusfor.71.a
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						original_tag = LAT
					}
					has_idea = LAT_leave_russia
				}
				remove_ideas = LAT_leave_russia
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			remove_core_of = FROM
			remove_claim_by = FROM
		}
		if = {
			#Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
				ROOT = {
					has_socialist_government = no
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence
		}
	}
}

#Other Foreign Policy Events
country_event = {
	#Russia demands Territories
	id = rusfor.80
	title = rusfor.80.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = rusfor.80.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				PER = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		text = rusfor.80.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			can_declare_war_on = ROOT
		}
		OR = {
			owns_state = 418			#Ashkhabad
			418 = {
				owner = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.80 option rusfor.80.a"
		name = rusfor.80.a		#accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		event_option_tooltip = rusfor.81.a
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.81
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.80 option rusfor.80.b"
		name = rusfor.80.b		#Never!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				is_in_faction = yes
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				FROM = {
					any_enemy_country = {
						is_actual_major = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				owns_state = 229				#Azerbaijan
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				tag = TUR
				NOT = {
					has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				#Don't start war over only Ashkhabad
				factor = 0
				PER = {
					owns_state = 418					#Ashkhabad
					NOT = {
						owns_state = 229
					}
					#Azerbaijan
				}
				num_subjects < 1
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.82
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Iran accepts!
	id = rusfor.81
	title = rusfor.81.t
	desc = rusfor.81.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.81 option rusfor.81.a"
		name = rusfor.81.a		#Hurray!
		FROM = {
			every_subject_country = {
				display_individual_scopes = yes
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = GEO
						original_tag = ARM
						original_tag = AZR
						is_central_asian_tag = yes
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					annex_country = {
						target = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		418 = {
			#Ashkhabad
			transfer_state_to = var:584.owner			#Karakum, either RUS or their CA puppet
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						original_tag = PER
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PER
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Iran refuses
	id = rusfor.82
	title = rusfor.82.t
	desc = rusfor.82.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.82 option rusfor.86.a"
		name = rusfor.86.a		#Then it is war
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.82 option rusfor.86.b"
		name = rusfor.86.b		#Back down
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russian demands ROM
	id = rusfor.85
	title = rusfor.85.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.85.d.ROM
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.85.d.ROM_overlord
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				original_tag = ROM
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		ROM = {
			owns_state = 78
		}
		#Bessarabia
		OR = {
			FROM = {
				can_declare_war_on = ROOT
			}
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = {
					is_ally_with = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			NOT = {
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM
			}
			NOT = {
				has_guaranteed = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				has_guaranteed = ROM
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.85 option rusfor.85.a"
		name = rusfor.85.a		#accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ROM
				has_government = national_populist
				has_idea = ROM_great_game
				NOT = {
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			ROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							is_claimed_by = FROM
							state = 78							#Bessarabia
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.87
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.85 option rusfor.85.b"
		name = rusfor.85.b		#Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = FROM
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.86
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			is_ally_with = FROM
		}

	trigger = {

			owns_state = 78
		}
		#Bessarabia

			can_declare_war_on = FROM

				is_subject = yes
				overlord = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_guaranteed = FROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_guaranteed = ROM
		}
	}

			}
		}

		name = rusfor.86.b

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		remove_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_Demand_Bessarabia
			target = ROM
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.87
	title = rusfor.87.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.87.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.87.d.ally
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = FROM
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		ROM = {
			owns_state = 78
		}
		#Bessarabia
		OR = {
			can_declare_war_on = FROM
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_guaranteed = FROM
		}
		NOT = {
			has_guaranteed = ROM
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.87 option rusfor.87.a"
		name = rusfor.87.a
		remove_targeted_decision = {
			decision = RUS_Demand_Bessarabia
			target = ROM
		}
		ROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 78						#Bessarabia
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_ally_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						original_tag = ROM
					}
					NOT = {
						is_ally_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FROM
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russia demands Armenia
	id = rusfor.90
	title = rusfor.90.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.90.d.TUR
		trigger = {
			tag = TUR
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.90.d.TUR_overlord
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = TUR
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.90 option rusfor.90.a"
		name = rusfor.90.a		#accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			TUR = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							state = 230							#Yerevan
							state = 585							#Batumi
							state = 1000							#Kars
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.92
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.90 option rusfor.85.b"
		name = rusfor.85.b		#Never!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.91
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.91 option rusfor.91.b"
		name = rusfor.91.b		#Back down

			base = 0
		}
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
	}

country_event = {
	#Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.92
	title = rusfor.92.t
	desc = rusfor.92.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.92 option rusfor.92.a"
		name = rusfor.92.a		#Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
		TUR = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 230
				}
				230 = {
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 585
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = GEO
					}
					585 = {
						transfer_state_to = GEO
					}
				}
				else = {
					585 = {
						transfer_state_to = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					owns_state = 1000
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = ARM
					}
					1000 = {
						transfer_state_to = ARM
					}
				}
				else = {
					1000 = {
						transfer_state_to = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						original_tag = TUR
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = rusfor.95
	title = rusfor.95.t
	desc = rusfor.95.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.95 option rusfor.95.a"
		name = rusfor.95.a		#Accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = GAL
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = {
						owns_state = 73
					}
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.98
					random_hours = 24
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_galicia = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.96
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.95 option rusfor.95.b"
		name = rusfor.95.b		#refuse
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.97
				days = 2
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

			base = 0
		}

		for_each_scope_loop = {

				active = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {

				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = rusfor.101
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	title = {
		text = rusfor.101.t.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.101.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.101.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.101.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = var:global.russia
		owns_state = 78		#Bessarabia
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:global.russia = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			var:global.russia = {
				controls_state = 78				#Bessarabia
				controls_state = 79				#Moldavia
			}
			#Romania wins
			var:global.russia = {
				surrender_progress > 0.15
			}
			controls_state = 202			#Kiev
			controls_state = 226			#Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192				#Odessa
				controls_state = 198				#Vinnitsa
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197					#Kherson
					controls_state = 199					#Proskurov
					controls_state = 203					#Cherkasy
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = {
			flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace
			days = 90
			value = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.25
					RUS = {
						controls_state = 78						#Bessarabia
						controls_state = 79						#Moldavia
					}
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = {
				flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
				days = 60
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.a"
		name = rusfor.101.a		#We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.102
				days = 1
				random_hours = 24
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.b"
		name = rusfor.101.b		#We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.c"
		name = rusfor.101.c		#We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.102
				days = 1
				random_hours = 24
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.d"
		name = rusfor.101.d		#No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

		text = rusfor.102.t.victory

	}

		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.102.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}

		text = rusfor.102.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}

		}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}

		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.104
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.c"

		trigger = {

		}
		FROM = {

		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.d"
		name = rusfor.102.d		#To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!

			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.104
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Treaty of Chisinau
	id = rusfor.103
	title = rusfor.103.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.103.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.103.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.103 option rusfor.103.a"
		name = rusfor.103.a		#United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78					#Bessarabia
					AND = {
						state = 80						#Cernauti
						FROM = {
							RUS_is_expansionist = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = {
				target = ROOT
				days = 730
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.103 option rusfor.103.b"
		name = rusfor.103.b
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78			#Bessarabia
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = {
				target = ROOT
				days = 730
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#FROM accepts trade deal (for RUS)
	id = rusfor.106
	title = rusfor.106.t
	desc = rusfor.106.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Splendid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.106 option rusfor.106.a"
		name = rusfor.106.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2
				add_idea = RUS_INT_deal_3
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_INT_deal_2
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
				target = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#UKR gets Anti-German Resistance
	id = rusfor.110
	title = rusfor.110.t
	desc = rusfor.110.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Cringe!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.110 option rusfor.110.a"
		name = rusfor.110.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_antigerman_sabotage
			days = 450
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
					has_government = national_populist
				}
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_crimea_resistance
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				137 = {
					force_enable_resistance = RUS
					start_resistance = yes
					add_resistance = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Failure of POL national uprising
	id = rusfor.111
	title = rusfor.111.t
	desc = rusfor.111.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			POL = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			POL = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
			}
			AND = {
				UKR = {
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
				BLR = {
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Based
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.111 option rusfor.111.a"
		name = rusfor.111.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_national_committee
	}
}

						target = BLR

						army_intel = 40

						airforce_intel = 40
					}
				}
				add_intel = {
					target = BLR
					civilian_intel = 40
					army_intel = 40
					navy_intel = 40
					airforce_intel = 40
				}
			}
			if = {

							target = BAT

					}
				}

					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Russians Propose Trade Deal
	id = rusfor.113
	title = rusfor.113.t
	desc = rusfor.113.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Accept
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.113 option rusfor.113.a"
		name = rusfor.113.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_american_tag = yes
					is_chinese_tag = yes
					tag = JAP
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 40
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc_aat = yes
				}
				add_cic = 300
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 20
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc_aat = yes
				}
				add_cic = 150
			}
		}
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_pacific_trade
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = rusfor.116
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = rusfor.114
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Refuse
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.113 option rusfor.113.b"
		name = rusfor.113.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.115
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#They have accepted.
	id = rusfor.114
	title = rusfor.114.t
	desc = rusfor.114.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.114 option rusfor.114.a"
		name = rusfor.114.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_american_tag = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_major_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.05
			}
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_new_refineries
				bonus = 0.33
				uses = 1
				category = synth_resources
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = motorized_equipment
				amount = 500
				producer = USA
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = CAN
						tag = GBR
						tag = GBP
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.03
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = convoy
				amount = 100
				producer = CAN
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_indian_tag = yes
						tag = SAF
						tag = AST
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_small_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.02
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = JAP
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_major_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.04
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.05
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						tag = CHN
					}
				}
				408 = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
				}
				409 = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
				}
				657 = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_danubian_tag = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.03
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_italian_tag = yes
						tag = NFA
						tag = FRP
						tag = TUR
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				RUS_state_export_cg = 0.03
			}
		}
	}
}

				}

					RUS_influence_change = -1

				}
			}
		}

country_event = {
	#Decision for approach to China
	id = rusfor.125
	title = rusfor.125.t
	desc = rusfor.125.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Wargoals against all China tags
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.125 option rusfor.125.a"
		name = rusfor.125.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					var:650.owner = {
						is_ally_with = JAP
					}
					#Chonqing
					NOT = {
						country_exists = CUF
					}
				}
				var:608.owner = {
					#Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				var:608.owner = {
					#Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 5
			name = rusfor.125.a
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_chinese_tag = yes
				ROOT = {
					can_declare_war_on = PREV
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				create_wargoal = {
					type = topple_government
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Trade deal
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.125 option rusfor.125.b"
		name = rusfor.125.b
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = RUS_sino_russian_relations_peaceful
		effect_tooltip = {
			activate_targeted_decision = {
				decision = RUS_trade_deal_china
				target = CHN
			}
		}
		LEC_remove_from_legation_council = yes
	}
}

			target = FROM
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}

			if = {
				limit = {

				}

	}

			base = 0
		}

country_event = {
	#Russia Approachs... And Presents...
	id = rusfor.128
	title = rusfor.128.t
	desc = rusfor.128.desc
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.129
					days = 30
				}
			}
			#Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.a"
		name = rusfor.128.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = {
					target = RUS
					value > 100
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = {
						is_ally_with = RUS
					}
					617 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
					}
					#Dihua
				}
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = {
		#Gib Mongol claims
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.b"
		name = rusfor.128.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = {
						is_ally_with = RUS
					}
					617 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
					}
					#Dihua
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = {
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
				330 = {
					is_owned_by = RUS
				}
				#Mongolia
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
	}
	option = {
		#Gib East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.c"
		name = rusfor.128.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ETS = {
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
				617 = {
					is_owned_by = RUS
				}
				#Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = {
		#Gib Mongol claims and all of East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.e"
		name = rusfor.128.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = {
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
				330 = {
					is_owned_by = RUS
				}
				#Mongolia
			}
			OR = {
				ETS = {
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
				617 = {
					is_owned_by = RUS
				}
				#Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = {
		#How about no?
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.f"
		name = rusfor.128.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
	id = rusfor.129
	title = rusfor.129.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc1
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc2
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc3
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc4
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc5
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
		}
	}
	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		FROM = {
			exists = yes
			is_subject = no
			at_war_with_or_justifying_wargoal_against_ROOT = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Cool
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.a"
		name = rusfor.129.a
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			FROM = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
					add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			FROM = {
				add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = MON
				MON = {
					is_in_faction = no
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				give_guarantee = MON
			}
			give_guarantee = MON
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = {
		#Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.b"
		name = rusfor.129.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			FROM = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
					add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			FROM = {
				add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				ETS = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			ETS = {
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				puppet = ETS
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				NOT = {
					country_exists = ETS
				}
				617 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
				#Dihua
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_xinjiang = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				MON = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			MON = {
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				puppet = MON
			}
			MON = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						region = 222
					}
					#Inner Mongolia - Inner Mongolia = Chinese areas, Outer Mongolia = "Modern Mongolia"
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				NOT = {
					country_exists = MON
				}
				330 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
				#Mongolia
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_mongolia = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = {
		#Nope
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.c"
		name = rusfor.129.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = {
		#China tells us to go away
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.d"
		name = rusfor.129.d
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Time for a Truce? #CHN offers peace
	id = rusfor.130
	title = rusfor.130.t
	desc = rusfor.130.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		is_chinese_tag = yes		#to limit checks a bit
		tag = CHN
		var:566.owner = {
			#Irkutsk
			has_war_with = ROOT
			tag = var:global.russia
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:566.owner = {
			surrender_progress > 0.15
		}
		count_triggers = {
			amount = 2
			408 = {
				#Vladivostok
				owner = {
					is_ally_with = 566.owner
				}
				controller = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			566 = {
				#Irkutsk
				owner = {
					is_ally_with = 566.owner
				}
				controller = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			407 = {
				#Tashkent
				owner = {
					is_ally_with = 566.owner
				}
				controller = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.130 option rusfor.130.a"
		name = rusfor.130.a
		var:566.owner = {
			country_event = rusfor.132
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.130 option rusfor.130.b"
		name = rusfor.130.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.2
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Time for a Truce? #RUS receives peace
	id = rusfor.132
	title = rusfor.132.t
	desc = rusfor.132.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.132 option rusfor.132.a"
		name = rusfor.132.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					original_tag = JAP
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_japan_tt
			FROM = {
				country_event = rusfor.133
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					original_tag = MON
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_mongolia_tt
			FROM = {
				country_event = rusfor.1350
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_china_tt
			FROM = {
				country_event = rusfor.135
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.132 option rusfor.132.b"
		name = rusfor.132.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.2
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.134
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#End of the Second Russo-Japanese War (can only fire if FER does not exist)
	id = rusfor.133
	title = rusfor.133.t
	desc = rusfor.133.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.133 option rusfor.133.a"
		name = rusfor.133.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					owns_state = 577
				}
			}
			#North Sakhalin
			transfer_state = 577
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			target = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				#Larger FER if Japan controls China
				var:608.owner = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
				#Beijing
				var:884.owner = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
				#Xing'an
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
					}
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						is_mongolia = yes
						AND = {
							CHN = {
								is_subject_of = JAP
							}
							is_claimed_by = CHN
						}
						region = 148						#Primorye
						region = 260						#Amur
						region = 259						#Transbaikal
						region = 149						#Russian Far East
						state = 644						#Northeastern Siberia
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
					}
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						region = 148						#Primorye
						region = 260						#Amur
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = FROM
					}
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_state_claim = 577
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russians Refuse
	id = rusfor.134
	title = rusfor.134.t
	desc = rusfor.134.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.134 option rusfor.134.a"
		name = rusfor.134.a

}

country_event = {
	#Second Treaty of Aigun #for CHN
	id = rusfor.135
	title = rusfor.135.t
	desc = rusfor.135.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.135 option rusfor.135.a"
		name = rusfor.135.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			target = ROOT
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					is_ally_with = FROM
				}
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT					#Only transfer Outer Manchuria if China has claims on it
					is_core_china = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_tibet = yes
					state = 329					#Tuva
				}
			}
			transfer_state_during_war = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = FROM
					}
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = {
					target = FROM
					days = 1095
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### Post-WK2 Foreign Policy ###
country_event = {
	#Russia Demands Our Subjugation
	id = rusfor.150
	title = rusfor.150.t
	desc = rusfor.150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.150 option rusfor.150.a"
		name = rusfor.150.a		#Yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = {
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				puppet = ROOT
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.151
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.150 option rusfor.150.b"
		name = rusfor.150.b		#No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				add = -70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = {
						any_enemy_country = {
							is_actual_major = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.152
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#FROM Accepts
	id = rusfor.151
	title = rusfor.151.t
	desc = rusfor.151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.151 option rusfor.151.a"
		name = rusfor.151.a
		remove_targeted_decision = {
			target = FROM
			decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe
		}
		FROM = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
			end_wars = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.152
	title = rusfor.152.t
	desc = rusfor.152.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.152 option rusfor.152.a"
		name = rusfor.152.a		#War
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.152 option rusfor.152.b"
		name = rusfor.152.b		#Back down
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		remove_targeted_decision = {
			target = FROM
			decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe
		}
		FROM = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_cannot_subjugate
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Anti Internationale Pact Event
	id = rusfor.202
	title = rusfor.202.t
	desc = rusfor.202.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_october
	option = {
		#We shall join the crusade against the reds
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.202 option rusfor.202.a"
		name = rusfor.202.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				is_ally_with = ENT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = SCA
					tag = SWI
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						OR = {
							has_guarantor = yes
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_USA
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_TEX
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_PSA
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_NEE
						}
						NOT = {
							is_guaranteed_by = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = IRE
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = IRE_forpol
					option = IRE_FORPOL_NEUT
				}
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_internationale_pact
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_guaranteed_by = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				give_guarantee = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRA = {
				country_event = rusfor.203
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = rusfor.203
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#None of our business
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.202 option rusfor.202.c"
		name = rusfor.202.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_opinion = {
					target = INT
					value > 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
				has_democratic_government = yes
				NOT = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.75
					hours = 8
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Tilsit Conference Demands
	id = rusfor.207
	title = rusfor.207.t
	desc = rusfor.207.desc
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Demand mutual guarantees to remaining neutral countries in Europe (clause a)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.a"
		name = rusfor.207.a
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_authoritarian_government = no
				NOT = {
					has_government = totalist
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_conference
					option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS
				}
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
					}
				}
				tag = RUS
				ENT = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							CSA = {
								is_ally_with = INT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							USA = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							PSA = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							NEE = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							TEX = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.208
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				INT = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.208
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_power_change = -5
			}
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.208
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Demand White Peace with Entente (clause b)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.b"
		name = rusfor.207.b
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
				}
			}
			tag = RUS
			ENT = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
				AND = {
					NOT = {
						CSA = {
							is_ally_with = INT
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						USA = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						PSA = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						NEE = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						TEX = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					RUS_savinkov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = rusfor.207.b.tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.211
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				INT = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.211
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_power_change = -5
			}
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.211
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Demand Mutual Army Limits (clause c)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.c"
		name = rusfor.207.c
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_government = syndicalist
					has_government = radical_socialist
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_conference
					option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS
				}
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
					}
				}
				tag = RUS
				ENT = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							CSA = {
								is_ally_with = INT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							USA = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							PSA = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							NEE = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							TEX = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_army_limits
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.212
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				INT = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.212
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_power_change = -5
			}
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.212
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Demand Embargo of Entente (clause d)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.d"
		name = rusfor.207.d
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed
				}
			}
			is_ally_with = INT
			ENT = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.213
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#That's all for now
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.e"
		name = rusfor.207.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
					}
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_conference
					option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = {
						is_ai = no
					}
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.207
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				INT = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.207
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.214
				days = 1
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.214
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

		}
	}
	title = {

		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d1
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d2
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d3
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d4
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Wonderful
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.209 option rusfor.209.a"
		name = rusfor.209.a
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response

			clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response
		}
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response
		}
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.207
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Negotiations collapse
	id = rusfor.210
	title = rusfor.210.t
	desc = rusfor.210.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Oh welp
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.210 option rusfor.210.a"
		name = rusfor.210.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			set_global_flag = tilsit_peace_collapsed
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Other party demands white peace with Entente (clause b)
	id = rusfor.211
	title = rusfor.211.t
	desc = rusfor.211.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.211 option rusfor.211.a"
		name = rusfor.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_conference
					option = RUS_CONFERENCE_FAILURE
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				CSA = {
					is_ally_with = INT
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_conference
						option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = RUS
					ratio < 0.3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				var:361.owner = {
					is_ally_with = IMP
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				INT = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				GRU = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
				}
				OR = {
					51 = {
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					#Eastern Rhineland
					55 = {
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					#Hesse
					781 = {
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					#Western Rhineland
					8 = {
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					#Luxembourg
					741 = {
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					#Verviers
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.209
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.211 option rusfor.211.b"
		name = rusfor.211.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				var:361.owner = {
					is_ally_with = IMP
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_conference
					option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.210
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Other party demands mutual army limits (clause c)
	id = rusfor.212
	title = rusfor.212.t
	desc = rusfor.212.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.212 option rusfor.212.a"
		name = rusfor.212.a

			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_conference
						option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS

				factor = 5
