country_event = {
	#Tilsit Succeeds
	id = rusfor.214
	title = rusfor.214.t
	desc = rusfor.214.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.214 option rusfor.214.a"
		name = rusfor.214.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = INT
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_power_change = 10
			}
			RUS_change_projection = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				news_event = {
					id = rusnews.26
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			#Executes clause a
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_guaranteed_by = RUS
						}
					}
					add_to_array = {
						RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries = THIS
					}
					for_each_loop = {
						array = RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						RUS = {
							give_guarantee = v
						}
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					set_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = FRA
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_guaranteed_by = ENG
						}
					}
					add_to_array = {
						ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries = THIS
					}
					for_each_loop = {
						array = ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						ENG = {
							give_guarantee = v
						}
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							has_war_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = INT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
						NOT = {
							is_guaranteed_by = FRA
						}
					}
					add_to_array = {
						FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries = THIS
					}
					for_each_loop = {
						array = FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						FRA = {
							give_guarantee = v
						}
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done
					}
					RUS = {
						has_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			#Executes clause b
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					has_war_with = INT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = {
										is_ally_with = INT
									}
									any_neighbor_state = {
										controller = {
											is_ally_with = INT
										}
									}
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = INT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = {
										controller = {
											is_ally_with = INT
										}
									}
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = INT
					has_war_with = ENT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = {
										is_ally_with = ENT
									}
									any_neighbor_state = {
										controller = {
											is_ally_with = ENT
										}
									}
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = {
										controller = {
											is_ally_with = ENT
										}
									}
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			INT = {
				ENT = {
					white_peace_with_PREV = yes
				}
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = faction_members
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = ENT.faction_members
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = PREV
							relation = non_aggression_pact
						}
						set_truce = {
							target = PREV
							days = 365
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed
			}
			set_global_flag = tilsit_peace_success
		}
		if = {
			#Executes clause c
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				RUS = {
					add_ideas = RUS_army_limits
				}
				RUS = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = INT
				}
				ENG = {
					add_ideas = RUS_army_limits
				}
				FRA = {
					add_ideas = RUS_army_limits
				}
				RUS = {
					set_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done
					}
					RUS = {
						has_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done
				}
				RUS = {
					clr_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			#Executes clause d
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				effect_tooltip = {
					every_other_country = {
						limit = {
							is_ally_with = ENT
						}
						embargo_PREV = yes
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = ENT.faction_members
						for_each_scope_loop = {
							array = RUS.faction_members
							embargo_PREV = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Russia invites socialist country in INT to alliance
	id = rusfor.250
	title = rusfor.250.t
	desc = rusfor.250.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.250 option rusfor.250.a"
		name = rusfor.250.a
		leave_faction = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.251
		}
		INT = {
			country_event = rusfor.253
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.250 option rusfor.250.b"
		name = rusfor.250.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.252
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#FROM says yes
	id = rusfor.251
	title = rusfor.251.t
	desc = rusfor.251.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.251 option rusfor.251.a"
		name = rusfor.251.a
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
}

country_event = {
	#FROM says no
	id = rusfor.252
	title = rusfor.252.t
	desc = rusfor.252.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.252 option rusfor.252.a"
		name = rusfor.252.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	#INT is notified
	id = rusfor.253
	title = rusfor.253.t
	desc = rusfor.253.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Sanction them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.253 option rusfor.253.a"
		name = rusfor.253.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		send_embargo = FROM
		send_embargo = RUS
	}
	option = {
		#Kill them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.253 option rusfor.253.b"
		name = rusfor.253.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
	}
}

### TREATY OF MOSCOW ###
country_event = {
	#For GER - hidden event to fire peace
	id = rusfor.1299
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = GER
		has_war_with = RUS
		RUS = {
			surrender_progress > 0.5
			OR = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_in_faction_with = INT
			}
		}
		surrender_progress < 0.3
		is_faction_leader = yes
		OR = {
			RUS = {
				surrender_progress > 0.95
			}
			NOT = {
				219 = {
					is_controlled_by = RUS
				}
				#Moscow
				195 = {
					is_controlled_by = RUS
				}
				#Petrograd
				217 = {
					is_controlled_by = RUS
				}
				#Tsaritsyn
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1299 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = russia.918
			}
			#Death of Savinkov
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = socrus.430
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = rusfor.1300
			RUS = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_surrender_limit_idea
				add_ideas = has_scripted_peace
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#For GER - ask for peace with RUS
	id = rusfor.1300
	title = rusfor.1300.t
	desc = rusfor.1300.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = RUS
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#yea
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1300 option rusfor.1300.a"
		name = rusfor.1300.a
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1301
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#no
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1300 option rusfor.1300.b"
		name = rusfor.1300.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.1
		RUS = {
			add_ideas = RUS_patriotic_war_3
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#RUS gets event
	id = rusfor.1301
	title = rusfor.1301.t
	desc = rusfor.1301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1301 option rusfor.1301.a"
		name = rusfor.1301.a
		event_option_tooltip = rusfor.1302.a
		GER = {
			country_event = rusfor.1302
		}
	}
	option = {
		#No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1301 option rusfor.1301.b"
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		name = rusfor.1301.b
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.2
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#GER gets event
	id = rusfor.1302
	title = rusfor.1302.t
	desc = rusfor.1302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1302 option rusfor.1302.a"
		name = rusfor.1302.a
		RUS = {
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = PREV
					is_central_asian_tag = no
					has_capitulated = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_subject_of = PREV
					}
					remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						is_subject = no
					}
					leave_faction = yes
				}
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								tag = MON
								tag = MNR
							}
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						set_political_party = {
							ideology = totalist
							popularity = 0
						}
						set_political_party = {
							ideology = radical_socialist
							popularity = 0
						}
						set_political_party = {
							ideology = syndicalist
							popularity = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_dismantle_economic_treaty = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
				}
				remove_from_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_set_up_peace_conference_with_germany = yes
		}
		start_peace_conference = {
			tag = RUS
			score_factor = 1
			winner_scope = ALL
			loser_scope = FACTION
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#For player-led German allies: peace or no?
	id = rusfor.1303
	title = rusfor.1303.t
	desc = rusfor.1303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1303 option rusfor.1303.a"
		name = rusfor.1303.a
		set_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace
		RUS_fire_next_moscow_treaty_event = yes
	}
	option = {
		#No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1303 option rusfor.1303.b"
		name = rusfor.1303.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		#just in case
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				is_ally_with = GER
			}
			country_event = rusfor.1304
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusfor.1304
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_possible_country = {
				clr_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Invite the KMT to the Moscow Accord
	id = rusfor.1309
	title = rusfor.1309.t
	desc = rusfor.1309.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		#Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1309 option rusfor.1309.a"
		name = rusfor.1309.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {
					#KMT will accept if RUS doesn't enroach on the frontiers
					MON = {
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 330
					}
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 716
					}
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 885
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1310
				days = 2
			}
			#The Chinese accept
		}
	}
	option = {
		#No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1309 option rusfor.1309.b"
		name = rusfor.1309.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					MON = {
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 330
					}
				}
				OR = {
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 716
					}
					RUS = {
						owns_state = 885
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1311
				days = 2
			}
			#The Chinese say no
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Korean Volunteers in Manchuria
	id = rusfor.1312
	title = rusfor.1312.t
	desc = rusfor.1312.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_korean_army_flavor
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		has_war_with = JAP
		KOR = {
			any_core_state = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1312 option rusfor.1312.a"
		name = rusfor.1312.a
		add_manpower = 1500
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_template = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada"
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada"					#Northeast Anti-Japanese Allied Forces Teaching Brigade"
					division_names_group = RUS_MVD_01
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 0
							y = 2
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 1
							y = 2
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 0
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 1
						}
						irregular_infantry = {
							x = 2
							y = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_controlled_state = {
			#Gwanbuk
			limit = {
				is_core_of = KOR
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"88ya Otdelnaya Strelkovaja Brigada\" division_template = \"Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

				add = 5

					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}

				add = 5

					has_elected_government = yes
				}

				factor = 0

					option = UKR_FORPOL_AUS
				}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR = {
					is_ai = no
				}
			}

				id = rusfor.1401

country_event = {
	#Citizen Romanovs
	id = rusfla.16
	title = rusfla.16.t
	desc = rusfla.16.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.16 option rusfla.16.a"
		name = rusfla.16.a		#Exile them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.16 option rusfla.16.b"
		name = rusfla.16.b		#They are of no consequence
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.19 option rusfla.19.a"
		name = rusfla.19.a		#Ensure they get their words heard

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > 0.15
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = {
							id = RUS_power_balance
							value > -0.3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.19 option rusfla.19.b"

		ai_chance = {

		}

	}
}

country_event = {
	#Kurchatov Petition
	id = rusfla.23
	title = rusfla.23.t
	desc = rusfla.23.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_soviet_soldiers_tank
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.23 option rusfla.23.a"
		name = rusfla.23.a		#Russia shall wield this superweapon
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				controls_province = 11394				#Sarov
				253 = {
					#Vladimir
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
			}
			253 = {
				#Vladimir
				add_building_construction = {
					type = nuclear_facility
					level = 1
					province = 11394					#Sarov
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = {
					248
					252
					253
				}
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
				construct_building_in_random_province = {
					nuclear_facility = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.23 option rusfla.23.b"
		name = rusfla.23.b		#Radical solution to the question of terror
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				controls_province = 11394				#Sarov
				253 = {
					#Vladimir
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
			}
			253 = {
				#Vladimir
				add_building_construction = {
					type = nuclear_facility
					level = 1
					province = 11394					#Sarov
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = {
					248
					252
					253
				}
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
				construct_building_in_random_province = {
					nuclear_facility = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#Churchill Iron Curtain speech
	id = rusfla.26

	desc = rusfla.26.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		FRA = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
		ENT = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
		is_subject = no
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = INT
			has_war_with = ENT
			is_ally_with = INT
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.26 option rusfla.26.a"
		name = rusfla.26.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_idea = RUS_cold_war
					has_idea = RUS_cold_war_2
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_cold_war
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		ENT = {
			country_event = rusfla.27
		}
		INT = {
			country_event = rusfla.27
		}
	}
}

			}

			}

	}

			base = 0

			}
		}

		}

			}

			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {

		}

						is_second_in_command = yes
					}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {

			}
		}

			}

			has_authoritarian_government = yes

			id = rusfla.31
			days = 14
		}
	}

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.f"
		name = rusfla.34.f
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.35
				days = 3
			}
			#The Volunteer March
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.g"
		name = rusfla.34.g
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = 1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Volunteers March
	id = rusfla.35
	title = rusfla.35.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.35.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.35.d.soc
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.35 option rusfla.35.a"
		name = rusfla.35.a
		add_political_power = -40
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.35 option rusfla.35.b"
		name = rusfla.35.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.35 option rusfla.35.c"
		name = rusfla.35.c
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusfla.36
			days = 7
		}
		#Operation Against Union of Volunteers
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.35 option rusfla.35.e"
		name = rusfla.35.e
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Doubts over the Alekseyev Conspiracy
	id = rusfla.38
	title = rusfla.38.t
	desc = rusfla.38.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.38 option rusfla.38.a"
		name = rusfla.38.a
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2
			}
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2
			}
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_relation_change = -1
			}
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = no
			}
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_left = no
			}
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_right = no
			}
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.38 option rusfla.38.b"
		name = rusfla.38.b
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = -10
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Wave of White Sabotage
	id = rusfla.39
	title = rusfla.39.t
	desc = rusfla.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.39 option rusfla.39.a"
		name = rusfla.39.a
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_white_sabotage = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 2
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 5
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 4
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_2
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_3
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_stability < 0.5
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_stability < 0
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_surveillance
					has_completed_focus = RUS_triumph_of_the_idea
				}
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_yakov_blyumkin = {
					is_hired_as_advisor = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps_2
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = {
				RUS_white_sabotage = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = RUS_faith
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_faith < 50
					}
				}
				add_to_temp_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_faith < 25
					}
				}
				add_to_temp_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_faith > 50
					}
				}
				add_to_temp_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage = -1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_faith > 75
					}
				}
				add_to_temp_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage > 8
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_5
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage > 4
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_4
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage > 4
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_3
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_white_sabotage > 2
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_1
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#The Green International Divided
	id = rusfla.40
	title = rusfla.40.t
	desc = rusfla.40.d
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		SER = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
		}
		#TEMP TRIGGER
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference3
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.40 option rusfla.40.a"
		name = rusfla.40.a
		random_list = {
			#Add variety based on national situations; democratic countries prefer the first option
			10 = {
				news_event = rusnews.20				#The Green International Falls to Radicalism
			}
			10 = {
				news_event = rusnews.21				#Creation of the Peasant International
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Ataman Challenges Vozhd
	id = rusfla.46
	title = rusfla.46.t
	desc = rusfla.46.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_krasnov
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
		}
		has_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.a"
		name = rusfla.46.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_pavel_agyeyev = {
				is_hired_as_advisor = no
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_cossack_resistance
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_remove_krasnov_tt
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.b"
		name = rusfla.46.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.c"
		name = rusfla.46.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_pavel_agyeyev = {
				is_hired_as_advisor = yes
			}
		}
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_pavel_agyeyev
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = RUS_cossack_ataman
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Reactionary Monarchy Inside the Republic
	id = rusfla.47
	title = rusfla.47.t
	desc = rusfla.47.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_krasnov
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
			has_government = market_liberal
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.47 option rusfla.47.a"
		name = rusfla.47.a
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.47 option rusfla.47.b"
		name = rusfla.47.b
		add_political_power = 20
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = -0.04
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				RUS_apathy_var = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

			elections_allowed = yes
		}

			coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist

		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes

		}

				id = ruselections.50

			#President's agenda

				ideology = national_populist

		}
	}

country_event = {
	#The Sannikov Flyover
	id = rusfla.77
	title = rusfla.77.t
	desc = rusfla.77.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolchak
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.77 option rusfla.77.a"
		name = rusfla.77.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_tech = improved_small_airframe
					has_tech = improved_medium_airframe
					has_tech = improved_large_airframe
					has_tech = fighter2
					has_tech = CAS2
					has_tech = heavy_fighter2
					has_tech = naval_bomber2
					has_tech = tactical_bomber2
					has_tech = scout_plane2
					has_completed_focus = RUS_the_flying_tank
					has_completed_focus = RUS_polikarpov_fighters
					has_completed_focus = RUS_enter_hundred
					has_completed_focus = RUS_over_the_northern_skies
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.78
					days = 25
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.75
					days = 300
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_plane_crash
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.77 option rusfla.77.b"
		name = rusfla.77.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.75
				days = 300
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_trying
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
	}
}

	#Russian Military Exercises in Kursk
	id = rusfla.84
	title = rusfla.84.t
	desc = rusfla.84.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		#Moderate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.a"
		name = rusfla.84.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_command_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		country_event = {
			id = rusfla.85
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Large
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.b"
		name = rusfla.84.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger > 2
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_popular_anger < 2
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_command_power = -70
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = -1
		}
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		country_event = {
			id = rusfla.85
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Small
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.c"
		name = rusfla.84.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_anger_change = 1
		}
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		country_event = {
			id = rusfla.85
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Military Exercises
	id = rusfla.88
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t1
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t2
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t3
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d1
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d2
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d3
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.88 option rusfla.88.a"
		name = rusfla.88.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
			}
			army_experience = 20
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.25
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.5
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 3
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
			}
			army_experience = 40
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.75
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 4
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
			}
			army_experience = 60
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.95
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 5
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 5
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

	#Solonevich Attacked!
	id = rusfla.90
	title = rusfla.90.t
	desc = rusfla.90.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.90 option rusfla.90.a"
		name = rusfla.90.a

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
						is_second_in_command = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92			#Solonevich Fights
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
				}
				scoped_play_song = "kazachya_pesnya"
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = rusfla.90.a.tt
	}
	option = {

		name = rusfla.90.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}

			country_event = rusfla.91			#Solonevich Leaves
		}
	}
}

		}

country_event = {
	#Solonevich Fig
	id = rusfla.92
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.fight
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.knockout
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.successful_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.counter_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.fail
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.parry
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal
		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.heal
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.fight
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.knockout
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.successful_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.counter_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.fail
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.parry
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.heal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
			}
			set_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp = 6
			}
			set_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp = 8
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Aggressive Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.a"
		name = rusfla.92.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > 0
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_bold = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Careful Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.b"
		name = rusfla.92.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > 0
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_careful = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Leave the fight
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.c"
		name = rusfla.92.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp = 1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				set_temp_variable = {
					ideology_change_var = -2
				}
				change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
				country_event = rusfla.91
			}
			5 = {
				country_event = rusfla.96
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Victory!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.e"
		name = rusfla.92.e
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > -1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp = 0
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.94
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Death!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.f"
		name = rusfla.92.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						RUS_solonevich_hp = 0
					}
					check_variable = {
						RUS_assailant_hp > 0
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.96
		}
	}
}

	#Solonevich Fights 2 #Needed for mechanical reasons

	}
	title = {

		}

		}
		text = rusfla.92.t.heal
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.fight
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.knockout
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.successful_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.counter_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.fail
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.parry
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal
		}
		text = rusfla.92.d.heal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Aggressive Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.a"
		name = rusfla.92.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > 0
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_bold = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Careful Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.b"
		name = rusfla.92.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > 0
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_careful = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Leave the fight
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.c"
		name = rusfla.92.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp = 1
			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				set_temp_variable = {
					ideology_change_var = -2
				}
				change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
				country_event = rusfla.91
			}
			5 = {
				country_event = rusfla.96
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Victory!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.e"
		name = rusfla.92.e
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				RUS_solonevich_hp > 0
			}
			check_variable = {

			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		#Death!

		name = rusfla.92.f
		trigger = {

			}
			check_variable = {
				RUS_assailant_hp > 0
			}
		}

			country_event = rusfla.96
		}
	}

	desc = rusfla.94.d

		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.94 option rusfla.94.a"
		name = rusfla.94.a
		army_experience = 1
		clear_variable = RUS_solonevich_hp
		clear_variable = RUS_assailant_hp
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.95
				days = 3
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				}
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Solonevich Interview
	id = rusfla.95
	title = rusfla.95.t
	desc = rusfla.95.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.a"
		name = rusfla.95.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
				check_variable = {
					RUS_military_anger > 0
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = -1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.06
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.b"
		name = rusfla.95.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 5
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.c"
		name = rusfla.95.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Solonevich Dies!
	id = rusfla.96
	title = rusfla.96.t
	desc = rusfla.96.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.96 option rusfla.96.a"
		name = rusfla.96.a
		#Oh no!
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			kill_character = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_dmitry_romanov
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.98
				days = 14
			}
			#The Funeral
			country_event = {
				id = ruselections.50
				days = 14
			}
			#President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				}
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large
					}
				}
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
			}
		}
		clear_variable = RUS_solonevich_hp
		clear_variable = RUS_assailant_hp
	}
}

country_event = {

	desc = rusfla.115.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin3

	#The Art of Diplomacy
	id = rusfla.116
	title = rusfla.116.t
	desc = rusfla.116.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		GER = {
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}
		has_government = national_populist

		name = rusfla.116.a

			id = rusfla.117
			days = 1
		}
	}

country_event = {
	#Vladimir marries Leonida
	id = rusfla.128
	title = rusfla.128.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli
					}
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.128.d.alternate
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli
					}
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.128.d
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfla.127
				days = 250
				random_days = 200
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.128 option rusfla.128.a"
		name = rusfla.128.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli
					}
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.128 option rusfla.128.b"
		name = rusfla.128.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli
					}
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

			is_monarchy = no

			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_political_power = 15
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.c"
		name = rusfla.129.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			is_monarchy = no
		}

			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_stability = 0.015

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.f"
		name = rusfla.129.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = {
			ideology_change_var = 0.03
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = -0.01
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Victory in the Second Weltkrieg
	id = rusfla.134
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t2
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t3
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t4
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d3
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d4
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d6
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_parade
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_surrender_limit_idea
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.a"
		name = rusfla.134.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
				}
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.b"
		name = rusfla.134.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = yes
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
				}
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.c"
		name = rusfla.134.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = no
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
					}
					scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
					}
					scoped_play_song = "workers_marseillaise"
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
				NOT = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = socrus.203
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.e"
		name = rusfla.134.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag
				}
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
}

	#He is Back
	id = rusfla.136
	title = rusfla.136.t
	desc = rusfla.136.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_war_with = GER
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army
			#Don't trigger this if your war is going really easily
			controls_state = 5			#East Prussia
			10 = {
				is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes
			}
			#Warsaw
			is_ally_with = POL
		}
		event_target:system = {
			has_character = RUS_lavr_kornilov
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.a"
		name = rusfla.136.a
		RUS_lavr_kornilov = {
			set_nationality = ROOT
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kornilov_temp_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_country_leader_role = {
				character = RUS_lavr_kornilov
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.b"
		name = rusfla.136.b
		add_war_support = 0.08
		add_political_power = 30

			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.06
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.c"

	}

country_event = {
	#European Democracy Question
	id = rusfla.143
	title = rusfla.143.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			INT = {
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.143.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			INT = {
				exists = no
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.143.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.a"
		name = rusfla.143.a
		trigger = {
			INT = {
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.119
					days = 50
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = {
							is_subject_of = RUS
						}
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.121
					days = 50
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = {
						tag = GRU
					}
				}
				country_event = demrus.151
			}
			RUS_postwar_distribute_dem_popularities = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.b"
		name = rusfla.143.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_2_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.119
					days = 230
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = {
							is_subject_of = RUS
						}
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.121
					days = 200
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = {
						tag = GRU
					}
				}
				country_event = demrus.151
			}
			RUS_postwar_distribute_dem_popularities = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.c"
		name = rusfla.143.c
		trigger = {
			INT = {
				exists = no
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfla.119
					days = 50
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = {
							is_subject_of = RUS
						}
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = {

					days = 50

country_event = {
	#Empire of the Middle-Earth
	id = rusfla.145
	title = rusfla.145.t
	desc = rusfla.145.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.145 option rusfla.145.a"
		name = rusfla.145.a
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.145 option rusfla.145.b"
		name = rusfla.145.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_manchuria = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_central_asia = yes
					region = 134					#Transcaucasia
					state = 745					#Dalian
				}
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			if = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						NOT = {
							is_owned_by = ROOT
						}
						controller = {
							OR = {
								is_subject_of = RUS
								has_country_leader = {
									character = MON_roman_ungern_sternberg
								}
							}
							is_ai = yes
						}
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_annex_puppet_tt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Daughters of the Motherland
	id = rusfla.161
	title = rusfla.161.t
	desc = rusfla.161.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_female_red_guards
	trigger = {
		has_war = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.a"
		name = rusfla.161.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = {
				RUS_anger_change = 1
			}
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				OR = {
					has_right_democratic_government = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -3
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya"
				division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
				regiments = {
					infantry = {
						x = 0
						y = 0
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 0
						y = 1
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 0
						y = 2
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 1
						y = 0
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 1
						y = 1
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 1
						y = 2
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 2
						y = 0
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 2
						y = 1
					}
					infantry = {
						x = 2
						y = 2
					}
					artillery_brigade = {
						x = 3
						y = 0
					}
					artillery_brigade = {
						x = 3
						y = 1
					}
					artillery_brigade = {
						x = 3
						y = 2
					}
				}
				support = {
					artillery = {
						x = 0
						y = 0
					}
					engineer = {
						x = 0
						y = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = {
				219
			}
			limit = {
				valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" division_template = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_rule = {
			can_generate_female_aces = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			set_rule = {
				can_generate_female_unit_leaders = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_night_witches_idea
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.b"
		name = rusfla.161.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 3
					slots = {
						political_advisor
					}
				}
				RUS_maria_zakharchenko = {
					is_hired_as_advisor = no
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_maria_zakharchenko_advisor
		}
		add_manpower = 86500
		set_rule = {
			can_generate_female_aces = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_with_small_blood
				}
			}
			enable_tech_improved_field_hospitals = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.c"
		name = rusfla.161.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.01
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = {
				ideology_change_var = -5
			}
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
}

	desc = {
		text = rusfla.185.d.spiridonist
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.185.d.maximalist
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_steinberg
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.185 option rusfla.185.a"
		name = rusfla.185.a
	}
}

### MIO Effects and Modifiers ###
country_event = {
	#Event for giving funds to LAZ from NAZ (doesn't want to give it when coded in RUS_organization)
	id = russia.1001
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1001 option 1"
		mio:RUS_laz_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds = 1000
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Event for constructing random buildings from OSOAVIA
	id = russia.1002
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1002 option 1"
		RUS_Gamayun_Factories = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
					is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
				}
				mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
					has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.1002
					days = 60
					random_days = 40
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
					}
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
					}
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.1002
					days = 110
					random_days = 40
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			ROOT = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia.1002
					days = 160
					random_days = 40
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	#Event for giving random funds to MIOs from Obukhov MIO
	id = russia.1008
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1008 option 1"
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_obukhov_organisation = {
				has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_private_assistance_obukhov
			}
		}
		RUS_private_assistance = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russia.1008
			days = 30
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia.1012
	trigger = {
		mio:RUS_toz_organisation = {
			has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_dedicated_experimental_research_centres
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1012 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_a
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_ac
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abc
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abcd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_ab
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_b
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_bd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = {
					unit_organization > 0.02
				}
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.1012
			days = 50
		}
	}
}

### News Events
news_event = {
	#Viktor Chernov Assassinated!
	id = rusnews.1
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.1"
	}
	title = rusnews.1.t
	desc = rusnews.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_assassination_of_alexander_kerensky
	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.1.a
	}
}

news_event = {
	#The Russian State
	id = rusnews.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.2"
	}
	title = rusnews.2.t
	desc = rusnews.2.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_savinkov
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}
	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			is_ally_with = GER
			is_ally_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.a
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.b
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.c
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

news_event = {
	#Savinkov Overthrown by Angry Military
	id = rusnews.3
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.3"
	}
	title = rusnews.3.t
	picture = "[RUS_army_coup_event_picture]"
	desc = {
		text = rusnews.3.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
					is_army_chief = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusnews.3.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS = {
					RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
						is_army_chief = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	major = yes
	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			is_ally_with = RUS
			is_ally_with = GER
			is_ally_with = INT
			is_ally_with = JAP
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.3.a
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.3.b
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.3.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
			}
			OR = {
				is_ally_with = INT
				is_ally_with = JAP
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.3.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = INT
				is_ally_with = JAP
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
		text = rusnews.5.d
	}

				is_monarchy = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusnews.5.d2
	}

		}

news_event = {
	#Formation of the Moscow Accord
	id = rusnews.10
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.10"
	}
	title = rusnews.10.t
	desc = rusnews.10.d

	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.10.a
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.10.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = INT
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.10.c
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = ENT
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.10.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				is_in_faction_with = INT
				is_in_faction_with = ENT
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia.5000
	title = russia.test.t
	desc = russia.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_natpop_advisor
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_dem_advisor
		clr_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_republic"
		name = RUS_test_republic
		RUS_anton_denikin = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
				promote_character = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_anton_denikin_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_republic_under_watch
		set_variable = {
			RUS_target_army_size = num_divisions
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_target_army_size = 5
		}
		set_variable = {
			RUS_military_demands_var = 120
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_military_demands
		country_event = russia.5003
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_monarchy"
		name = RUS_test_monarchy
		country_event = russia.5007
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_socrus-sr"
		name = RUS_test_socrus-sr

			ruling_party = radical_socialist

		}
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes

			}

				set_nationality = PREV.PREV
			}
		}
