	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5006 option RUS_test_kamenev"
		name = RUS_test_kamenev
		activate_advisor = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_communists
		RUS_lev_kamenev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		country_event = socrus.328
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = {
			var = sds_var
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = rkp_var
			value = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = sr_var
			value = 3
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_centre_var
			value = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_right_var
			value = 3
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_centre_unity
			value = 6
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5006 option RUS_test_sulimov"
		name = RUS_test_sulimov
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_internationalists
		RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = {
			var = sds_var
			value = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = rkp_var
			value = 4
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = sr_var
			value = 5
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_left_var
			value = 4
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_right_var
			value = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = vst_centre_unity
			value = 6
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia.5007
	title = russia.test.t
	desc = russia.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_soclib"
		name = RUS_test_soclib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
			unit_leader_event = ruselections.38
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_marlib"
		name = RUS_test_marlib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = ruselections.39
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_soccon"
		name = RUS_test_soccon
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = ruselections.40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_wrangel"
		name = RUS_test_wrangel
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
				promote_character = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
			name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Balkan War for potential Power Projection
	id = rusfor.256
	title = rusfor.256.t
	desc = rusfor.256.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_global_flag = balkan_war_ended
		SER = {
			owns_state = 767
		}
		#Nish
		has_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.256 option rusfor.256.a"
		name = rusfor.256.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 10
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		army_experience = 10
	}
}

	# American Civil War for potential Power Projection
	id = rusfor.258
	title = rusfor.258.t
	desc = rusfor.258.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_USA_support_volunteers
		NOT = {
			country_exists = CSA
		}
		has_socialist_government = no
		has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag

			RUS_power_change = 15
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		army_experience = 10
		air_experience = 10
		navy_experience = 10
	}
}

country_event = {
	# China reunifying for Power Projection
	id = rusfor.262
	title = rusfor.262.t
	desc = rusfor.262.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		any_country = {
			has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			OR = {
				has_idea = QIE_united_china_idea
				has_idea = unite_china_justification_idea
			}
		}
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.262 option rusfor.262.a"
		name = rusfor.262.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = {
			RUS_power_change = 20
		}
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}

country_event = {
	# Iranian aid
	id = rusfor.263
	title = rusfor.263.t
	desc = rusfor.263.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.263 option rusfor.263.a"
		name = rusfor.263.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_iranian_aid_sent
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_PER_aid
		RUS = {
			add_relation_modifier = {
				target = PER
				modifier = volunteer_limit_plus_two
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.263 option rusfor.263.b"
		name = rusfor.263.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
	}
}
